T06srabhu_u:401: 'di la rigs la gnas pa'i gaṅ zag mya ṅan las 'da' ba'i sa bon gyi chos daṅ ldan pa de ni /
T06srabhu_u:402: gaṅ gi tshe saṅs rgyas 'byuṅ ba yod ciṅ yul dbus kyi mi rkun ma ma yin pa dag daṅ kla klo ma yin pa rnams su rgyas par sṅa ma bźin du skyes par gyur na /
T06srabhu_u:403: daṅ po kho nar saṅs rgyas rnams daṅ saṅs rgyas kyi ñan thos rnams la blta ba daṅ druṅ du 'gro ba daṅ bsñen bkur bya ba rñed par 'gyur źiṅ /
T06srabhu_u:404: de dag las chos thos nas daṅ por dad pa thob pa daṅ tshul khrims yaṅ dag par len pa daṅ thos pa 'dzin pa daṅ gtoṅ ba spel ba daṅ lta ba sbyoṅ bar byed do //
T06srabhu_u:405: de'i 'og tu chos yaṅ dag par blaṅs pa'i rgyu de daṅ rkyen des /
T06srabhu_u:406: lus źig ciṅ tshe de yaṅ dag par 'das nas kyaṅ /
T06srabhu_u:407: rnam par smin pa'i skye mched drug gis zin pa'i dbaṅ po khyad par du 'phags pa dag 'thob par 'gyur źiṅ /
T06srabhu_u:408: de'i de dag kyaṅ dad pa śin tu mchog rnams daṅ śin tu gtso bo dag skye ba'i rten du 'gyur ba daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:409: tshul khrims yaṅ dag par blaṅs pa daṅ thos pa gzuṅ ba daṅ gtoṅ ba spel ba daṅ lta ba sbyaṅs pa śin tu mchog daṅ gtso bo daṅ dam par gyur pa dag gi rten du gyur par yaṅ 'gyur ro //
T06srabhu_u:410: dad pa la sogs pa'i chos śin tu mchog daṅ gtso bo daṅ dam par gyur pa gaṅ dag yin pa de dag kyaṅ yaṅ rnam par smin pa gźan gyi rten du 'gyur źiṅ /
T06srabhu_u:411: rnam par smin pa de yaṅ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos daṅ rjes su mthun pa'i dge ba gźan dag gi rten du 'gyur te /
T06srabhu_u:412: de ltar gcig gi rgyu daṅ rten du gcig gyur pa'i sbyin pa'i stobs bskyed pas /
T06srabhu_u:413: goṅ nas goṅ du gaṅ la gnas na /
T06srabhu_u:414: yoṅs su mya ṅan las 'da' ba daṅ yaṅ dag pa ñid du ṅes pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba'i tha
T06srabhu_u:415: ma'i lus phyi ma thob pa'i bar gyi skye ba khyad par can du 'gro ba gaṅ yin pa de
T06srabhu_u:419: mya ṅan las 'da' ba thob par bya ba daṅ (Śbh I 42)
T06srabhu_u:420: mya ṅan las 'da' ba 'gro bar bya ba daṅ rim gyis 'gro bar bya ba daṅ śin tu mthar
T06srabhu_u:421: thug par bya ba'i phyir lam gaṅ yin pa daṅ lam sraṅ gaṅ yin pa daṅ sgrub pa gaṅ yin
T06srabhu_u:422: pa der źugs pa daṅ yaṅ dag par źugs pa daṅ rab tu źugs pa yin pas na /
T06srabhu_u:423: de'i phyir źugs pa źes bya ste /
T06srabhu_u:424: de ni 'jug pa'i raṅ bźin źes bya'o //
T06srabhu_u:426: 'jug pa'i rnam par gźag pa gaṅ źe na /
T06srabhu_u:429: yoṅs su smin par byed pa ñid yod pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:430: yoṅs su smin pa yod pa ste /
T06srabhu_u:431: źugs pa kho na yin la yoṅs su smin par byed pa ñid kyaṅ ma yin yoṅs su smin pa yaṅ ma yin pa yaṅ yod do /
T06srabhu_u:432: źugs pa yaṅ yin yoṅs su smin par byed pa ñid kyaṅ yin la yoṅs su smin pa ma yin pa yaṅ yod do /
T06srabhu_u:433: źugs pa yaṅ yin yoṅs su smin pa yaṅ yin la yoṅs su smin par byed pa ñid ma yin pa yaṅ yod do /
T06srabhu_u:434: źugs pa yaṅ ma yin yoṅs su smin par byed pa ñid kyaṅ ma yin yoṅs su smin pa yaṅ ma yin pa yaṅ yod do //
T06srabhu_u:436: de la rigs gaṅ źe na /
T06srabhu_u:440: de la źugs pa gaṅ źe na /
T06srabhu_u:441: rigs la gnas pa'i gaṅ zag gis sṅon de bźin gśegs pas gsuṅs pa'i chos 'dul ba la dad pa ma thob pa las /
T06srabhu_u:442: daṅ por thob par gyur ciṅ tshul khrims yaṅ dag par len pa daṅ thos pa 'dzin pa daṅ gtoṅ ba spel ba daṅ lta ba sbyoṅ bar byed pa gaṅ yin pa ste
T06srabhu_u:443: de ni źugs pa źes bya'o //
T06srabhu_u:445: yoṅs su smin par byed pa ñid gaṅ źe na /
T06srabhu_u:446: de ltar źugs pa'i gaṅ zag de ñid gaṅ la gnas na /
T06srabhu_u:447: yoṅs su mya ṅan las 'da' ba daṅ yaṅ dag pa ñid du ṅes pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba'i tha ma'i lus phyi ma thob pa ma gtogs pa /
T06srabhu_u:448: źugs pa'i goṅ yan chad nas skye ba goṅ nas goṅ ma dag tu dbaṅ po śin tu mchog daṅ gtso bo daṅ dam pa daṅ śin tu khyad par du 'phags pa dag yaṅ dag par sgrub par (Śbh I 44)
T06srabhu_u:449: byed pa gaṅ yin pa ste /
T06srabhu_u:450: de ni yoṅs su smin par byed pa ñid ces bya'o //
T06srabhu_u:452: de la yoṅs su smin pa gaṅ źe na /
T06srabhu_u:454: yoṅs su mya ṅan las 'da' ba daṅ yaṅ dag pa ñid du ṅes pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba'i tha ma'i lus phyi ma thob par gyur pa gaṅ yin pa ste /
T06srabhu_u:455: de ni yoṅs su smin pa źes bya'o //
T06srabhu_u:457: de la źugs pa kho na yin la yoṅs su smin par byed pa ñid kyaṅ ma yin yoṅs su smin pa yaṅ ma yin pa gaṅ źe na /
T06srabhu_u:458: de bźin gśegs pas gsuṅs pa'i chos 'dul ba la daṅ por dad pa daṅ lta ba sbyoṅ bar byed pa'i bar ni thob par gyur la /
T06srabhu_u:459: de'i goṅ du ni skye ba gcig tsam yaṅ mṅon par bsgrub par mi byed pa gaṅ yin pa ste /
T06srabhu_u:460: de ni źugs pa kho na yin la yoṅs su smin par byed pa ñid kyaṅ ma yin yoṅs su smin pa yaṅ nia yin pa źes bya'o //
T06srabhu_u:462: de la źugs pa yaṅ yin yoṅs su smin par byed pa ñid kyaṅ yin la yoṅs su smin pa ma yin pa gaṅ źe na /
T06srabhu_u:463: de bźin gśegs pas gsuṅs pa'i chos 'dul ba la daṅ por dad pa daṅ lta ba sbyoṅ bar byed pa'i bar yaṅ thob par gyur la /
T06srabhu_u:464: de'i goṅ du skye ba gcig gam gñis sam rab tu maṅ po dag kyaṅ mṅon par sgrub par byed mod kyi /
T06srabhu_u:466: yoṅs su mya ṅan las 'da' ba daṅ yaṅ dag pa ñid du ṅes pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba'i tha ma'i lus phyi ma ma thob pa gaṅ yin pa ste /
T06srabhu_u:467: de ni źugs pa yaṅ yin yoṅs su smin par byed pa ñid kyaṅ yin la yoṅs su smin pa ma yin pa źes bya'o //
T06srabhu_u:469: de la źugs pa yaṅ yin yoṅs su smin pa yaṅ yin la yoṅs su smin par byed pa ñid ma yin pa gaṅ źe na /
T06srabhu_u:471: de ltar źugs pa'i gaṅ zag de ñid kyis (Śbh I 46)
T06srabhu_u:473: yoṅs su mya ṅan las 'da' ba daṅ yaṅ dag pa ñid du ṅes pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba'i tha ma'i lus kyi phyi ma thob ciṅ rñed par gyur pa gaṅ yin pa ste /
T06srabhu_u:474: de ni źugs pa yaṅ yin /
T06srabhu_u:475: yoṅs su smin pa yaṅ yin la /
T06srabhu_u:476: yoṅs su smin par byed pa ñid ma yin pa źes bya'o //
T06srabhu_u:478: tatra katamo nāvatīrṇo na paripacyamāno na paripakvaḥ. ['di lta ste / yoṅs
T06srabhu_u:479: su mya ṅan las 'da' ba'i chos can gyi gaṅ zag rigs kho na la gnas la] nāvatīrṇaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:480: ayam ucyate naivāvatīrṇaḥ pudgalo na paripacyamāno na paripakvaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:481: api tu bhavya eva so 'vatārāya paripākāya /
T06srabhu_u:482: asti punaḥ pudgalo yo 'bhavya evāvatārāya paripākāya vā,
T06srabhu_u:487: tatra sarveṣām eva pudgalānāṃ ṣaḍbhiḥ sthānaiḥ saṃgraho bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:489: bhavyo mṛdukuśalamūlasamanvāgato madhyakuśalamūlasamanvāgato 'dhimātrakuśalamūlasamanvāgato niṣṭhāprāyogiko niṣṭhāgataś ca //
T06srabhu_u:491: yo gotrastho na cādyāpi tatprathamatas tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye śraddhāṃ pratilabhate (Śbh I 48)
T06srabhu_u:495: yo gotrasthas tena tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye tatprathamataḥ śraddhā pratilabdhā bhavati yāvad drstir ṛjūkṛtā /
T06srabhu_u:498: yo gotrasthaḥ pudgalas tatprathamatas tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye śraddhāṃ pratilabhya yāvad dṛṣṭim ṛjuṃ kṛtvā,
T06srabhu_u:499: tataḥ pareṇaikaṃ vā dve vā saṃbahulāni vā janmāny abhinirvartayati viśeṣāya paraiti /
T06srabhu_u:501: yatra sthitaḥ parinirvāti samyaktvaṃ ca nyāmam avakrāmati /
T06srabhu_u:504: yaḥ pudgalo viśeṣāya paraiti sa caramam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilabhate /
T06srabhu_u:505: yatra sthitaḥ parinirvāti samyaktvaṃ ca nyāmam avakrāmati /
T06srabhu_u:509: yaḥ pudgalaś caramam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilabhyāsravakṣayāya samyagavavādānuśāsanīṃ saddharmaśravaṇaṃ vā pratilabhya samyag eva prayujyate,
T06srabhu_u:510: na cādyāpi sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā pratipadyata āsravakṣayam anuprāpnoti,
T06srabhu_u:519: tatra bhavyajātīyaḥ pudgalo gotraṃ niśritya gotraṃ pratiṣṭhāya mṛdūni kuśalamūlāni pratilabhate,
T06srabhu_u:521: so 'vatīrṇo mṛdūni kuśalamūlāni niśritya pratiṣṭhāya madhyāni kuśalamūlāni pratilabhate,
T06srabhu_u:523: sa tathā paripacyamāno madhyāni kuśalamūlāni niśritya pratiṣṭhāyādhimātrāṇi kuśalamūlāni pratilabhate,
T06srabhu_u:528: srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vā sākṣātkaroti /
T06srabhu_u:533: saiṣādimadhyaparyavasānā sarvaśrāvakacaryā ṣaḍbhiḥ pudgalavyavasthānaiḥ saṃdarśitā bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:538: tatrāvatīrṇānāṃ pudgalānāṃ kiṃ parimāṇaniyatas tulyaś ca sarveṣāṃ kālo bhavati parinirvāṇāya,
T06srabhu_u:539: āhosvid aparimāṇaniyato 'tulyaniścayaḥ sarveṣāṃ kālo bhavati parinirvāṇāya /
T06srabhu_u:541: naiṣāṃ parimāṇaniyataḥ kālo nāpi ca tulyaḥ sarveṣāṃ parinirvāṇāya /
T06srabhu_u:542: api tu yathāyogam eṣāṃ yathāpratyayalābhaṃ parinirvāṇaṃ veditavyam /
T06srabhu_u:545: keṣāṃcit punaḥ kṣipram eva parinirvāṇaṃ bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:546: api tu yo gotrasthaḥ pudgalaḥ sarvaḥ kṣipraṃ parinirvāti,
T06srabhu_u:552: no cet parinirvāti so 'vaśyaṃ śaikṣaḥ kālaṃ karoti /
T06srabhu_u:557: iha gotrasthaḥ pudgalo 'vatīrṇamātra eva yadā janmāntaraparivartenāpi smṛtisaṃpramoṣaṃ pratilabhate /
T06srabhu_u:559: saṃvidyamāne 'pi durākhyāte dharmavinaye svākhyāte 'py anekaparyāyeṇa durākhyātasya dharmavinayasya varṇam stutim ānuśaṃsaṃ śrutvā nāvatarati,
T06srabhu_u:561: pravrajito 'py avatīrṇo laghu laghv eva pratyudāvartate /
T06srabhu_u:563: madhuni jātasyeva ca prāṇakasya śukte prakṣiptasya,
T06srabhu_u:566: svākhyātasya vā punar dharmavinayasya naiva varṇastutim ānuśaṃsaṃ śṛṇoti vā /
T06srabhu_u:577: punar aparam avatīrṇaḥ pudgalo na ca tāvad visaṃyukto bhavaty apāyākṣaṇagamanīyaiḥ kleśaiḥ,
T06srabhu_u:582: sa punar yadādhimātreṣu kuśalamūleṣu praviṣṭo bhavaty anupūrveṇa paripākagamanīyeṣu tadā nākṣaṇeṣūpapadyate,
T06srabhu_u:586: punar aparam avatīrṇapudgalo buddhasya vā dharmasya vā saṃghasya vā gunāñ chrutvā,
T06srabhu_u:587: anusmṛtyā vā labhate cetasaḥ prasādam udāraṃ kuśalaṃ naiṣkramyopasaṃhitaṃ,
T06srabhu_u:588: bhūyo bhūyas tenālambanena prasādadravacittatayā aśruprapātān romāṃcāṃś ca pratilabhate /
T06srabhu_u:591: punar aparam avatīrṇaḥ pudgalaḥ prakṛtyaiva tīvreṇa hrīvyapatrāpyeṇa samanvāgato bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:595: punar aparam avatīrṇaḥ pudgalaḥ chandiko bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:601: punar aparam avatīrṇaḥ pudgalaḥ sarvakarmānteṣv anavadyeṣu sarvasamādāneṣu kuśalapakṣaprayogeṣu dṛḍhārambhaś ca bhavati sthirārambhaś ca niścitārambhaś
T06srabhu_u:605: punar aparam avatīrṇaḥ pudgalo mandarajaskajātīyo bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:606: mandamandaṃ kleśaparyavasthānam utpādayati na ca punaḥ prabandhaṃ sthāpayati,
T06srabhu_u:607: aśaṭhaś ca bhavaty amāyāvī nihatamadamānāhaṃkāro guṇābhiniviṣṭo doṣadveṣṭā /
T06srabhu_u:610: punar aparam avatīrṇaḥ pudgalo 'saṃlīnacitto bhavaty udāreṣv adhigamyeṣu sthāneṣu nātmānaṃ paribhavati,
T06srabhu_u:614: imāny evaṃbhāgīyāni prabhūtāny avatīrṇānāṃ pudgalānāṃ liṅgāni veditavyāni yeṣām etat pradeśamātram ākhyātam //
T06srabhu_u:615: punar etāni liṅgāni mṛdukuśalamūlasthasyāvatīrṇasya mṛdūni bhavanti,
T06srabhu_u:620: imāny ucyante “avatīrṇasya pudgalasya liṅgāni” yair liṅgaiḥ samanvāgato 'vatīrṇo 'vatīrṇa iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
T06srabhu_u:621: tāni punar etāni gotrasthānām avatīrṇānāṃ ca pudgalānām ānumānikāni liṅgāni (Śbh I 58)
T06srabhu_u:623: buddhā eva tu bhagavantaḥ paramapāramipraptāś ca śrāvakās tāyinas tatra pratyakṣadarśinaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:628: asty avatīrṇaḥ pudgalo 'vatīrṇa eva na paripacyamāno na paripakvo na niṣkrāntaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:629: asti paripacyamāno na paripakvo na niṣkrāntaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:633: ye 'pi tadanye mṛdvindriyādayaḥ pudgalāḥ gotrabhūmau nirdiṣṭā /
T06srabhu_u:635: tatra yaś cāyam avatārasya svabhāvo yac ca vyavasthānaṃ yāni cemāny avatīrṇānāṃ liṅgāni ye ceme 'vatīrṇāḥ pudgalās tat sarvam abhisaṃkṣipya“avatārabhūmir” ity ucyate //
T06srabhu_u:637: svabhāvas tadvyavasthānaṃ liṅgaṃ pudgala eva ca /
T06srabhu_u:647: tad ekadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya naiṣkramyabhūmir ity ucyate //
T06srabhu_u:651: prathama eva sa samāpattyupapattike dhyāne vivekaje prītisukhe śāntadarśī bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:652: sa tathādarśī tadbahulavihāri san kāmavairāgyam anuprāpnoti,
T06srabhu_u:654: evaṃ prathamadhyānād ūrdhvam sarvāsv adharimāsu bhūmiṣv audārikadarśi bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:656: sa tathādarśī tadbahulavihārī samāno yāvad ākiñcanyāyatanād vairāgyam anuprāpnoti naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ ca samāpadyate /
T06srabhu_u:663: ['phag pa'i chos rnams la bzo ba la la],
T06srabhu_u:669: tataś cottari mārgaṃ bhāvayaṃs traidhātukebhyo darśanabhāvanāprahātavyebhyo dharmebhya ātmānaṃ visaṃyojayati,
T06srabhu_u:688: itīme dharmā laukikalokottaravairāgyagamanāya saṃbhāra ity ucyate //
T06srabhu_u:689: tatra yā cātmasaṃpat parasaṃpat kuśalaś ca dharmacchanda eṣāṃ pūrvavad vibhāgo veditavyaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:696: yathāsamātteṣu śikṣāpadeṣv avipannakāyakarmāntaś ca bhavaty avipannavākkarmāntaś ca,
T06srabhu_u:702: ta ete nikāyabhedena bahavaḥ saṃvarā bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:703: asmiṃs tv arthe bhikṣusaṃvaram adhiṣṭhāyāha prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃvṛtah//
T06srabhu_u:706: yathāpi tad īryāpathaṃ vetikaraṇīyaṃ vā kuśalapakṣaprayogaṃ vādhiṣṭhāya lokānuvartinā lokānutkrāntena vinayānuvartinā vinayānutkrāntena cācāreṇa samanvāgato bhavati //
T06srabhu_u:707: tatreryāpathādhiṣṭhāna ācāraḥ kathaṃ na lokotkrānto na vinayotkrāntaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:708: yathāpi tad yatra caṃkramitavyaṃ yathā caṃkramitavyaṃ tatra tathā caṃkramyate,
T06srabhu_u:709: yena na lokagarhito bhavati na satāṃ samyaggatānāṃ satpuruṣāṇāṃ sahadhārmikāṇāṃ vinayadharāṇāṃ vinayaśikṣitānām avadyo bhavati garhyasthānīyaḥ
T06srabhu_u:710: yathā caṅkrama evaṃ sthānaṃ niṣadyā śayyā veditavyā //
T06srabhu_u:711: tatretikaraṇīyādhiṣṭhāna ācāraḥ kathaṃ na lokotkrānto bhavati na vinayotkrāntaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:712: itikaraṇīyam ucyate cīvarācchādanam uccāraprasrāvam udakadantakāṣṭhaṃ grāmapraveśaḥ piṇḍapātanirhāraparibhogaḥ pātranirmādanaṃ sthāpanaṃ ca pādaprakṣālanaṃ śayanāsanaprajñaptiḥ /
T06srabhu_u:714: yad vā punar evaṃbhāgīyaṃ kiṃcit tad itikaraṇīyam ity ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:716: yathā ca kalpayitavyaṃ tatra tathā kalpayati /
T06srabhu_u:720: evam itikaraṇīyādhiṣṭhāna ācāro lokānutkrānto bhavati vinayānutkrāntaś ca //
T06srabhu_u:722: tatra kuśalapakṣaprayogādhiṣṭhāna ācāraḥ kathaṃ lokānutkrāntaś ca bhavati vinayānutkrāntaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:723: kuśalapakṣa ucyate tadyathā svādhyāyo gurūṇām sāmīcīkarmopasthānaṃ ca,
T06srabhu_u:730: iti ya evaṃbhāgīyā apy anye dharmā ayam ucyate kuśalapakṣaprayogaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:731: sa evaṃ kuśalapakṣaprayogo yathāyogaṃ yathā parikīrtitaṃ,
T06srabhu_u:733: yena nānuyojyo bhavati garhito laukikānāṃ vinayadharāṇāṃ vinayaśikṣitānāṃ satāṃ samyaggatānām satpuruṣāṇāṃ sahadhārmikāṇām /
T06srabhu_u:734: ayam ucyate kuśalapakṣaprayogādhiṣṭhāna ācāro lokānutkrānto vinayānutkrāntaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:735: ya ebhir ākāraiḥ saṃpanna ācāra iyam ucyata ācārasaṃpat /

T06srabhu_u:754: śāstā vā devatā vā vijñā vā sabrahmacāriṇo dharmatayā vigarheyuḥ,
T06srabhu_u:756: sa ebhyo dṛṣṭadharmasāṃparāyikebhyas taddhetukebhyo 'niṣṭebhyo dharmebhyo bhayadarśī bhavati /

T06srabhu_u:762: pūrvam anena prātimokṣasaṃvarasamādāne jñapticaturthena karmaṇopasaṃpadyamānena katipayānāṃ śikṣāpadānāṃ śarīraṃ śrutaṃ,
T06srabhu_u:763: sātirekaṃ ca tadanyam ardhatṛtīyaṃ śikṣāpadaśataṃ prātimokṣasūtroddiṣṭaṃ pratijñayaivopagataṃ “sarvatra śikṣiṣyāmī“ti,
T06srabhu_u:767: tataś ca tena sarvaśikṣāpadasamādānāt prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:768: tata uttarakālaṃ yeṣu śikṣāpadeṣu kuśalo bhavati tāni tāvan nādhyāpadyate /

T06srabhu_u:773: tebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ yathāparikīrtitebhyaḥ sthānebhya ācāryasya vopādhyāyasya vā pūrvavat,
T06srabhu_u:775: yathānuśiṣṭo 'nyūnam anadhikaṃ śikṣate teṣu gurugurusthānīyavyapadiṣṭeṣu śikṣāpadeṣu,
T06srabhu_u:776: aviparītagrāhī ca bhavaty arthasya vyañjanasya ca /
T06srabhu_u:780: tatrāyaṃ samāsārthas trilakṣaṇa eva śīlaskandhaḥ paridīpito bhagavatā,
T06srabhu_u:784: yathā katham iti yat tāvad āha śīlavān viharatīty anena tāvad avipraṇāśalakṣaṇaṃ śīlasaṃvarasyākhyātam //
T06srabhu_u:785: yat punar āha prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃvṛta ity anena svabhāvalakṣaṇam ākhyātam //
T06srabhu_u:789: anena param upanidhāya tathā samādattasya prātimokṣasaṃvarasya guṇalakṣaṇam ākhyātam //
T06srabhu_u:790: tathāpi pare tām ācāragocarasaṃpadam upalabhyāprasannāś ca prasīdanti,
T06srabhu_u:795: anyathā śīlasaṃpannasyācāragocarasaṃpannasyāyaṃ parādhipateyo guṇa ānuśaṃsā na bhavet, (Śbh I 72)
T06srabhu_u:798: aṇumātreṣv avadyeṣu bhayadarśī samādāya śikṣate śīkṣāpadeṣv iti,
T06srabhu_u:801: yad apy evam ācāragocarasaṃpannaḥ parādhipateyaṃ guṇānuśaṃsaṃ pratilabheta,
T06srabhu_u:802: api tu śīlaṃ vipādayitvā taddhetos tatpratyayam apāyeṣūpapadyate /
T06srabhu_u:804: yat punar aṇumātreṣv avadyeṣu bhayadarśī bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:805: prāg evādhimātreṣu samādāya ca śikṣate śikṣāpadeṣu tasmāt taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt sugatāv upapadyate /
T06srabhu_u:806: bhavyo vā bhavaty aprāptasya prāptaye pūrvavad /
T06srabhu_u:807: anena kāraṇenādhyātmādhipateyo 'yaṃ śīlasaṃvarasya guṇānuśaṃsa ity ucyate //
T06srabhu_u:816: tathā hi prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ śīlam adhiśīlaṃ śikṣety ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:821: yadutādhiśīlaṃ pratiṣṭhāya pūrvaṃgamaṃ kṛtvā tasmāt prātimokṣasaṃvaro nairyāṇikaṃ śīlam ity ucyate //
T06srabhu_u:823: “ācāragocarasaṃpanno 'ṇumātreṣv avadyeṣu bhayadarśī samādāya śikṣate śikṣāpadeṣv” ity anena śīlabhāvanākhyātā /
T06srabhu_u:825: evaṃ ca bhāvitaṃ subhāvitaṃ (Śbh I 74) bhavatīti /
T06srabhu_u:826: sa eṣa ekaḥ śīlasaṃvaraḥ ṣaḍākāradeśanāpratyupasthāno veditavyaḥ //
T06srabhu_u:827: sa khalu eṣa śīlasaṃvaro daśabhiḥ kāraṇair vipanno veditavyaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:840: tatra katham ādito durgṛhītaṃ śīlaṃ bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:859: asthāne pareṣām antike paribhavacittaṃ vāghātaṃ votpādayati pravedayati /
T06srabhu_u:864: yathāpīhaikatyo yām atītam adhvānam upādāyāpattim āpannaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:865: sā cānena smṛtisaṃpramoṣād ekatyā na yathādharmaṃ pratikṛtā bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:867: evam anāgataṃ vartamānam adhvānam upādāya yām āpattim āpanno bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:868: sā cānena smṛtisaṃpramoṣād ekatyā na yathādharmaṃ pratikṛtā bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:869: na ca pūrvam evāpatter āyatyām anadhyāpattaye tīvram autsukyam āpadyate,
T06srabhu_u:870: yan nv “ahaṃ tathā tathā careyaṃ vihareyam,
T06srabhu_u:871: yathā yathā caran viharaṃś cāpattiṃ nādhyāpadyeya” /
T06srabhu_u:872: tathā ca tathā carati viharati yathāpattim adhyāpadyate /
T06srabhu_u:873: so 'nena pūrvāntasahagatenāparāntasahagatena madhyāntasahagatena pūrvakālakaraṇīyena sahānucareṇa ca pramādena samanvāgataḥ nidrāsukhaṃ śayanasukhaṃ pārśvasukhaṃ ca svīkaroti /
T06srabhu_u:876: na kartā bhavati vijñānāṃ sabrahmacāriṇāṃ kāyena vaiyāpṛtyam /
T06srabhu_u:880: “anenāhaṃ śīlena vā vratena vā tapasā vā brahmacaryavāsena vā devo vā syāṃ devānyatamo vā” /
T06srabhu_u:886: yathāpīhaikatya īryāpathaṃ vādhiṣṭhāyetikaraṇīyaṃ vā kuśalapakṣaprayogaṃ vā lokotkrāntaś ca bhavati vinayotkrāntaś ca pūrvavad /
T06srabhu_u:889: yathāpīhaikatyo maheccho bhavaty asaṃtuṣṭo duṣpoṣo durbharajātīyaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:892: adharmeṇa piṇḍapātaṃ śayanāsanaṃ glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraṃ paryeṣate na dharmeṇa /
T06srabhu_u:893: sa ca cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaisajyapariṣkārahetor ātmano guṇasaṃbhāvanānimittam aprākṛtaṃ viṭhapitam īryāpathaṃ kalpayati,
T06srabhu_u:894: anuddhatendriyatām acapalendriyatāṃ śāntendriyatāṃ ca pareṣām upadarśayati /
T06srabhu_u:895: yenāsya pare guṇasaṃbhāvanājñātā dātavyaṃ kartavyaṃ manyante,
T06srabhu_u:897: dhvāṅkṣaś ca bhavati mukharaḥ pragalbhaḥ kelāyitā nāmagotrodgṛhītā bahuśruto bhavati dharmadharaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:898: lābhakāraṇād eva ca pareṣāṃ dharmaṃ saṃlapati buddhabhāṣitaṃ vā śrāvakabhāṣitaṃ vā,
T06srabhu_u:899: ātmano vā guṇān bhūtān vā kiṃcid vā punaḥ samāropya svayam eva vaktā bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:903: anyatamānyatamena vā śrāmaṇakena pariṣkāreṇārthī prabhūtena vāgratareṇa vā /
T06srabhu_u:905: apy evarn śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ cīvareṇa vighātaṃ saṃlakṣayitvā prabhūtaṃ praṇītaṃ cīvaraṃ dātavyaṃ kartavyaṃ maṃsyante /
T06srabhu_u:906: yathā cīvaram evam anyatamānyatamaṃ śrāmaṇakaṃ jīvitapariṣkāram /

T06srabhu_u:908: asatsu vāsaṃvidyamāneṣu bhogeṣv alabhamāna evaṃ coparodhena yācate niṣpiṣya,
T06srabhu_u:910: hīnaṃ vā punar labdhvā tathā saṃvidyamāneṣu bhogeṣu taṃ lābhaṃ paṃsayaty avasādayati /
T06srabhu_u:911: saṃmukhaṃ ca dātāraṃ dānapatim evaṃ cāha “haṃ bho,
T06srabhu_u:913: santy eke kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca ye tavāntikān nīcakulīnatarāś ca daridratarāś ca /
T06srabhu_u:914: te punar evaṃ caivaṃ ca praṇītadāyino mana-āpadāyinaś ca /

T06srabhu_u:917: ya ebhir ākāraiḥ kuhanāṃ vā niśritya lapanāṃ vā naimittikatāṃ vā (Śbh I 80)
T06srabhu_u:918: naiṣpeṣikatāṃ vā lābhena vā lābhaṃ niścikīrṣatāṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān parataḥ paryeṣate,
T06srabhu_u:920: yaḥ punar adharmeṇa so 'sya bhavati mithyājīvaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:921: evaṃ tac chīlam ājīvavipattyā parigṛhītaṃ bhavati //
T06srabhu_u:924: tān parataḥ pratilabdhān dharmeṇa vādharmeṇa vā cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaisajyapariṣkārān paribhuṅkte,
T06srabhu_u:927: punar aparam ihaikatya ātmaklamathānuyukto bhavaty anekaparyāyeṇātmānam ātāpayati saṃtāpayati kaṣṭavratasamādāyī ca bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:928: tadyathā kaṇṭhakā pāśrayo vā bhavati bhasmāpāśrayo musalāpāśrayaḥ phalakāpāśrayo bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:934: ekapādakaḥ sthitvā yataḥ sūryas tataḥ parivartate /
T06srabhu_u:935: iti yo vā punar apy evaṃbhāgīya ātmaklamathānuyogaḥ/
T06srabhu_u:939: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ śīlaṃ vā vrataṃ vā dṛṣṭyā parāmṛśati /
T06srabhu_u:940: “anenaiva śīlena vā vratena vā śuddhir bhaviṣyati /
T06srabhu_u:942: sarvaṃ ca śīlam ito bāhyānāṃ surakṣitam api suviśuddham api tad upamayā viśuddhyānairyāṇikam ity ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:946: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ sarveṇa sarvam alajjī bhavati nirapekṣaḥ śrāmaṇye,
T06srabhu_u:947: sa ca bhavati duḥśīlaḥ pāpadharmā antaḥpūtir avasrutaḥ kaśambakajātaḥ śaṃkhasvarasamācāraḥ,
T06srabhu_u:950: ebhir daśabhiḥ kāraṇair vipannaṃ śīlaṃ śīlavipattir ity uktā bhagavatā /
T06srabhu_u:951: api ca śīlavyasanam apy uktaṃ bhagavatā /
T06srabhu_u:952: tac caibhyaḥ kāraṇebhyo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ veditavyaṃ,
T06srabhu_u:954: tadanyaiś ca kāraṇaiḥ śīlavipattir eva veditavyā //
T06srabhu_u:956: eṣām eva ca kṛṣṇapaksavyavasthitānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ viparyayeṇa śuklapakṣyaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ śīlasaṃpattir veditavyā śīlaviśuddhiś ca //
T06srabhu_u:957: kvacit punar bhagavatā śīlaṃ mūlārthenoktam / yathoktam /
T06srabhu_u:959: saṃyukto ca visaṃyukto dṛṣṭyādṛṣṭyāryapāpayā // iti gāthā //
T06srabhu_u:966: śīlānulepanasaṃpanno bhikṣur vā bhikṣuṇī veti pūrvavat /
T06srabhu_u:968: asti tad ānanda gandhajātam yasyānuvātam api gandho vāti,
T06srabhu_u:970: anuvātam api prativātam api gandho vāti /
T06srabhu_u:973: kāyasucaritasyeṣṭo vipāko dṛṣṭe dharme 'bhisaṃparāye ca evaṃ vāksucaritasya /
T06srabhu_u:980: kena kāraṇena bhagavatā śīlaṃ mūlaśabdenoktaṃ pratiṣṭhārthādhārārtho mūlārthaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:981: tac caitac chīlaṃ sarveṣām eva laukikalokottarāṇāṃ guṇānām anavadyānām agryānāṃ pravarānām sukhāhārāṇāṃ,
T06srabhu_u:984: tadyathā pṛthivī pratiṣṭhā bhavaty ādhāras tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatīnām utpattaye,
T06srabhu_u:985: evam eva śīlaṃ vistareṇa pūrvavad vācyam //
T06srabhu_u:988: yāni tadanyāni bhūṣaṇāni tadyathā harṣā vā,
T06srabhu_u:993: tāni yāvād ayaṃ dahro bhavati śiśuḥ kṛṣṇakeśaḥ pratyagrayauvanasamanvāgataḥ tāvad asya vibhūṣaṇāni prāvṛtāni śobhāmātrāṃ janayanti /
T06srabhu_u:1000: nānyatra tair vibhūṣaṇaiḥ prāvṛtaiḥ sa viḍambita iva khyāti /
T06srabhu_u:1004: śīlaṃ punaḥ sarveṣāṃ sarvakālaṃ ca śobhākaraṃ bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:1007: tat khalu kuśalam anavadyaṃ śīlasamādānaṃ sarvadauḥśīlyasamādānahetukaṃ kāyaparidāhaṃ cittaparidāham apanayati /
T06srabhu_u:1008: gharmābhitaptasyottamagrīṣmaparidāhe kāle pratyupasthite candanānulepanaṃ vā karpūrānulepanaṃ vā /
T06srabhu_u:1011: śīlavataḥ khalu puruṣapudgalasya digvidikṣu kalyāṇaḥ kīrtiyaśaḥśabdaśloko niścarati /
T06srabhu_u:1014: puṣpagandhānāṃ vā vāteritānāṃ digvidikṣu mana-āpo gandho niścarati /
T06srabhu_u:1018: eṣā caryā tasmāt sucaritam ity ucyate //
T06srabhu_u:1022: asya punaḥ śīlasaṃvarasya trividhā pratyavekṣā pariśuddhinimittam /
T06srabhu_u:1027: katham etāni karmāṇi pratyavekṣamāṇaḥ śīlasaṃvaraṃ pariśodhayati /
T06srabhu_u:1028: yat karma kāyena praṇihitaṃ bhavati kartuṃ tad evaṃ pratyavekṣate /
T06srabhu_u:1029: “kin nu vyābādhikaṃ me etat kāyakarmātmanaḥ pareṣām,
T06srabhu_u:1031: avyābādhikaṃ me etat kāyakarma ātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ kuśalaṃ sukhodayaṃ sukhavipākaṃ” /
T06srabhu_u:1033: “vyābādhikaṃ me etat kāyakarmātmano vā parasya vākuśalaṃ duḥkhodayaṃ,
T06srabhu_u:1038: sacet punar jānāty avyābādhikaṃ me etat kāyakarma kuśalaṃ pūrvavat,
T06srabhu_u:1039: sa karoti tat kāyena karma na pratisaṃharati,
T06srabhu_u:1041: yad apy anenātītam adhvānam upādāya kāyena karma kṛtaiḥ bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:1044: sacet sa evaṃ pratyavekṣmāṇo jānāti vyābādhikaṃ me etat” kāyakarma pūrvavat /
T06srabhu_u:1047: sacet punar evaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo jānāty avyābādhikaṃ me etat kāyakarma pūrvavat /
T06srabhu_u:1049: evam asya tat kāyakarma supratyavekṣitaṃ ca bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:1055: “kiṃ nu vyābādhikaṃ me etan manaḥ” pūrvavat /
T06srabhu_u:1062: evam anena tan manaskarma pratyavekṣitaṃ bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:1066: atīte 'py adhvany anāgate 'pi pratyutpanne 'pi ye kecic (Śbh I 92)
T06srabhu_u:1087: manaskarma kiṃ vyābādhikaṃ me” iti vistareṇa pūrvavad,
T06srabhu_u:1089: yat punar ekatyaṃ pratisaṃharati pratideśayaty ekatyam anuprayacchati /
T06srabhu_u:1090: tenaiva prītiprāmodyenāhorātrānuśikṣī bahulaṃ viharatīyam ucyate pariśodhanā //
T06srabhu_u:1093: iha śīlavān puruṣapudgalaḥ śīlaviśuddhim ātmanaḥ pratyavekṣamāṇo 'vipratisāraṃ protilabhate /
T06srabhu_u:1097: sukhitasya cittaṃ samādhīyate samāhitacitto yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:1099: yathābhūtaṃ jānan paśyan nirvidyate nirviṇṇo virajyate,
T06srabhu_u:1103: yac chīlavān puruṣapudgalaḥ śīlaviśuddhyadhipateyam avipratisāraṃ pratilabhate /
T06srabhu_u:1106: punar aparaṃ śīlavān puruṣapudglaḥ maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite,
T06srabhu_u:1107: “kṛtaṃ bata me sukṛtaṃ kāyena vācā manasā,
T06srabhu_u:1108: na kṛtaṃ bata me duścaritaṃ kāyena pūrvavat” iti “yā gatiḥ kṛtapuṇyānāṃ kṛtakuśalānām kṛtabhayabhīrutrāṇānāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ pretya,
T06srabhu_u:1110: avipratisāriṇo hi puruṣapudgalasya bhadrakaṃ maranaṃ bhavati bhadrikā kālakriyā bhadrako 'bhisaṃparāyaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:1112: punar aparaṃ śīlavataḥ puruṣapudgalasya digvidikṣu kalyāṇo varṇakīrtiyaśaśabdaśloko niścarati /
T06srabhu_u:1114: punar aparaṃ śīlavān puruṣapudgalaḥ sukham svapiti sukhaṃ pratibudhyate /
T06srabhu_u:1117: punar aparaṃ śīlavān puruṣapudgalaḥ supto 'pi devānāṃ rakṣyo bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:1119: punar aparaṃ śīlavān puruṣapudgalaḥ na śaṃkī bhavati parataḥ pāpasya,
T06srabhu_u:1122: punar aparaṃ śīlavān puruṣapudgalaḥ badhakānāṃ pratyarthikānām apipratyamitrāṇāṃ chidraprāpto 'pi rakṣyo bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:1124: iti viditvā mitratāṃ vāpadyate madhyasthatāṃ vā /
T06srabhu_u:1126: punar aparaṃ pūrvavad vyāḍānāṃ yakṣāṇāṃ naivāsikānām amanuṣyāṇāṃ chidraprāpto 'pi rakṣyo bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:1127: yaduta tad eva śīlam adhipatiṃ kṛtvā /
T06srabhu_u:1129: punar aparaṃ śīlavān puruṣapudgalaḥ dharmeṇālpakṛcchreṇa parato lābhaṃ labhate /
T06srabhu_u:1132: gurukṛto rājñāṃ rājamātrāṇāṃ naigamajānapadānāṃ dhanināṃ śreṣṭhinām sārthavāhānām /
T06srabhu_u:1135: saced ākāṃkṣate “kāmadhātau kṣatriyamahāśālakulānāṃ brāhmaṇamahāśālakulānāṃ vā gṛhapatimahāśālakulānāṃ vā caturmahārājakāyikānāṃ vā devānāṃ,
T06srabhu_u:1136: trāyastriṃśānāṃ vā yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyopapadyeya” iti,
T06srabhu_u:1139: saced ākāṃkṣate “aho vatāhaṃ dhyānāni ca samāpadya dṛṣṭe dharme sukhaṃ vihareyam /
T06srabhu_u:1142: tac ca śīlavato vītarāgasya praṇidhānaṃ samṛdhyati /
T06srabhu_u:1143: saced ākāṃkṣate “ye te śāntā vimokṣā atikramya tān ārupyān copasaṃpadya viharayeya /
T06srabhu_u:1144: ārūpyopagatānāṃ ca devānāṃ sabhāgatāyopapadyeya” iti, pūrvavat //
T06srabhu_u:1146: tac ca viśuddhatvāc chīlānāṃ sarvatra ca vītarāgatvāt /
T06srabhu_u:1153: sa eṣa sarvākāraparipūrṇaḥ śīlasaṃvaraḥ saṃbhāraparigṛhīta ākhyāta uttano vivṛtaḥ prakāśito,
T06srabhu_u:1156: vibhaṅgas trividho jñeyaḥ saṃpad daśavidhā bhavet /
T06srabhu_u:1157: paryāyaś ca ṣaḍākāro viśuddhis trividhā matā /
T06srabhu_u:1161: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ indriyair guptadvāro viharaty ārakṣitasmṛtir nipakasmṛtir iti vistaraḥ /
T06srabhu_u:1163: ārakṣitasmṛtir bhavati nipakasmṛtir iti vistareṇa yāvad rakṣati mana-indriyaṃ mana-indriyeṇa saṃvaram āpadyate /
T06srabhu_u:1167: yathāpīhaikatyenendriyaguptadvāratām evādhipatiṃ kṛtvā śrutam udgṛhītaṃ bhavati cintitaṃ vā punar bhāvitaṃ vā /
T06srabhu_u:1168: tena ca śrutacintābhāvanādhipateyā smṛtiḥ pratilabdhā bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:1169: sa tasyā eva smṛteḥ pratilabdhāyā asaṃpramoṣārtham adhigamārtham avināśārthaṃ kālena kālaṃ tasminn eva śrute yogaṃ karoty abhyāsaṃ karoti,
T06srabhu_u:1172: evam anena tasyāḥ śrutasamudāgatāyāś cintābhāvanāsamudāgatāyāḥ smṛteḥ kālena kālaṃ śrutacintābhāvanāyogakriyāyā ārakṣā kṛtā bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:1175: sa tasyām eva smṛtau nityakārī ca bhavati nipuṇakārī ca bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:1176: tatra yā nityakāritā iyam ucyate sātatyakāritā /
T06srabhu_u:1177: tatra yā nipuṇakāritā iyam ucyate satkṛtyakāritā /
T06srabhu_u:1178: sa evaṃ sātatyakārī satkṛtyakārī nipakasmṛtir ity ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:1179: sa yathārakṣitasmṛtir bhavati tathā tāṃ smṛtiṃ na saṃpramoṣayati /
T06srabhu_u:1180: sa yathā nipakasmṛtir bhavati tathā tasyām evāpramuṣitāyāṃ smṛtau balādhānaprāpto bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:1181: yena śakto bhavati pratibalaś ca rūpāṇām abhibhavāya śabdānāṃ gandhānāṃ rasānām spraṣṭavyānāṃ dharmāṇām abhibhavāya //
T06srabhu_u:1186: yena vikalpakena manovijñānena priyarūpeṣu rūpeṣu samrajyate,
T06srabhu_u:1188: sa tām evādhipatiṃ kṛtvā tasmād ayoniśovikalpāt saṃkleśasamutthāpakāt tan mānasaṃ rakṣati,
T06srabhu_u:1192: tac ca manovijñānam asty ayoniśovikalpasahagataṃ saṃkleśasamutthāpakam /
T06srabhu_u:1195: sa tāṃ smṛtim evādhipatiṃ kṛtvā tasmād ayoniśovikalpāt saṃkleśasamutthāpakāt tan mānasaṃ rakṣati evam asya saṃkleśo notpadyate /
T06srabhu_u:1198: samāvasthocyate upekṣā kuśalā vā avyākṛtā vā /
T06srabhu_u:1199: sa tasmād ayoniśovikalpāt saṃkleśasamutthāpakāt tan mānasaṃ rakṣitvā kuśalāyāṃ vopekṣāyām avyākṛtāyāṃ vāvacārayati /
T06srabhu_u:1203: kathaṃ punas tasmād ayoniśovikalpāt saṃkleśasamutthāpakān mānasaṃ rakṣati /
T06srabhu_u:1204: na nimittagrāhī bhavati teṣu rūpeṣu śabdeṣu gandheṣu raseṣu spraṣṭavyeṣu dharmeṣu nānuvyañjanagrāhī,
T06srabhu_u:1205: yato 'dhikaraṇam asya pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anusraveyuḥ /
T06srabhu_u:1206: sacet punaḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣāt kleśapracuratayā vā vivarjayato 'pi nimittagrāham anuvyañjanagrāham utpadyanta eva pāpakā akuśalā ye dharmā anusravanty eva cittaṃ /
T06srabhu_u:1208: ābhyāṃ dvābhyām ākārābhyāṃ tasmāt saṃkleśasamutthāpakād ayoniśovikalpāt tan mānasaṃ rakṣitaṃ bhavati //
T06srabhu_u:1209: kathaṃ ca punas tan mānasam ābhyām ākārābhyāṃ saṃrakṣya kuśalāyāṃ vopekṣāyām avacārayaty avyākṛtāyāṃ vā /
T06srabhu_u:1212: yathāha rakṣati cakṣurindriyaṃ cakṣurindriyeṇa saṃvaram āpadyate /
T06srabhu_u:1215: ābhyāṃ dvābhyām ākārābhyāṃ kuśalāyāṃ vāvyākṛtāyāṃ vopekṣāyāṃ tan mānasam avacārayati //
T06srabhu_u:1217: kathaṃ cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣu na nimittagrāhī bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:1219: yac cakṣurvijñānagocaro rūpaṃ tasya gocarasya grāhī bhavati cakṣurvijñānena /
T06srabhu_u:1220: evaṃ nimittagrāhī bhavati yaduta cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣu (Śbh I 106) /
T06srabhu_u:1221: sacet punas taṃ gocaraṃ parivarjayati cakṣurvijñanasyaivaṃ na nimittagrāhī bhavati cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣu /
T06srabhu_u:1222: yathā cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣv evaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñeyeṣu dharmeṣu //
T06srabhu_u:1225: yas teṣv eva cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyaiva samanantarasahotpannasya vikalpakasya manovijñānasya yo gocaraḥ saṃrāgāya vā saṃdveṣāya vā saṃmohāya vā,
T06srabhu_u:1227: evam anuvyañjanagrāhi bhavati yad uta cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣu /
T06srabhu_u:1229: notpādayati tadālambanaṃ tan manovijñānam evaṃ nānuvyañjanagrāhī bhavati yaduta cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣu /
T06srabhu_u:1232: tatra nimittagrāho yac cakṣuṣā rūpāṇy ābhāsagatāni tajjaṃ manaskāraṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya paśyati /
T06srabhu_u:1234: tāny eva rūpāṇi cakṣusābhāsagatāni tajjaṃ (Śbh I 108)
T06srabhu_u:1237: śṛṇoti “santy evaṃrūpāṇy evaṃrūpāṇi cakṣurvijñeyāṃ rūpāṇī“ti yāni tāni tadanugatāni
T06srabhu_u:1238: nāmāni padāni vyañjanāni yāny adhipatiṃ kṛtvā yāni niśritya yāni pratiṣṭhāyāyaṃ puruṣapudgalo
T06srabhu_u:1243: sa punar ayaṃ nimittagrāho 'nuvyañjanagrāhaś cāsti yannidānam asya yadadhikaraṇaṃ yadadhipateyam asya pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anusravanti
T06srabhu_u:1244: asti yan na tannidānaṃ na tadadhikaraṇaṃ na tadadhipateyaṃ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anusravanti /
T06srabhu_u:1245: tatra yo 'yaṃ nimittagrāho 'nuvyañjanagrāhaś cāyoniśogrāhaḥ yannidānaṃ yadadhikaraṇaṃ yadadhipateyam asya pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anusravanti
T06srabhu_u:1246: tadrūpam asau nimittagrāham anuvyañjanagrāhaṃ ca parivarjayati //
T06srabhu_u:1250: mohasamutthāpitaṃ ca kāyaduścaritaṃ vāgduścaritaṃ manoduścaritam ima ucyante “pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ” //
T06srabhu_u:1253: tadālambanās tadālambanās tena cittamanovijñānena saṃprayuktāḥ kāyavāṅmanoduṣcaritasamutthāpakās te rāgadveṣamohā utpadyante gacchanti pratisaranti
T06srabhu_u:1257: evaṃ tāvan nimittagrāheṇānuvyañjanagrāheṇa ca ya utpadyate saṃkleśaś cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣu yāvan manovijñeyeṣu dharmeṣu,
T06srabhu_u:1258: so 'sya notpadyate nimittagrāham anuvyañjanagrāhaṃ ca parivarjayataḥ /
T06srabhu_u:1259: sacet punaḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣād vā kleśapracuratayā vā,
T06srabhu_u:1260: ekākino 'pi viharataḥ pūrvadṛṣṭāni cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇy adhipatiṃ kṛtvā,
T06srabhu_u:1263: tān utpannān nādhivāsayati prajahāti viśodhayati vyantīkaroti /
T06srabhu_u:1266: sa yeṣu rūpeṣu cakṣuḥ prerayitavyaṃ bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:1267: yeṣu śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñeyeṣu dharmeṣu manaḥ prerayitavyaṃ bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:1268: teṣu tathā prerayati yathā na saṃkliśyate /
T06srabhu_u:1269: evam anena tasmāt saṃkleśān mana-indriyaṃ rakṣitaṃ bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:1271: yeṣu punaś cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣu cakṣurindriyaṃ na prerayitavyaṃ bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:1272: yeṣu śrotraghrāṇajihvākāya manovijñeyeṣu dharmeṣu mana-indriyaṃ na prerayitavyaṃ bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:1273: teṣu sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā na prerayati /
T06srabhu_u:1285: tat sarvam ekadhyam abhisamkṣipya indriyasaṃvara” ity ucyate //
T06srabhu_u:1287: yārakṣitā ca smṛtis [dran pa la rtag 'grus byed pa bsgom pa gaṅ yin pa ste] tayā saṃvṛṇoti //
T06srabhu_u:1293: priyarūpāpriyarūpebhyo rūpebhyaḥ śabdebhyo yāvad dharmebhyo 'taḥ saṃvṛṇtoti //
T06srabhu_u:1296: yato 'dhikaraṇam eva pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anusravanti /
T06srabhu_u:1312: ārakṣitasmṛtir bhavati nipakasmṛtir iti cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati nānuvyañjanagrāhī,
T06srabhu_u:1313: yāvan manasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati nānuvyañjanagrāhī,
T06srabhu_u:1314: yato 'dhikaraṇaṃ eva pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anusravanti /
T06srabhu_u:1319: cakṣū rūpaṃ caivaṃ yāvan mano dharmāś cedam ucyate saṃvaraṇīyaṃ vastu //
T06srabhu_u:1322: smṛtyārakṣitamānaso bhavati samāvasthāvacāraka itīyam ucyate saṃvṛtiḥ //
T06srabhu_u:1323: sa khalv ayam indriyasaṃvaraḥ samāsato dvividhaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:1326: yena viṣayeṣv ādīnavaṃ paśyati no tu tam ādīnavaṃ vyapakarṣati prajahāti //
T06srabhu_u:1329: taṃ ca punar ādīnavaṃ vyāpakarṣati prajahāti //
T06srabhu_u:1330: tatra pratisaṃkhyānabalasaṃgṛhītenendriyasaṃvarena viṣayālambanaṃ kleśaparyavasthānaṃ notpādayati na saṃmukhīkaroti /
T06srabhu_u:1333: tatra bhāvanābalasaṃgṛhītenendriyasaṃvareṇa viṣayālambanaṃ ca kleśaparyavasthānaṃ notpādayati na saṃmukhīkaroti /
T06srabhu_u:1334: sarvadā sarvakālam āśrayasanniviṣṭaṃ cānuśayaṃ prajahāti samudghātayati //
T06srabhu_u:1335: ayaṃ viśeṣo 'yam abhiprāya idaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ pratisaṃkhyānabalasaṃgṛhītasya bhāvanābalasaṃgṛhītasya cendriyasaṃvarasya //
T06srabhu_u:1337: yaḥ punar bhāvanābalasaṃgṛhīta indriyasaṃvaraḥ sa vairāgyabhūmipatito veditavyaḥ //
T06srabhu_u:1348: yayā prajñayā kavaḍaṃkārasyāhārasyādīnavaṃ samanupaśyaty ādīnavadarśanena ca vidūṣayitvābhyavaharati //
T06srabhu_u:1350: yaduta yasyaiva kavaḍaṃkārasya paribhogānvayo vā vipariṇāmānvayo vā paryeṣaṇānvayo vā //
T06srabhu_u:1352: yathāpīhaikatyo yasmin samaya āhāram āharati varṇasaṃpannam api gandhasaṃpannam api
T06srabhu_u:1353: rasasaṃpannam api supraṇītam api tasya kavaḍaṃkāra āhāraḥ samanantarakṣipta evāsye
T06srabhu_u:1354: yadā dantayantravicūrṇitaś ca lālāvisaraviklinnaś ca bhavati lālāpariveṣṭitaś ca bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:1355: sa tasmin samaye kaṇṭhanālīpraluṭhitaś ca bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:1356: sa yāsau pūrvikā purāṇā manāpatā tāṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ vijahāti /
T06srabhu_u:1358: yasyāṃ ca vikṛtau vartamānaś charditakopamaḥ khyāti /
T06srabhu_u:1359: tadavasthaṃ cainaṃ saced ayaṃ bhoktā puruṣapudgalaḥ saced ākārato (Śbh I 118)
T06srabhu_u:1361: nāsya sarveṇa sarvam anyatrāpi tāvad avipariṇate,
T06srabhu_u:1363: kaḥ punar vādas tatra tadavastha iti /
T06srabhu_u:1364: ya ebhir ākārair anekavidhair anayānupūrvyā bhojanaparibhogam adhipatiṃ kṛtvā yāsau śubhā varṇanibhā antardhīyate,
T06srabhu_u:1368: tasya tam āhāram āhṛtavatas bhuktavato yadā vipariṇamati rātryā madhyame vā yāme,
T06srabhu_u:1370: tadā sa rudhiramāṃsasnāyvasthitvagādīny anekavidhāni bahunānāprakārāṇy asmin kāye 'śucidravyāṇi vivardhayati saṃjanayati /
T06srabhu_u:1371: [de dag las la la ni bśaṅ ba daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:1372: gci ba'i dṅos por yoṅs su 'ju bar 'gyur źiṅ /
T06srabhu_u:1374: yad asya divase śocayitavyaṃ ca bhavati tena ca yaḥ spṛṣṭo bhavati hasto vā pādo vā,
T06srabhu_u:1376: tad vijugupsanīyaṃ bhavaty ātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ ca /
T06srabhu_u:1377: tannidānāś cāsyotpadyante kāye bahavaḥ kāyikā ābādhāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:1394: pittabhagandara itīme cānye 'py evaṃbhāgīyāḥ kāye kāyikā ābādhā utpadyante /
T06srabhu_u:1406: yathāpīhaikatya āhārahetor āhāranidānaṃ śīte śītena hanyamānaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:1418: sacet te karmāntā vipadyante sa tannidānaṃ śocati,
T06srabhu_u:1426: sacet saṃpadyate sa tasyārakṣādhikaraṇahetos tīvram autsukyam āpadyate /
T06srabhu_u:1427: “kaccin me bhogā rājñā vāpahriyeraṃś caurair vā,
T06srabhu_u:1434: yas tān bhogān anayena vyasanam āpādayet” /
T06srabhu_u:1437: yathāpi tad āhāranidānam āhārādhikaraṇahetor mātā putrasyāvarṇaṃ bhāṣate /
T06srabhu_u:1446: vivādam āpannās tathodārā brāhmaṇakṣatriyagṛhapatimahāsālā āhārādhikaraṇahetor evaṃ vigṛhītā vivādam āpannāḥ,
T06srabhu_u:1453: yathāpi tad rājānaḥ kṣatriyā mūrddhābhiṣiktāḥ sveṣu grāma nigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣv asaṃtuṣṭā viharanta ubhayato vyūhakāni saṃgrāmānīkāni pratisaranti śaṃkhaiḥ kaṃpyamānaiḥ,
T06srabhu_u:1455: iṣubhiḥ kṣipyamāṇair vividhais te tatra bhrāntenāśvena sārdhaṃ samāgacchanti bhrāntena hastinā,
T06srabhu_u:1458: iṣubhiḥ śaktibhir vāpakṛttagātrā maraṇaṃ vā nigacchanti maraṇamātrakam vā duḥkham /
T06srabhu_u:1459: ayam ucyate 'tṛptikṛta ādīnava iti yo vā punar anyo 'py evaṃbhāgīyaḥ //
T06srabhu_u:1462: yathāpi tad rājñaḥ pauruṣeyā āvarodhikāni nagarāṇy anupraskandataḥ taptenāpi tailenāvasicyante,
T06srabhu_u:1467: iṣubhiḥ śaktibhiś cāpakṛttagātrā maraṇaṃ vā nigacchanti maraṇamātrakaṃ vā duḥkham /
T06srabhu_u:1468: ayam ucyate 'svātantryakṛta ādīnava iti yo vā punar anyo 'py evaṃbhāgīyaḥ //
T06srabhu_u:1470: yathāpi tad ekatyenāhāranidānaṃ prabhūtaṃ kāyena duścaritaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavaty upacitaṃ,
T06srabhu_u:1471: yathā kāyenaivaṃ vācā manasā sa ca yasmin samaya ābādhiko bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:1478: “kṛtaṃ bata me pāpaṃ na kṛtaṃ bata me puṇyaṃ kāyena vācā manasā,
T06srabhu_u:1479: so 'haṃ yā gatiḥ kṛtapāpānāṃ gatiṃ pretya gamiṣyāmī“ti vipratisārī kālaṃ karoti kālaṃ ca kṛtvā 'pāyeṣūpapadyate yaduta narakeṣu tiryakpreteṣu
T06srabhu_u:1485: evam asti punar asyāhārasya kācid anuśaṃsamātrā,
T06srabhu_u:1490: (Śbh I 126) evam asyāhārasthitiko 'yaṃ kāyḥ suciram api tiṣṭhañ ca varṣaśataṃ vā tiṣṭhati /
T06srabhu_u:1491: kiṃcid vā punar bhūyaḥ samyak parihriyamāṇaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:1493: tatra ye kāyasthitimātre pratipannāḥ na te supratipannāḥ,
T06srabhu_u:1494: ye kāyasthitimātrakeṇa saṃtuṣṭā na ca te susaṃtuṣṭā,
T06srabhu_u:1495: na ca punas ta āhārakṛtaṃ paripūrṇam anavadyaṃ anuśaṃsaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:1498: api tu tām eva kāyasthitiṃ niśritya brahmacaryaṃ samudāgamāya pratipannāḥ,

T06srabhu_u:2049: Ch.413a3 kena kāraṇena daksiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayati /
T06srabhu_u:2052: siṃhaḥ prāṇī sarveṣāṃ tiryagyonigatānāṃ prāṇināṃ vikrānta utsāhī dṛḍhaparākramaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2053: bhikṣur api jāgarikāyogānuyukta ārabdhavīryo viharati vikrānta utsāhī dṛḍhaparākramaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2054: atas tasya siṃhopamaiva śayyā pratirūpā bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:2057: tathā hi te sarva eva kusīdā hīnavīryā mandabalaparākramāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2058: (Śbh I 162) api tu dharmataiṣā yad dakṣiṇena pārśvena siṃhopamāṃ śayyāṃ kalpayato na tathā gātrāṇāṃ vikṣepo bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:2062: anyathā tu śayyāṃ kalpayato viparyayeṇa sarve doṣā veditavyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2064: pāde pādam ādhāya dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayati //
T06srabhu_u:2066: ālokanimittam anena sūdgṛhītaṃ bhavati sumanasikṛtaṃ sujuṣṭaṃ supratividdham /
T06srabhu_u:2067: tad eva manasikurvan sa prabhāsahagatena cittena śayyāṃ kalpayati /
T06srabhu_u:2068: suptasyāpi cāsya yena na bhavati cetaso 'ndhakārāyitatvam /
T06srabhu_u:2072: ye 'nena dharmāḥ śrutā bhavanti cintitā vā bhāvitā vā kuśalā arthopasaṃhitāḥ,
T06srabhu_u:2074: yayāsya suptasyāpi ta eva dharmā jāgrato tvābhilapanti,
T06srabhu_u:2075: teṣv eva ca dharmeṣu taccittaṃ bahulam anuvicarati /
T06srabhu_u:2076: iti yathāsmṛtyā yathāsmṛtaḥ kuśalacittaḥ śayyāṃ kalpayati,
T06srabhu_u:2080: suptasyāsya tathā smṛtasya yasmin samaye 'nyatamānyatamenopakleśena cetasaḥ saṃkleśo bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:2081: sa (Śbh I 164) utpadyamānam eva taṃ saṃkleśaṃ samyag eva prajānāti,
T06srabhu_u:2087: kathaṃ utthānasaṃjñām eva manasikurvan śayyāṃ kalpayati /
T06srabhu_u:2088: sa vīryasaṃpragṛhītaṃ cittaṃ kṛtvā śayyāṃ kalpayati /
T06srabhu_u:2091: no tu sarveṇa sarvaṃ middhāvakramaṇanimnaṃ cittaṃ karoti,
T06srabhu_u:2095: “aho batāhaṃ buddhānujñātāṃ jāgarikāṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā saṃpādayeyam” iti /
T06srabhu_u:2096: tasyāś ca saṃpādanārthaṃ bhrśaṃ ghanarasena prayogeṇa chandagato viharaty abhiyuktaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:2099: kuśalānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ bhāvanāyai dakṣo 'nalasa utthānasaṃpannaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2104: yenāyaṃ śaknoti laghu laghv evotthānakāla utthātuṃ,
T06srabhu_u:2106: dvitīyayotthānasaṃjñayā buddhānujñātāṃ siṃhaśayyāṃ kalpayaty anyūnām anadhikām /
T06srabhu_u:2108: smṛtisaṃpramoṣe saty uttaratrottaratra samādānāya prayukto bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:2109: evam utthānasaṃjñām eva manasikurvan śayyāṃ kalpayati //
T06srabhu_u:2111: sa rātryāḥ paścime yāme laghu laghv eva prativibudhya caṅkramaniṣadyābhyām āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaś cittaṃ pariśodhayatīti /
T06srabhu_u:2114: sa cāyam ālokasaṃjñī smṛtaḥ saṃprajānann utthānasaṃjñām eva manasikurvan rātyāḥ madhyamaṃ yāmaṃ sātirekaṃ praharaṃ middham avakrāmayitvā,
T06srabhu_u:2115: yasmim samaye vyuttiṣṭhate tatra tasmim samaye vyuttiṣṭhate karmaṇyakāyo bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:2117: yena nāsyottiṣṭhato dhandhāyitatvaṃ vā syād mandāyitatvaṃ vālasyakausīdyaṃ vā /
T06srabhu_u:2118: asati vā punas tasmin dhandhāyitatve mandāyitatva ālasyakausīdye laghu laghv evotthānaṃ bhavaty ābhogamātrāt /
T06srabhu_u:2119: caṅkramaniṣadyābhyāṃ āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaś cittasya pariśuddhiḥ pūrvavad veditavyā /
T06srabhu_u:2122: iha jāgarikāyogam anuyuktasya puruṣapudgalasya catvāri samyakkaraṇīyāni bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:2124: yāvaj jāgrati tāvat kuśalapakṣaṃ na riñcati,
T06srabhu_u:2133: nam gyi cha smad la mi ñal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pa'i skyes bu gaṅ zag gis yaṅ dag par bya ba ni bźi po de dag yin no /
T06srabhu_u:2134: ] itīmāni catvāri samyakkaraṇīyāny ārabhya bhagavatā śrāvakāṇāṃ jāgarikāyogānuyuktatā deśitā //
T06srabhu_u:2138: evaṃ rātryāḥ prathamayāmaṃ caṅkramaniṣadyābhyām āvaraṇiyebhyo dharmebhyaś cittaṃ pariśodhayatī“ty anena tāvat prathamaṃ samyakkaraṇīyam ākhyātam
T06srabhu_u:2139: yaduta yāvaj jāgrati tāvat kuśalapakṣaṃ na riñcati /
T06srabhu_u:2143: vihāraṃ praviśya dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayati /
T06srabhu_u:2144: pāde pādam ādhāye“ty anena dvitīyam samyakkaraṇīyam ākhyātam /
T06srabhu_u:2147: “ālokasaṃjñī smṛtaḥ saṃprajānann utthānasaṃjñām eva manasikurvan śayyāṃ kalpayatī“ty anena tṛtīyaṃ samyakkaraṇīyam ākhyātam /
T06srabhu_u:2151: “rātryāḥ paścime yāme laghu laghv eva prativibudhya,
