T06srabhu_u:2157: “ālokasaṃjñī smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan vyutthānasaṃjñām eva manasikurvan śayyāṃ kalpayatī“ty /
T06srabhu_u:2158: ato dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyām asaṃkliṣṭacitto middham avakrāmayati,
T06srabhu_u:2167: saṃprajanyena tasmāt kuśalād ālambanāc cyavamānaṃ saṃkliśyamānaṃ ca cittaṃ laghu laghv eva samyak prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:2168: evam asyābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyām asaṃkliṣṭacittasya śayyā bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:2171: ity ābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ kālena prativibudhyate,
T06srabhu_u:2191: grāmāntaraṃ vā kulaṃ vā kulāntaraṃ vā vihāraṃ vā vihārāntaraṃ vā /
T06srabhu_u:2194: grāmāntarād vā kulād vā kulāntarād vā vihārād vā vihārāntarād vā /
T06srabhu_u:2199: atra mayā punar nābhikramitavyam” iti samyag eva prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:2201: ayaṃ nābhikramaṇakāla” iti samyag eva prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:2215: tasyāsya pūrvaparikīrtiteṣu vastuṣv abhikramataḥ pratikramataś ca /
T06srabhu_u:2216: yad abuddhipūrvakam aprayatnapūrvakam acchandapūrvakam antarāle cakṣuṣā rūpadarśanam /
T06srabhu_u:2218: yat punar teṣūpasaṃkrāntapratikrāntasya buddhipūrvakaṃ prayatnapūrvakaṃ chandapūrvakaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpadarśanam /
T06srabhu_u:2219: tadyathā rājñāṃ rājamātrāṇāṃ naigamānāṃ jānapadānāṃ vā brāhmaṇānāṃ gṛhapatināṃ dhanināṃ śreṣṭhinām sārthavāhānām,
T06srabhu_u:2220: tadanyeṣāṃ bāhyakānāṃ layanānāṃ mārutānām avarakāṇāṃ prāsādānāṃ harmyatalānām iti /
T06srabhu_u:2221: yad vā punar anyeṣāṃ lokacitrāṇāṃ darśanam /
T06srabhu_u:2223: yat punar ālokitaṃ ca vyavalokitaṃ ca svalakṣaṇataḥ samyag eva prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:2224: yac cāvalokayitavyaṃ yac ca vyavalokayitavyaṃ tad api samyag eva prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:2225: yadālokayitavyaṃ yadā vyavalokayitavyaṃ tad api samyag eva prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:2226: yathālokayitavyaṃ yathā vyavalokayitavyaṃ tad api samyag eva (Śbh I 176) prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:2230: yac cālokayitavyaṃ vyavalokayitavyaṃ tad ālokayati vyavalokayati /
T06srabhu_u:2244: sa cet saṃmiñjitaprasāritaṃ svalakṣaṇataḥ samyag eva prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:2245: saṃmiñjayitavyaṃ prasārayitavyaṃ ca samyag eva prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:2246: yadā ca saṃmiñjayitavyaṃ yadā prasārayitavyaṃ tad api samyag eva prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:2247: yathā ca saṃmiñjayitavyaṃ yathā prasārayitavyaṃ tad api samyag eva prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:2252: yac ca saṃmiñjayitavyaṃ prasārayitavyaṃ saṃmiñjayati prasārayati /
T06srabhu_u:2253: yadā ca saṃmiñjayitavyaṃ prasārayitavyaṃ tadā saṃmiñjayati prasārayati /
T06srabhu_u:2254: yathā (Śbh I 178) ca saṃmiñjayitavyaṃ prasārayitavyaṃ tathā saṃmiñjayati prasārayati /
T06srabhu_u:2260: yat tāvad asya jyeṣṭaṃ cīvaraṃ ṣaṣṭikhaṇḍaṃ vā navatikhaṇḍaṃ vā,
T06srabhu_u:2263: tasya prāvaraṇaṃ paribhogaḥ samyag eva pariharaṇaṃ dhāraṇam ity ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:2264: yat punar asya madhyaṃ vā kanīyo vādhiṣṭhānikaṃ vā cīvaram atirekacīvaraṃ vā vikalpanārhaṃ vikalpitaṃ vā /
T06srabhu_u:2266: tasya prāvaraṇaṃ paribhogaḥ samyag eva pariharaṇaṃ dhāraṇam ity ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:2267: yat punar asyādhiṣṭānikam āyasaṃ vā mṛnmayaṃ vā bhaikṣabhājanam /
T06srabhu_u:2269: tasya paribhogaḥ samyag eva pariharaṇaṃ dhāraṇam ity ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:2270: sacet punar ayaṃ tāṃ saṃghāṭīṃ cīvaraṃ pātraṃ dhāraṇaṃ vā svalakṣaṇataḥ samyag eva prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:2271: yac ca saṃghāṭīcīvarapātradhāraṇaṃ kalpikam akalpikaṃ vā tad api samyag eva prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:2272: yadā ca saṃghāṭīcīvarapātradhāraṇaṃ dhārayitavyaṃ tad api samyag eva prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:2273: yathā ca dhārayitavyaṃ tad api samyag eva prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:2275: sa tena saṃprajanyena samanvāgataḥ sacet saṃghāṭīṃ cīvaraṃ pātraṃ dhārayamāṇo jānāti “dhārayāmī“ti /
T06srabhu_u:2277: yadā (Śbh I 180) ca dhārayitavyaṃ tadā dhārayati /
T06srabhu_u:2286: yaḥ kaścit piṇḍapātaparibhogaḥ sarvaṃ tad aśitam ity ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:2293: yad vā punar anyatamam ābhisaṃskārikam annaṃ vikṛtaṃ bhojyaṃ prāṇasaṃdhāraṇam /
T06srabhu_u:2297: tadyathā kṣīraṃ dadhi navanītam sarpis tailaṃ madhu phāṇitaṃ māṃsaṃ matsyā vaIIūrā lavaṇaṃ vanaphalaṃ vā bhakṣaprakāraṃ vā /
T06srabhu_u:2309: yac cāśitavyaṃ pātavyaṃ khāditavyaṃ svāditavyaṃ tad api samyag eva prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:2310: yadā cāśitavyaṃ pātavyaṃ khāditavyaṃ svāditavyaṃ tad api samyag eva prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:2311: yathā cāśitavyaṃ pātavyaṃ khāditavyaṃ svāditavyaṃ tad api samyag eva prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:2313: sa tena saṃprajanyena samanvāgato 'śnanaḥ pibamānaḥ khādamānaḥ svādayamānaḥ sa cej jānāty “aśnāmi pibāmi khādāmi svādayāmī“ti /
T06srabhu_u:2314: yac (Śbh I 182) cāśitavyaṃ pātavyaṃ khāditavyaṃ svāditavyaṃ tad aśnāti yāvat svādayati /
T06srabhu_u:2315: yadā cāśitavyaṃ yāvat svādayitavyaṃ tadāśnāti yāvat svādayati /
T06srabhu_u:2316: yathā cāśitavyaṃ yāvat svādayitavyaṃ tathāśnāti yāvat svādayati /
T06srabhu_u:2326: katamā gate sthite niṣaṇṇe śayite jāgrte bhāṣite tūṣṇīṃbhāve nidrāklamaprativinodanāyāṃ saṃprajānadvihāritā /
T06srabhu_u:2332: sahadhārmikāṇāṃ vā puratas tiṣṭhaty ācāryāṇām upādhyāyānāṃ gurūṇāṃ gurusthānīyānām /
T06srabhu_u:2334: yathāpīhaikatyo mañce vā pīṭhe vā tṛṇasaṃstarake vā saṃniviśati vā saṃniṣīdati vā,
T06srabhu_u:2339: yathāpīhaikatyo bahir vihārasya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṃ praviśya dakṣiṇena pārśvena siṃhaśayyāṃ kalpayati,
T06srabhu_u:2341: mañce vā pīṭhe vā tṛṇasaṃstarake vā,
T06srabhu_u:2342: araṇye vā vṛkṣamūle vā śunyāgāre vā /
T06srabhu_u:2344: yathāpīhaikatyo divā caṅkramaṇiṣadyābhyām āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaś cittaṃ pariśodhayati,
T06srabhu_u:2345: evaṃ rātryāḥ prathame yāme paścime yāme /
T06srabhu_u:2347: yathāpīhaikatyas tathā jāgarikāyogānuyukto 'nuddiṣṭāṃś ca dharmān (Śbh I 184)
T06srabhu_u:2349: tadyathā sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇam iti vistareṇa pūrvavat /
T06srabhu_u:2350: uddiṣṭeṣu ca dharmeṣu vacasā paricayaṃ karoti,
T06srabhu_u:2353: kālena kālam ālapati pratisaṃmodayati vijñaiḥ sabrahmacaribhiḥ sārdhaṃ tadanyair vā gṛhasthair yadutodyojanapariṣkārārtham /
T06srabhu_u:2355: yathāpīhaikatyo yathāśrutānāṃ yathā paryavāptānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vacasā parijitānām ekākī rahogato 'rthaṃ cintayati tulayaty upaparīkṣate /
T06srabhu_u:2356: pratisaṃlīno vā punar bhavaty adhyātmam eva cittaṃ sthāpayati /
T06srabhu_u:2357: saṃsthāpayaty avasthāpayaty upasthāpayati damayati śamayati vyupaśamayaty ekotīkaroti samādhatte vipaśyanāyāṃ vā yogaṃ koroti /
T06srabhu_u:2360: uṣṇena vā bādhyate śrānto vā bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:2363: sacet punar ayaṃ gataṃ yāvan nidrāklamavinodanāṃ tatsvalakṣaṇataḥ samyag eva prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:2364: yatra ca gantavyaṃ yāvan nidrāklamaḥ prativinodayitavyaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:2366: yadā ca gantavyaṃ yāvad yadā nidrāklamaḥ prativinodayitavyaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:2368: yathā ca gantavyaṃ bhavati yathā ca yāvan nidrāklamaḥ prativinodayitavyaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:2371: sa tena saṃprajanyena samanvāgato gacchan yāvan nidrāklamam (Śbh I 186)
T06srabhu_u:2374: yatra ca gantavyaṃ bhavati yatra ca yāvan nidrāklamaḥ prativinodhyitavyo bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:2375: tatra gacchati tatra yāvan nidrāklamaṃ prativinodayati /
T06srabhu_u:2376: yadā ca gantavyaṃ bhavati yadā ca yāvan nidrāklamaḥ prativinodayitavyo bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:2377: tadā gacchati tadā yāvan nidrāklamaṃ prativinodayati /
T06srabhu_u:2378: yathā ca gantavyaṃ bhavati yathā yāvan nidrāklamaḥ prativinodayitavyo bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:2379: tathā gacchati tathā yāvan nidrāklamaṃ prativinodayati /
T06srabhu_u:2384: yathāpīhaikatyo yaṃ yam eva grāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vopaniśritya viharati /
T06srabhu_u:2386: “mayā khalv ayaṃ grāmo vā nigamo vā piṇḍāyopasaṃkramitavyaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2387: piṇḍāya caritvā punar eva vihāraṃ pratiniṣkramitavyam /
T06srabhu_u:2388: santi punar atra kulāni grāme vā nagare vā yāni mayā nopasaṃkramitavyāni,
T06srabhu_u:2390: tadyathā ghoṣaṃ' pānāgāraṃ veśyaṃ rājakulaṃ caṇḍālakaṭhinam /
T06srabhu_u:2391: yāni vā punaḥ kulāny ekāntena pratihatāny apratyudāvartāni /
T06srabhu_u:2392: santi ca punaḥ kulāni yāni mayopasaṃkramitavyāni /
T06srabhu_u:2393: tadyathā kṣatriyamahāsālakulāni vā brāhmaṇamahāsalakulāni vā gṛhapatimahāsālakulāni vā naigamakulāni vā jānapadakulāni vā dhanikulāni vā śreṣṭhikulāni vā sārthavāhakulāni vā /
T06srabhu_u:2394: yāni vā kulāni mayopasaṃkramitavyāni tāni nātisāyam upasaṃkramitavyāni tāni vikālam /
T06srabhu_u:2399: tathā copasaṃkramitavyāni yathopasaṃkrāmann ahaṃ na bhrāntena hastinā sārdhaṃ samāgaccheyaṃ na bhrāntena rathena punaś caṇḍenāśvena na caṇḍayā gavā na caṇḍena kukkureṇa /
T06srabhu_u:2400: na gahanaṃ na kaṇṭakavāṭaṃ vā mardeyaṃ,
T06srabhu_u:2404: candropamaś ca kulāny upasaṃkrameyaṃ hrīmān apragalbho vyavakṛṣya kāyaṃ vyavakṛṣya cittaṃ na lābhakāmo na satkārakāmaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2405: yathā svena lābhena sucittaḥ sumanās tathā parasyāpi lābhena sucittaḥ sumanā anātmotkarṣy aparapaṃsako 'nukaṃpācitto dayācittaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2407: tat kuta etal labhyaṃ pravrajitena parakuleṣu yad dadatu me pare mā na dadatu,
T06srabhu_u:2408: yāvat tvaritaṃ mā dhandham iti vistareṇa /
T06srabhu_u:2409: upasaṃkramya ca me pratigrahe mātrā karaṇīyā /
T06srabhu_u:2410: na ca lābhahetoḥ kuhanā karaṇīyā lapanā naimittikatā naiṣpeṣikatā lābhena lābhaniścikīrṣatā karaṇīyā /
T06srabhu_u:2414: yāni ca rūpāṇi tatropasaṃkramatopasaṃkrāntena vā draṣṭavyāni bhavanti na tāny ekatyāni draṣṭavyāni tāni caikatyāni draṣṭavyāni /
T06srabhu_u:2415: tatra yāni na draṣṭavyāni teṣūtkṣiptacakṣuṣā bhavitavyaṃ susaṃvṛtendriyeṇa /
T06srabhu_u:2416: yāni punar draṣṭavyāni teṣu sūpasthitāṃ smṛtim upasthāpya /
T06srabhu_u:2418: tadyathā naṭo nartako hāsako lāsaka iti /
T06srabhu_u:2419: yad vā punar anyac cāraṇajātaṃ nṛtte vā gīte vā vādite vā pravṛttam /
T06srabhu_u:2420: tathā mātṛgrāmo viśeṣeṇa punaḥ śiśur udāravarṇo rañjanīya iti /
T06srabhu_u:2421: yāni ca punā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭāni brahmacaryopaghātāya brahmacaryāntarāyāya,
T06srabhu_u:2426: tadyathā jīrṇaṃ vā vṛddhaṃ vā mahaIIakaṃ vā khurukhurupraśvāsakāyaṃ purataḥprāgbhārakāyaṃ daṇḍam avaṣṭabhya pravepamānena kāyena,
T06srabhu_u:2427: ābādhikaṃ vā duḥkhitaṃ bāḍhaglānam ādhmātapādam ādhmātahastam ādhmātodaram ādhmātamukhaṃ pāṇḍukachavivarṇam,
T06srabhu_u:2428: dardrūlaṃ vā kacchūlaṃ vā kuṣṭhitaṃ vā duḥkhitahatagātram,
T06srabhu_u:2430: mṛtaṃ vā kālagatam ekāhamṛtaṃ vā dvyahamṛtaṃ vā saptāhamṛtaṃ vā,
T06srabhu_u:2432: gṛdhraih śvabhiḥ sṛgālair vividhair vā tiryagjātigataiḥ prāṇibhir bhakṣyamāṇam abhinirhriyamāṇaṃ vā /
T06srabhu_u:2433: mañca āropyopari vitānena prasāritena purataḥ pṛṣṭhataś ca mahājanakāyena rodamānena
T06srabhu_u:2434: krandamānena bhasmāvakīrṇapramuktakeśena tathā śokajātaṃ duḥkhajātaṃ paridevajātaṃ
T06srabhu_u:2436: yan “mayā draṣṭavyam” ity evaṃrūpāṇi cānyāni caivaṃbhāgīyāni rūpāṇi draṣṭavyāni,
T06srabhu_u:2437: yāni brahmacaryānugrahāya kuśalānāṃ ca vitarkāṇāṃ samudācārāya saṃvartante //
T06srabhu_u:2439: na kāyapracālakam upasaṃkramitavyaṃ na bāhupracālakaṃ na śīrṣapracālakaṃ noccagghikayā na hastāvalagnikayā na soḍhaukikayā /
T06srabhu_u:2454: na hastiśuṇḍakaṃ na tālavṛntakaṃ na nāgaphaṇakaṃ na kulmāṣapiṇḍikaṃ cīvaraṃ prāvaritavyam /
T06srabhu_u:2457: nānāstīrṇe pṛthivīpradeśe prapāte prāgbhāre pātraṃ sthāpayitavyam //
T06srabhu_u:2468: “vihāragatenāpi me tebhyaḥ kulebhyaḥ pratyāgatena pratiniṣkrāntena divā vā rātrau vā prātipaudgalike caṅkrame caṅkramitavyaṃ,
T06srabhu_u:2475: kālena kālaṃ gacchatā kālena kālaṃ tiṣṭhatā /
T06srabhu_u:2476: tathā sve vihāre sve parigaṇe svakyāṃ kuṭikāyām uddeśikāyāṃ prātipaudgalikāyāṃ,
T06srabhu_u:2478: tathā mañce vā pīṭhe vā tṛṇasaṃstaraṇe vā,
T06srabhu_u:2479: araṇye vā vṛkṣamūle vā śūnyāgāre vā niṣattavyaṃ,
T06srabhu_u:2487: rātryāḥ paścime yāme laghu laghv eva prativibudhya //
T06srabhu_u:2489: bhāṣye vā svādhyāyakriyāyāṃ vā yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:2494: ye nābhijñāyai na saṃbodhāya na nirvāṇāya saṃvartante /
T06srabhu_u:2495: ye vā punar dharmās tathāgatabhāṣitā gambhīrā gambhīrābhāsāḥ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktā
T06srabhu_u:2496: idaṃpratyayatāpratītyasamutpādānulomās te satkṛtyodgṛhītavyāḥ dṛḍhaṃ ca sthiraṃ ca
T06srabhu_u:2500: te ca punar dharmā vacasā suparijitāḥ kartavyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2501: na ca saṅgaṇikāyā atināmayitavyam na karmārāmatayā na bhāṣyārāmatayā,
T06srabhu_u:2502: kālena ca kalam upasthitayā smṛtyā vijñasya sabrahmacāriṇa ālapitavyāḥ saṃlapitavyāḥ pratisaṃmodayitavyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2508: [gnam por smra ba daṅ] praśāntabhāṇinā ca,
T06srabhu_u:2510: tūṣṇīṃbhāvena ca ye pāpakā akuśalā vitarkā na (Śbh I 204)
T06srabhu_u:2513: [mṅon pa'i ṅa rgyal can du mi bya ba daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2514: khyad par rtogs pa cuṅ zad tsam daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2515: ṅan ṅon tsam gyi bar ma dor sgyid lug par mi bya ba daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2516: bsaṃ par mi bya ba'i gnas rnams yoṅs su spaṅ bar bya ba daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2517: dus dus su źi gnas daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2518: lhag mthoṅ la brtson par bya ba daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2519: spoṅ ba la dga' ba daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2520: rgyun du chud par bya ba la brtson pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2521: gus par bya ba la brtson par bya'o sñam pa daṅ //
T06srabhu_u:2523: bdag dpyid ka'i tsha bas gduṅs pa'm /
T06srabhu_u:2527: ruṅ ba'i bya ba cuṅ zad byed pas yoṅs su ṅal ba'i rgyu daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2528: yoṅs su ṅal ba'i gźi las dus ma yin par gñid kyi sñom pa skye bar gyur na /
T06srabhu_u:2529: de'i don du ci nas kyaṅ myur ba myur ba kho nar de med par 'gyur źiṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2530: dus yun riṅ por dge ba'i phyogs ñams par mi 'gyur ba daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2531: dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad du mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir /
T06srabhu_u:2532: yud tsam źig gñid bsaṅ bar bya ste /
T06srabhu_u:2533: der yaṅ bdag gi sgo bcad pa'm /
T06srabhu_u:2534: dge sloṅ yod na ltar gźug pa'm /
T06srabhu_u:2536: 'dul ba'i cho gas chos gos kyis bciṅs la /
T06srabhu_u:2538: gñid bsaṅ bar bya'o sñam du sems pa yin te /
T06srabhu_u:2539: des na de'i gñid kyi sñom pa rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du med par 'gyur ro //
T06srabhu_u:2542: rgyu ba daṅ spyod pa las brtsams nas /
T06srabhu_u:2544: spyod pa ñid kyi go rims yin te /
T06srabhu_u:2545: dan po kho nar de ltar tshul bźin yid la byed pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2546: śes rab daṅ ldan pa'i sems mṅon par 'du byed pa gaṅ yin pa de ni de'i śes bźin źes bya'o //
T06srabhu_u:2547: de ltar śes bźin daṅ ldan pas rgyu ba daṅ spyod pa thams cad mi ñuṅ bar sgrub par byed pa gaṅ yin pa de ni śes bźin du spyod pa ñid ces bya'o
T06srabhu_u:2556: lhuṅ bzed bcaṅ ba gaṅ yin pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2560: myaṅs pa gaṅ yin pa de la śes bźin du spyod pa gaṅ yin pa de ni groṅ du rgyu ba daṅ ldan pa la śes bźin du spyod pa ñid ces bya'o //
T06srabhu_u:2567: mi smra ba gaṅ yin pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2568: gñid kyi sñom pa bsaṅ ba gaṅ yin pa de la śes bźin du spyod pa gaṅ yin pa de ni gtsug lag khaṅ na spyod pa daṅ ldan pa la śes bźin du spyod pa ñid ces bya ste /
T06srabhu_u:2569: de ni re źig śes bźin du spyod pa ñid kyi rnam par dbye ba rgyas pa yin par rig par bya'o //
T06srabhu_u:2571: don mdor bsdu ba gaṅ źe na /
T06srabhu_u:2572: rgyu ba daṅ ldan pa'i las rnam pa lṅa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2573: spyod pa daṅ ldan pa'i las rnam pa lṅa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2574: rgyu ba daṅ ldan pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2575: spyod pa daṅ ldan pa'i las la śes bźin du spyod pa rnam pa bźi gaṅ yin pa de ni don mdor bsdu ba źes bya'o //
T06srabhu_u:2576: de la rgyu ba daṅ ldan pa'i las rnam pa lṅa gaṅ źe na /
T06srabhu_u:2581: ñiṅ lag thams cad kyi las daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2585: de ni rgyu ba daṅ ldan pa'i las rnam pa lṅa źes bya'o //
T06srabhu_u:2586: de la re źig ldog pa daṅ 'gro ba źes bya ba gaṅ gsuṅs pa des ni rgyu ba daṅ ldan pa'i lus kyi las bstan to //
T06srabhu_u:2588: rnam par bltas pa” źes gaṅ gsuṅs pa des ni rgyu ba daṅ ldan pa'i mig gi las bstan to //
T06srabhu_u:2590: brkyaṅ ba” źes bya ba gaṅ gsuṅs pa des ni rgyu ba daṅ ldan pa'i yan lag daṅ ñiṅ lag thams cad kyi las bstan to //
T06srabhu_u:2593: lhuṅ bzed bcaṅ ba” źes gaṅ gsuṅs pa des ni rgyu ba daṅ ldan pa'i chos gos daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2594: lhuṅ bzed kyi las bstan to //
T06srabhu_u:2598: myaṅs pa” źes gaṅ gsuṅs pa des ni rgyu ba daṅ ldan pa'i bsod sñoms kyi las bstan to //
T06srabhu_u:2599: spyod pa daṅ ldan pa'i las rnam pa lṅa gaṅ źe na /
T06srabhu_u:2606: de ni spyod pa daṅ ldan pa'i las rnam pa lṅa źes bya'o //
T06srabhu_u:2607: de la re źig “soṅ ba daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2609: 'dug pa” źes gaṅ gsuṅs pa des ni spyod pa daṅ ldan pa'i lus kyi las bstan to //
T06srabhu_u:2610: “smra ba” źes gaṅ gsuṅs pa des ni spyod pa daṅ ldan pa'i ṅag gi las bstan to //
T06srabhu_u:2613: gñid kyi sñom pa bsaṅ ba” źes gaṅ gsuṅs pa des ni spyod pa daṅ ldan pa'i yid kyi las bstan to //
T06srabhu_u:2614: “mi ñal ba” źes gaṅ gsuṅs pa des ni spyod pa daṅ ldan pa'i ñin mo'i las daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2617: ṅag gi las kyaṅ bstan to //
T06srabhu_u:2618: “ñal ba” źes gaṅ gsuṅs pa des ni spyod pa daṅ ldan pa'i mtshan mo'i las daṅ yid kyi las kho nar yaṅ bstan te /
T06srabhu_u:2619: de ni spyod pa daṅ ldan pa'i las rnam pa lṅa yin par rig par bya'o //
T06srabhu_u:2621: de la rgyu ba daṅ ldan pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2622: spyod pa daṅ ldan pa'i las la śes bźin du spyod pa rnam pa bźi gaṅ źe na /
T06srabhu_u:2623: daṅ po kho nar “las 'di lta bu źig brtsam mo” źes rgyu ba'i las sam /
T06srabhu_u:2624: spyod pa'i las śig rtsoṃ par byed pa na /
T06srabhu_u:2625: las de ñid la dran pa ñe bar gźag ciṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2627: las de dran pas yoṅs su zin ciṅ bag yod pas kyaṅ yoṅs su zin pas /
T06srabhu_u:2628: gźi gaṅ la phyogs gaṅ du /
T06srabhu_u:2629: dus gaṅ gi tshe ji sñed cig rnam pa gaṅ gis ji ltar brtag par bya ba'i gźi de la /
T06srabhu_u:2631: de sñed cig rnam pa des de ltar rtog par byed ciṅ rab tu śes par byed pa ste /
T06srabhu_u:2632: de ltar rtog par byed ciṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2633: rab tu śes par byed pa na tshe 'di ñid la kha na ma tho ba med pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2634: lhuṅ ba med pa (Śbh I 210) daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2636: yid la gcags pa med pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2637: rjes su gduṅ ba med par 'gyur ba daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2638: tshe phyi ma la yaṅ kha na ma tho ba med ciṅ lus źig ste /
T06srabhu_u:2639: śi ba'i 'og tu ṅan son ṅan 'gro log par ltuṅ ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2640: ma thob pa thob par bya ba'i tshogs kyi rgyu byas par 'gyur ba yin no //
T06srabhu_u:2641: de ni śes bźin du spyod pa ñid kyi don mdor bsdus pa yin te /
T06srabhu_u:2642: rnam par dbye ba rgyas par sṅa ma gaṅ yin pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2643: don mdor bsdu ba gaṅ yin pa de ni śes bźin du spyod pa ñid ces bya'o //
T06srabhu_u:2646: de la dge ba'i bśes gñen gaṅ źe na /
T06srabhu_u:2647: rgyu rnam pa brgyad kyis rnam pa thams cad yoṅs su rdzogs pa'i dge ba'i bśes gñen yin par rig par bya'o //
T06srabhu_u:2649: 'di ltar 'di na la la daṅ po kho nar tshul khrims la gnas pa yin pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2650: maṅ du thos pa yin pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2651: rtog pa daṅ ldan pa yin pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2652: rjes su sñiṅ brtse ba daṅ ldan pa yin pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2653: yid yoṅs su mi skyo ba yin pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2654: bzod pa daṅ ldan pa yin pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2655: mi 'jigs pa daṅ ldan pa yin pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2656: tshig gi bya ba daṅ ldan pa yin no //
T06srabhu_u:2658: de la ji ltar na tshul khrims la gnas pa yin źe na /
T06srabhu_u:2659: rgyas par sṅa ma bźin du tshul khrims daṅ ldan par gnas pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2660: so sor thar ba'i sdom pas bsdams pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2661: dge sbyoṅ gi lam 'dod pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2663: bdag dul bar bya ba daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2664: bdag źi bar bya ba daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2665: bdag yoṅs su mya ṅan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir źugs pa yin te /
T06srabhu_u:2666: de ltar na tshul khrims la gnas pa yin no //
T06srabhu_u:2667: ji ltar na maṅ du thos pa yin źe na /
T06srabhu_u:2668: des chos tshaṅs par spyod pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2677: yoṅs su byaṅ ba gaṅ dag yin pa de dag mṅon par brjod pas mṅon par rjod par byed pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:2678: evaṃrūpā anena bahavo dharmā udgṛhītā bhavanti dhṛtā vacasā parijitā manasā cānvīkṣitā dṛṣṭyā supratividdhāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2682: lābhī bhavaty anityasaṃjñāyā anitye duḥkhasaṃjñāyā duḥkhe 'nātmasaṃjñāyā āhāre pratikūlasaṃjñāyāḥ
T06srabhu_u:2687: lābhī bhavati prathamasya dhyānasya dvitīyasya tṛtīyasya caturthasyākāśānantyāyatanavijñānānantyāyatanākiṃcanyāyatananaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasya
T06srabhu_u:2688: maitryāḥ karuṇāyā muditāyā upekṣāyāḥ srotaāpattiphalasya sakṛdāgāmiphalasyānāgāmiphalasya
T06srabhu_u:2690: śakto bhavati pratibalaś ca pareṣāṃ tribhiḥ prātihāryair avavaditum,
T06srabhu_u:2697: arthakāmo bhavati hitakāmaḥ sukhakāmaḥ sparśakāmo yogakṣemakāmaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2701: ayāsī catasṛnāṃ parṣadāṃ dharmadeśanāyai dakṣo bhavaty analasa utthānasaṃpanna ārabdhavīryajātīyaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2710: pragāḍheṣv api bandhaneṣu rodhaneṣu tāḍaneṣu kutsaneṣu tarjaneṣu chedaneṣv ātmāparādhī bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:2714: iti vimānito 'pi vivarṇito 'pi vijugupsito 'pi na vikṛtim āpadyate /
T06srabhu_u:2716: kṣamaś ca bhavati śītasyoṣṇasya jighatsāyāḥ pipāsāyā daṃśamaśakavātātapasarīsṛpasaṃsparśānām /
T06srabhu_u:2717: parato duruktānām durāgatānāṃ vacanapathānām utpannānāṃ śārīrikāṇāṃ vedanānāṃ duḥkhānāṃ tīvrāṇāṃ kharāṇāṃ kaṭukānām amanaāpānāṃ prāṇahāriṇīnāṃ kṣamo bhavaty adhivāsanajātīyaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2721: na cāsya śāradyahetoḥ śāradyanidānaṃ bhayaṃ vākrāmati samāviśati /
T06srabhu_u:2722: nāpi kakṣābhyāṃ svedo mucyate romakūpebhyo vā /
T06srabhu_u:2735: sa ebhir aṣṭābhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ samanvāgataś codako bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:2743: bhūtena nābhūtena kālena nākālenārthopasaṃhitena nānarthopasaṃhitena ślakṣṇena na paruṣeṇa mitravattayā na dveṣāntareṇa /
T06srabhu_u:2746: āpattiṃ vā smārayati dharmaṃ vārthaṃ vā /
T06srabhu_u:2748: yathāpi tadāpattim adhyāpadyamāno na smarati tam enaṃ smārayati,
T06srabhu_u:2756: yathāpi tacchrutānugṛhitān dharmān ekākī na smarati,
T06srabhu_u:2758: tadyathā sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇam iti vistareṇa pūrvavan na smarati tam enaṃ smārayati /
T06srabhu_u:2763: yathāpi tadarthaṃ vismarati tam enaṃ smārayati /
T06srabhu_u:2768: yac cāpi kuśalam arthopasaṃhitaṃ brahmacaryopasaṃhitaṃ cirakṛtaṃ cirabhāṣitam apy anusmārayitā bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:2771: prāvivekye pratisaṃlayane yoge manasikāre śamathavipaśyanāyāṃ kālena kālam ānulomikam avavādaṃ pravartayati /
T06srabhu_u:2772: kālena ca kālaṃ tatpratisaṃyuktāṃ kathāṃ karoti /
T06srabhu_u:2773: tadyathā cetovinivaraṇasāṃpreyagāminīṃ śīlakathāṃ vā samādhikathāṃ vā prajñākathāṃ
T06srabhu_u:2774: vā vimuktikathāṃ vā vimuktijñānadarśanakathāṃ vālpecchākathāṃ vā saṃtuṣṭikathāṃ vā
T06srabhu_u:2775: prahāṇakathāṃ virāgakathāṃ nirodhakathām apacayakathām asaṃsargakathām daṃpratyayatāpratītyasamutpādānuIomāṃ kathāṃ karoti /
T06srabhu_u:2778: dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsane samanuśāsako (Śbh I 222) bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:2779: ācāryo vopādhyāyo vā sahadhārmiko vā gurur vā gurusthānīyo vānyatamānyatamasminn adhikaraṇe 'trisṛtaṃ vyatikrāntaṃ viditvā,
T06srabhu_u:2780: kālena kālam avasādayati daṇḍakarmānuprayacchati pravāsayati cainaṃ /
T06srabhu_u:2781: punar api ca dharmeṇa samaye pratisaṃstarasāmīcīsaṃjñapitiṃ pratigṛhṇāti saṃgrāhakaś ca bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:2782: karaṇīye cākaraṇīye vādhyācārānadhyācārād adhyācīrṇe 'nadhyācīrṇe ca śāsty anuśāsti /
T06srabhu_u:2787: kāmeṣv ādīnavaniḥsaraṇān vyavadānapakṣān dharmān vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati /
T06srabhu_u:2788: kālena kālaṃ sāmutkarṣikīṃ caturāryasatyapratisaṃyuktāṃ kathāṃ kathayati /
T06srabhu_u:2789: duḥkhaṃ vārabhya samudayaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā mārgaṃ vā /
T06srabhu_u:2790: sattvaparipākāya vā sattvavyavadānāya vā saddharmasya vā cirasthitaye /
T06srabhu_u:2791: yuktaiḥ padavyañjanaiḥ sahitair ānulomikair ānucchavikair aupāyikaiḥ pratirūpaiḥ pradakṣiṇair nipakasyāṅgasaṃbhāraiḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2793: tāṃ ca punaḥ kathāṃ kālena karoti,
T06srabhu_u:2794: satkṛtyānupūrvam anusaṃdhim anusahitaṃ harṣayan rocayan toṣayann utsāhayann anavasādayaṃs
T06srabhu_u:2795: ca yuktāṃ sahitām avyavakīrṇāṃ dhārmikīṃ yathāparṣan maitracitto hitacitto 'nukampācitto
T06srabhu_u:2799: yaś caibhir aṣṭābhir aṅgaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:2800: evaṃ ca kālena kālaṃ codako bhavati smārako 'vavādako 'nuśāsako dharmadeśakah,
T06srabhu_u:2805: saced ayaṃ mitrasuhṛdanukampaka ādita eva hitakāmo bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:2807: tac ca punar hitasukhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
T06srabhu_u:2809: pratibalas ca bhavaty upāyakuśalaḥ yad utāsyaiva hitasukhasya samudāgamāyopasaṃhārāya /
T06srabhu_u:2810: dakṣas ca bhavaty analasa utthānasaṃpanna ārabdhavīryajātīyaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:2811: yad uta tam eva hitasukhopasaṃhāram ārabhya /
T06srabhu_u:2816: yaś ca pūrvako vistaravibhāgo yaś cāyaṃ samāsārtha iyam ucyate kalyāṇamitratā //
T06srabhu_u:2818: saddharma ucyate buddhaiś ca buddhaśrāvakaiś ca sadbhiḥ samyaggataiḥ satpuruṣair ākhyāto deśita uttāno vivṛtaḥ saṃprakāśitaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2820: tadyathā sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇam iti vistareṇa pūrvavad dvādaśāṅgavacogatam saddharma ity ucyate //
T06srabhu_u:2822: yat tatra tatra bhagavatā tāṃs tān vineyāṃs tāni tāni vineyacāritāni cārabhya skandhapratisaṃyuktā vā kathā kṛtā,
T06srabhu_u:2831: sā ca kathā saṃgītikāraiḥ parigṛhya śāsanacirasthitaye yathāyogam (Śbh I 228)
T06srabhu_u:2833: yad uta teṣāṃ teṣām arthānāṃ sūcanāya kuśalānām arthopasaṃhitānāṃ brahmacaryopasaṃhitānām /
T06srabhu_u:2845: api tu pādopanibandhena dvipadā vā tripadā vā catuṣpadā vā pañcapadā vā ṣaṭpadā vā /
T06srabhu_u:2848: yat pudgalasya nāma gotram aparikīrtayitvānuddiśya bhāṣitam āyatyāṃ vā saddharmacirasthitaye śāsanacirasthitaye (Śbh I 230) ca /
T06srabhu_u:2851: yat pudgalasya nāma gotraṃ parikīrtayitvoddiśya bhāṣitam,
T06srabhu_u:2852: yac ca kiṃcid vinayapratisaṃyuktaṃ sotpattikaṃ sanidānaṃ prātimokṣasūtram /
T06srabhu_u:2856: yena dṛṣṭāntena yasya prakṛtasyārthasya vyavadānaṃ bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:2862: yad atītam adhvānam upādāya tatra tatra bhagavataś cyutyupapādeṣu bodhisattvacaryā duṣkaracaryākhyātā /
T06srabhu_u:2865: yatra bodhisattvānāṃ mārgo deśyate 'nuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye daśabalānāvaraṇajñānasamudāgamāya /
T06srabhu_u:2869: yatra buddhānāṃ ca buddhaśrāvakāṇāṃ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ ca bhikṣuṇīnāṃ ca śikṣamāṇānāṃ śrāmaṇerāṇāṃ
T06srabhu_u:2870: śrāmaṇerikāṇām upāsakānām upāsikānāṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇāś ca tadanyaprativiśiṣṭāś
T06srabhu_u:2874: sarvamātṛkābhidharmaḥ sūtrāntaniṣkarṣaḥ sūtrāntavyākhyānam upadeśa ity ucyate //
T06srabhu_u:2887: tac caitad dvādaśāṅgavacogataṃ piṭakatrayasaṃgṛhītaṃ sadbhiḥ samyaggatair deśitaṃ saddharma ity ucyate //
T06srabhu_u:2902: yathāpīhaikatyas tān eva yathāśrutān dharmān ekākī rahogataḥ,
T06srabhu_u:2904: ātmacintāṃ sattvacintāṃ lokacintāṃ sattvānāṃ karmavipākacintāṃ dhyāyināṃ dhyāyiviṣayaṃ buddhānāṃ buddhaviṣayaṃ varjayitvā,
T06srabhu_u:2914: rūpam ucyate daśa rūpīṇy āyatanāni yac ca dharmāyatanaparyāpannaṃ rūpam sa ca rūpaskandhaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2920: uttarottaraprabhedena yena vā punar asyāḥ saṃkhyāgaṇanākārāyāś cintāyā apramāṇaḥ praveśanayo veditavyaḥ //
T06srabhu_u:2931: tatrotpattyapekṣā yair hetubhir yaiḥ pratyayaiḥ skandhānāṃ prādurbhāvo bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:2932: tasyāṃ skandhotpattau te hetavas te pratyayā apekṣyante /
T06srabhu_u:2933: yair nāmakāyapadakāyavyañjanakāyaiḥ skandhānāṃ prajñaptir bhavati, tasyām (Śbh I 238)
T06srabhu_u:2936: yā cotpattyapekṣā yā ca prajñaptyapekṣā sā yuktir yoga upāyaḥ skandhotpattaye skandhaprajñaptaye /
T06srabhu_u:2939: yad utpannānāṃ skandhānāṃ svena hetunā svena pratyayena tasmiṃs tasmin svakāryakaraṇe viniyogaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2946: yad vā punar anyad apy evaṃbhāgīyaṃ,
T06srabhu_u:2947: tatra tatra dharmāṇām anyonyaṃ kāryakaraṇe prati yuktir yoga upāyaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2951: pratītyasamutpannā duḥkhāḥ śūnyā anātmāna iti tribhiḥ pramāṇair upaparīkṣate /
T06srabhu_u:2953: ebhis tribhiḥ pramāṇair upapattiyuktaiḥ satāṃ hṛdayagrāhakair vyavasthāpanā sādhanā kriyate /
T06srabhu_u:2954: yad uta skandhānityatāyā vā pratītyasamutpannatāyā vā duḥkhatāyā vā (Śbh I 240)
T06srabhu_u:2960: kena kāraṇena kharalakṣaṇā pṛthivī dravalakṣaṇā āpa uṣṇalakṣaṇaṃ tejaḥ samudīraṇalakṣaṇo vāyuḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2961: kena kāraṇenānityāḥ skandhāḥ kena kāraṇena śāntaṃ nirvāṇam iti /
T06srabhu_u:2970: yaiva cāsau dharmatā saivātra yuktir yoga upāyaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2974: sarvatraiva ca dharmataiva pratisaraṇaṃ dharmataiva yuktiḥ /
T06srabhu_u:2977: evaṃ catasṛbhir yuktibhiḥ skandhadeśanopaparīkṣyate yāvat punar anyā kācid deśaneti //
T06srabhu_u:2979: yaivam ābhyāṃ dvābhyām ākārābhyāṃ gaṇanāsaṃkhyākārayā ca yuktyupaparīkṣaṇākārayā ca samyagupanidhyāpanā tasyās tasyā deśanāyāḥ sā cintā //
T06srabhu_u:2988: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ pūrvam eva kṛtapuṇyo na bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:2989: so 'kṛtatvāt puṇyānāṃ na lābhī bhavati kālena kālam ānulomikānāṃ jīvitapariṣkārāṇām,
T06srabhu_u:2997: yenāsyābhīkṣṇaṃ vāto vā kupyati pittaṃ vā śleṣmaṃ vā,
T06srabhu_u:2999: bhojanaguruko bhavati bahvartho bahukṛtyo gaṇasaṃnipātabahulo bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:3000: karmārāmo vā bhāṣyārāmo vā nidrārāmaḥ saṅgaṇikārāmaḥ saṃsargārāmaḥ prapañcārāmaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3002: ity evaṃbhāgīyā antarāyā adhyātmam upādāya veditavyāḥ //
T06srabhu_u:3006: yato na labhate kālena kālam ānulomikīm avavādānuśāsanīṃ,
T06srabhu_u:3008: yatrāsya vāsaṃ kalpayato divā vauvilako bhavati prabhūtaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:3010: tīvrakaṭukaś ca vātātapasaṃsparśo manuṣyād amanuṣyād api bhayam /
T06srabhu_u:3017: yenāntarāyeṇa samavahitena saṃmukhībhūtenāśakto bhavaty apratibalaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ kuśalapakṣaprayoge /
T06srabhu_u:3020: (Śbh I 248) abhīkṣṇam asya vāto vā kupyate pittaṃ va śleṣmaṃ vā viṣūcikā vāsya kāye saṃtiṣṭhate /
T06srabhu_u:3021: api tv asya daśaty ahir vṛściko vā śatapadī vā manuṣyo vainaṃ viheṭhayaty amanuṣyo vā /
T06srabhu_u:3026: bahvartho bahukṛtyo bahukaraṇīyaḥ karmārāmaratiṃ rato bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:3029: śaktaḥ pratibalaḥ san prāvivekye prahāṇe pratisaṃlayane bhāvanāyām uddeśasvādhyāyamātrakeṇa saṃtuṣṭaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3031: styānamiddhaparyavasthitaḥ kusīdajātīyo nidrāsukhaṃ pārśvasukhaṃ śayanasukhaṃ ca svīkaroti /
T06srabhu_u:3034: corakathāṃ vānnakathāṃ vā pānakathāṃ vā vastrakathāṃ vā veśyākathāṃ vā vīthīkathāṃ vā janapadamahāmātrākhyānakathāṃ vā lokākhyānakathāṃ vā samudrākhyānakathāṃ vā /
T06srabhu_u:3036: tatra cābhirato bhavaty abhīkṣṇañ ca gaṇasaṃnipātabahulo bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:3037: teṣu teṣv adhikaraṇeṣu vyākṣiptamānaso bhavati vyākulamānasaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3040: phrad pa rnams daṅ 'bral bar mi 'dod pa daṅ] /
T06srabhu_u:3044: yaiḥ samavahitaiḥ saṃmukhībhūtair na sukaraṃ bhavaty araṇyavanaprasthāni prāntāni śayanāsanāny adhyāvasitum,
T06srabhu_u:3045: araṇyāni vā vṛkṣamūlāni vā śūnyāgārāṇi vā //
T06srabhu_u:3047: tadyathā pratisaṃlayanam ucyate śamatho vipaśyanā ca /
T06srabhu_u:3052: yathāsya pramattasya styānamiddhaṃ vā cittaṃ paryavanahati,
T06srabhu_u:3056: yadrūpeṇa cādeśavāsena manuṣyakṛto vāmanuṣyakṛto vā parataḥ saṃghaṭṭo bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:3062: tatrātmasaṃpragraho yathāpi tad “aham asty uccakulaḥ pravrajito 'līnaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:3063: anye ca bhikṣavo na tathe“ty ātmānam utkarṣayati saṃpragṛhṇāti,
T06srabhu_u:3069: anye ca bhikṣavo na tathe“ty ātmānam utkarṣayati saṃpragṛhṇāti,
T06srabhu_u:3071: sa ātmānaṃ saṃpragṛhṇān ye te bhavanti bhikṣavaḥ sthavirā rātrijñā abhyavacīrṇabrahmacaryās tān na kālena kālaṃ paripṛcchati paripraśnī karoti
T06srabhu_u:3072: te cāsya na kālena kālam avivṛtāni ca sthānāni vivṛṇvanti,
T06srabhu_u:3074: na ca gambhīram arthapadaṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca prajñayā pratividhya saṃprakāśayanti yāvad eva jñānadarśanasya viśuddhaye /
T06srabhu_u:3075: evamasya sa ātmasaṃpragraha āntarāyiko bhavati yaduta vipaśyanāyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3076: punar aparam alpamātrakasyāvaramātrakasya jñānadarśanamātrakasya sparśavihāramātrakasya lābhī bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:3079: sa ātmānaṃ saṃpragṛhṇaṃs tāvatā saṃtuṣṭo bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:3081: evam asyāntarāyaḥ kṛto bhavaty ātmasaṃpragraheṇa yaduta vipaśyanāyāḥ //
T06srabhu_u:3082: capalo vā punar anupaśāntendriyo bhavaty uddhatendriya unnatendriyaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3086: yena vipaśyanāṃ na pūrayati na viśodhayati /
T06srabhu_u:3087: evam asya cāpalyam antarāyo bhavati yaduta vipaśyanāyā iti //
T06srabhu_u:3095: ayaṃ ca punar antarāyasya samāsārtha iti //
T06srabhu_u:3096: yaś cāyaṃ samāsārtho yaś ca pūrvako vistaravibhāgas tad ekadhyam abhisaṃkṣipyāntarāya ity ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:3099: ya eṣām antarāyāṇām abhāvo vigamo 'saṅgatir asamavadhanam /
T06srabhu_u:3102: yad dānam anavadyaṃ cittālaṃkārārthaṃ cittapariṣkārārthaṃ yogasaṃbhārārtham uttamārthasya prāptaye dadāti /
T06srabhu_u:3114: yasya svakaṃ dīyate tac ca dātukāmasya nādātukāmasya,
T06srabhu_u:3150: yeṣām asyāntike bhavati prema vā gauravaṃ vā /
T06srabhu_u:3151: bhaktivādo vā alaptakāḥ saṃstutakāḥ sapriyakāś ca bhavantīti /
T06srabhu_u:3165: ye vā punar anye 'py evaṃbhāgīyāḥ ima ucyante viśiṣṭāḥ //
T06srabhu_u:3168: samāsataḥ sattvasaṃkhyātam asattvasaṃkhyātaṃ ca vastu dadāti /
T06srabhu_u:3171: yad vā punar anyad apy evaṃbhāgīyaṃ vastu /
T06srabhu_u:3172: adhyātmaṃ vā punar upādāya karacaraṇaśiromāṃsarudhiravasādīny anuprayacchati /
T06srabhu_u:3173: idam api sattvasaṃkhyātaṃ dānaṃ yatra bodhisattvabodhāḥ saṃdṛśyante /
T06srabhu_u:3174: asmiṃs tv arthe nedaṃ dānam abhipretam /
T06srabhu_u:3177: arhati ca tān sattvān pareṣāṃ pratipādayitum /
T06srabhu_u:3179: na taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ pare manāṃsi pradūṣayanti /
T06srabhu_u:3180: ye ca sattvāḥ pareṣu pratipāditās te na vyāpāditā bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:3187: yad vā punar anyad apy evaṃbhāgīyaṃ ratnaṃ vā hiraṇyaṃ vā rūpyaṃ vā vastraṃ vā bhāṇḍopaskaraṃ vā gandhajātaṃ vā mālyajātaṃ vā /
T06srabhu_u:3191: yat kiṃcid bhojyaṃ vā peyaṃ vā /
T06srabhu_u:3212: yad vā punar anyad apy evaṃbhāgīyam /
T06srabhu_u:3218: yac ca tatsamutthāpitaṃ kāyakarma vākkarma deyavastuparityāgāya svasantāne vā parasantāne vā /
T06srabhu_u:3225: kālena dadāti yathaitat pareṣām upayogyaṃ syāt /
T06srabhu_u:3229: yena na pare sāvadyā bhavanti, nātmā /
T06srabhu_u:3231: vinīya mātsaryamalaṃ saṃnidhimalaṃ ca dānaṃ dadāti /
T06srabhu_u:3232: pūrvam eva dānāt sumanā dadaṃś cittaṃ prasādayati dattvā cāvipratisārī bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:3241: ebhir ākārair ato 'sya gṛhiṇo vā pravrajitasya vā cittālaṃkārārthaṃ cittapariṣkārārthaṃ yogasaṃbhārārtham uttamārthasya prāptaye tad dānam,
T06srabhu_u:3276: yathā śāstary evaṃ dharme sabrahmacāriṣu śikṣāyām avavādānuśāsanyāṃ pratisaṃstare 'pramāde samādhau /
T06srabhu_u:3286: arogajātīyaḥ samayā pācanyā grahaṇyā samanvāgato bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:3302: kartā bhavati vijñānāṃ sabrahmacāriṇāṃ kāyena vaiyāpṛtyam /
T06srabhu_u:3309: ahastasaṃvācikaḥ pratibalaḥ subhāṣitadurbhāṣitānāṃ dharmāṇām artham ājñātum iti /
T06srabhu_u:3315: yāvadbhir guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhavaty alpecchatām ādiṃ kṛtvā,
T06srabhu_u:3322: itaretareṇa cīvarapiṇḍapātena śayanāsanena tuṣṭo bhavati, saṃtuṣṭaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3323: so 'labdhvā cīvaraṃ lūhaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā notkaṇṭhati,
T06srabhu_u:3325: labdhvā ca punar araktaḥ paribhuṅkte 'sakta iti vistareṇa pūrvavat /
T06srabhu_u:3330: na tu pare, tadyathā dārakā vā manuṣyā veti,
T06srabhu_u:3331: ye vā punar anye 'pi ke cid /
T06srabhu_u:3333: pare cainaṃ dāyakadānapatayo duṣpoṣyam iti paśyeran /
T06srabhu_u:3355: ta ete piṇḍapātaṃ cīvaraṃ śayanāsanam ārabhya dvādaśakā dhutaguṇā bhavanti trayodaśakā vā /
T06srabhu_u:3360: ['dris pa'i khyim dag nas] yathālabdhaṃ yathopasaṃpannaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṅkte //
T06srabhu_u:3363: veśmānuveśya kulāni bhikṣitvā paryaṭitvā yathālabdhaṃ yathopasaṃpannaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṅkte /
T06srabhu_u:3364: no tv uccaiḥ śuṇḍāṃ praṇidhāya kulāny upasaṃkrāmati /
T06srabhu_u:3366: tatra piṇḍapātikatvam aviśeṣeṇārabhya dvādaśa bhavanti prabhedaṃ punar ārabhya trayodaśa //
T06srabhu_u:3368: ekasminn āsane niṣaṇṇo yāvat paribhoktavyaṃ tāvat paribhuṅkte /
T06srabhu_u:3369: vyutthitaś ca punas tasmād āsanān na paribhuṅkte /
T06srabhu_u:3375: yataś ca punar jānīte “na me 'ta uttari bhojanena kṛtyaṃ (Śbh I 278)
T06srabhu_u:3384: trayāṇāṃ cīvarāṇām atirekam uttaraṃ na dhārayati /
T06srabhu_u:3387: yat kiṃcic cīvaraṃ dhārayati tricīvaraṃ vā,
T06srabhu_u:3393: yac cīvaraṃ parair muktaṃ bhavaty ucchiṣṭaṃ choritaṃ rathyāyāṃ vā,
T06srabhu_u:3424: mañce vā pīṭhe vā tṛṇasaṃstare vā niṣadyayā kālam atināmayati /
T06srabhu_u:3425: no tu mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā kuḍyaṃ vā vṛkṣamūlaṃ vā tṛṇasaṃstaraṃ vā niśritya pṛṣṭhaṃ vā pārśvaṃ vā dadāti /
T06srabhu_u:3429: yasmin tṛṇasaṃstare vā parṇasaṃstare vā śayyāṃ kalpayati /
T06srabhu_u:3430: tṛṇasaṃstaraṃ vā parṇasaṃstaraṃ vā sakṛd yathaiva saṃstṛtaṃ bhavati tathaiva śayyāṃ kalpayati /
T06srabhu_u:3431: no tu punar vikopayaty abhisaṃskaroti ca /
T06srabhu_u:3434: tadyathā, ūrṇā vā karpāsaṃ vā yasmin samaye dhutaṃ bhavati saṃkṛttaṃ vicūrṇaṃ tasmin samaye mṛdu ca bhavati laghu ca karmaṇyaṃ ca,
T06srabhu_u:3436: evam evehaikatyasya piṇḍapātapātarāgeṇa piṇḍapāte cittaṃ saktaṃ bhavati saṃsaktaṃ,
T06srabhu_u:3437: cīvararāgeṇa cīvare cittam saktaṃ bhavati saṃsaktam,
T06srabhu_u:3438: śayanāsanarāgeṇa śayanāsane cittaṃ saktaṃ bhavati saṃsaktam /
T06srabhu_u:3459: pratiśrayarāgasya prahāṇāya vṛkṣamūlika ābhyavakāśikaḥ śmāśāniko bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:3460: api ca śmāśānikatvaṃ mithunarāgasya prahāṇāya bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:3471: tatra pratigrahe mātrāṃ jānāti evaṃ mātrajño bhavati //
T06srabhu_u:3473: uccakulapravrajito vā sann āḍhyakulapravrajito vābhirūpo vā darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko bahuśruto vākkaraṇenopetaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3474: anyatamānyatamasya vā jñānamātrakasya darśanamātrakasparśavihāramātrakasya lābhī sann etena nātmānam utkarṣayati parāṃś ca paṃsayati /
T06srabhu_u:3475: [chos daṅ rjes su mthun pa'i chos 'ba' źig bsgrub par bya ba kho na yin par rig nas /
T06srabhu_u:3492: sa cāyuṣmān kṣamo bhavati śītasyoṣṇasya jighatsāyāḥ pipāsāyā daṃśamaśakavātātapasarīsṛpasaṃsparśāṇām,
T06srabhu_u:3494: śārīrikāṇāṃ vedanānāṃ duḥkhānāṃ tīvrāṇāṃ kharāṇāṃ kaṭukānām amana-āpānāṃ prāṇahāriṇīnāṃ kṣamo bhavaty adhivāsanajātīyaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3497: yathāpi tan maitreṇa kāyakarmaṇā samanvāgato bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:3507: sa ebhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ saṃrañjanīyair dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ priyakaraṇair gurukaraṇair avivādakaraṇaiḥ,
T06srabhu_u:3520: sa ebhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgato dharmakāmo bhavati, guṇakāmaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3526: sa “yat tad bhavati kavitaṃ kāveyaṃ citrākṣaraṃ cihnapadavyañjanaṃ lokāyatapratisaṃyuktam,
T06srabhu_u:3536: “mā me tato nidānaṃ bhaviṣyaty anekaparyāyeṇa vyākṣepād vyāpāro vā teṣāṃ vā punar vipariṇāmād anyathībhāvād utpatsyante śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsā” iti /
T06srabhu_u:3541: “mā me 'tonidānam utpadyate dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ sāṃparāyikaṃ ve“ti /
T06srabhu_u:3552: āpannaś ca laghu laghv eva yathādharmaṃ (Śbh I 294)
T06srabhu_u:3554: itikaraṇīyeṣu ca dakṣo bhavaty analasaḥ svayaṃkārī /
T06srabhu_u:3561: na ca svayaṃdṛṣṭiparāmarśasthāyī bhavaty asamañjasagrāhī duḥpratiniḥsargamantrī /
T06srabhu_u:3562: sa ebhir guṇair yukta evaṃvihārī evaṃśikṣamāṇaḥ śramaṇālaṃkāreṇālaṃkṛtaḥ śobhate /
T06srabhu_u:3563: tadyathā kaś cid eva puruṣo yuvā maṇḍanajātīyaḥ kāmopabhogī snātānulipto 'vadātavastraprāvṛto vividhair bhūṣaṇair alaṃkṛtaḥ śobhate,
T06srabhu_u:3564: tadyathā harṣair vā keyūrair vāṅgulimudrikayā vā jātarūparajatamālayā vā /
T06srabhu_u:3565: evam eva sa ebhir vividhaiḥ śramaṇālaṃkārair guṇair alaṃkṛto bhāsate tapati virocate /
T06srabhu_u:3577: laukikaṃ caiva vairāgyaṃ tathā lokottareṇa ca /
T06srabhu_u:3578: tayoś caiva hi saṃbhāro bhūmir naiṣkramyasaṃjñitā // [4]
T06srabhu_u:3582: tatra kati pudgalā ye 'syāṃ naiṣkramyabhūmau yathādeśitāyāṃ yathāparikīrtitāyāṃ niṣkrāmanti /
T06srabhu_u:3630: yasya pudgalasya mṛdūnīndriyāṇi dhandhavāhīni mandavāhīni jñeye vastunīti pūrvavat /
T06srabhu_u:3634: yasya pudgalasya tīkṣṇānīndriyāṇy adhandhavāhīni bhavanty amandavāhīni jñeye vastunīti pūrvavat /
T06srabhu_u:3638: yena pudgalena pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu rāga āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:3639: sa tena hetunā tena pratyayenaitarhi rañjanīye vastuni tīvrarāgaś ca bhavaty āyatarāgaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:3642: yena pudgalena dveṣaḥ pūrvam anyāsu (Śbh II 6)
T06srabhu_u:3644: tena ca hetunā tena pratyayenaitarhi dveṣaṇīye vastuni tīvradveṣaś ca bhavaty āyatadveṣaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:3647: yena pudgalena pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu moha āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:3648: tena ca hetunā tena pratyayenaitarhi mohanīye vastuni tīvramohaś ca bhavaty āyatamohaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:3651: yena pudgalena pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu māna āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:3652: tena ca hetunā tena ca pratyayenaitarhi mananīye vastuni tīvramānaś ca bhavaty āyatamānaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:3655: yena pudgalena pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu vitarka āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:3656: tena ca hetunā tenaiva pratyayenaitarhi vitarkasthānīye vastuni tīvravitarkaś ca bhavaty āyatavitarkaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:3660: yena pudgalena pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu rāgo dveṣo moho māno vitarko nāsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3661: na caite dharmā ādīnavato dṛṣṭā vidūṣitāḥ saṃtīritāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3662: sa tena hetunā tena pratyayena rañjanīye vā vastuni dveṣaṇīye mohanīye manyanīye vitarkanīye na tīvrarāgo bhavati nāpy āyatarāgaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3663: na cāsya na samudācarati rāgo yaduta tena vastuna /
T06srabhu_u:3664: yathā rāga evaṃ dveṣo moho māno vitarkaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3667: yena pudgalena pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu na rāga āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3668: ādīnavataś ca bahulaṃ dṛṣṭo bhavati vidūṣitaḥ saṃtīritaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3669: sa tena hetunā tena pratyayenaitarhi rañjanīye vastuni samavahite saṃmukhībhūte 'dhimātre pracura ulbaṇe dhandhaṃ rāgam utpādayati /
T06srabhu_u:3671: yathā rāga evaṃ dveṣo moho māno vitarko veditavyaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3692: no tūdgṛhīteṣu dharmeṣu paryavāpteṣu cintiteṣu tuliteṣūpaparīkṣiteṣu svayam eva śakto bhavati pratibalas tān dharmān bhāvanākāreṇānusartum /
T06srabhu_u:3696: yaḥ pudgalo yathāśruteṣu dharmeṣu paryavāpteṣu cintiteṣu tuliteṣūpaparīkṣiteṣu svayam eva śakto bhavati pratibalas tān dharmān bhāvanākāreṇānusartum
T06srabhu_u:3703: sa eva śraddhānusārī pudgalo yasmin samaye śrāmaṇyaphalam adhigacchati sparśayati sākṣātkaroti parato 'vavādānuśāsanīm āgamya,
T06srabhu_u:3707: sa eva dharmānusārī pudgalo yasmin samaye śrāmaṇyaphalam adhigacchati sparśayati sākṣātkaroti parato nāvavādānuśāsanīm āgamya,
T06srabhu_u:3710: yo 'yaṃ pudgalo 'nulomapratilomam aṣṭau vimokṣān samāpadyate vyuttiṣṭhate ca /
T06srabhu_u:3712: na ca sarveṇa sarvam āsravakṣayam anuprāpnoti /
T06srabhu_u:3715: yo 'yaṃ pudgalas trayāṇām saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt satkāyadṛṣṭeḥ śīlavrataparāmarśasya vicikitsāyāḥ srota-āpanno bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:3716: avinipātadharmā niyataḥ saṃbodhiparāyaṇaḥ saptakṛdbhavaparamaḥ saptakṛtvo devāṃś ca manuṣyāṃś ca saṃdhāvya saṃsṛtya duḥkhasyāntaṃ karoti /
T06srabhu_u:3721: rigs nas rigs su skye ba ni gñis te /
T06srabhu_u:3722: lha'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:3723: mi'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba'o //
T06srabhu_u:3724: de la lha'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba ni /
T06srabhu_u:3725: lha rnams kyi rigs nas rigs su mtshams sbyar źiṅ /
T06srabhu_u:3726: 'khor nas sdug bsṅal mthar byed pa gaṅ yin pa'o /
T06srabhu_u:3727: de la mi'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba ni /
T06srabhu_u:3728: mi rnams kyi rigs nas rigs su mtshams sbyar źiṅ /
T06srabhu_u:3729: 'khor nas sdug bsṅal mthar byed pa gaṅ yin pa ste] /
T06srabhu_u:3732: yasya sakṛdāgāminaḥ pudgalasyānāgāmiphalapratipannakasya kāmāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānām adhimātramadhyakleśāḥ prahīṇā bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:3734: sakṛc ca kāmāvacaradevabhavam abhinirvartya tatraiva parinirvāti /
T06srabhu_u:3742: tadyathā parīttaḥ śakalikāgnir utpanna eva parinirvāti /
T06srabhu_u:3746: no tu yenopapattibhavas tenādyāpy upanato bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:3747: tadyathā, ayoguḍānāṃ vāyaḥsthālānāṃ vā dīptāgnisaṃprataptānām ayoghanair hanyamānānām ayaḥprapāṭikotpataty eva parinirvāti /
T06srabhu_u:3749: upanataś ca punar anupapanna eva parinirvāti /
T06srabhu_u:3751: ta ime trayo 'ntarāparinirvāyiṇaḥ pudgalā ekadhyam abhisaṃkṣipyāntarāparinirvāyī pudgala ity ucyate //
T06srabhu_u:3761: yo 'bhisaṃskāreṇa prayatnena khedena mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya tatropapannaḥ parinirvāti /
T06srabhu_u:3765: yaḥ pudgalo 'nāgāmī prathame dhyāna upapannaḥ sa na tatrastha eva parinirvāti /
T06srabhu_u:3766: api tu tasmāc cyavitvottarottaram upapattyāyatanam abhinirvartayan yāvad akaniṣṭhān vā devān gacchati,
T06srabhu_u:3771: yo mṛdvindriyagotraḥ pudgalo laukikebhyo dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihīyate /
T06srabhu_u:3777: no tu teṣāṃ teṣāṃ rātriṃdivasānāṃ kṣaṇalavamuhūrtānām atyayād atyarthaṃ viśeṣāya paraiti /
T06srabhu_u:3786: yaḥ pudgalaḥ sarveṇa sarvam āsravakṣayam anuprāpnoti /
T06srabhu_u:3787: no tv aṣṭau vimokṣān kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharati /
T06srabhu_u:3790: yaḥ pudgalaḥ sarveṇa sarvam āsravakṣayam anuprāpnoti /
T06srabhu_u:3792: tasya kleśāvaraṇāc ca cittaṃ muktaṃ bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:3814: bhikṣur bhikṣuṇī śikṣamāṇā śrāmaṇeraḥ śrāmaṇery upāsaka upāsikā ca //
T06srabhu_u:3826: iha rāgacaritaḥ pudgalaḥ parītte sarvanihīne rañjanīye vastuni ghanam adhimātraṃ rāgaparyavasthānam utpādayati /
T06srabhu_u:3828: tac ca punā rāgaparyavasthānaṃ saṃtatyā cirakālam avasthāpayati /
T06srabhu_u:3831: no tu śaknoti rañjanīyān dharmān abhibhavitum /
T06srabhu_u:3835: nātyarthaṃ pareṣāṃ viheṭhanajātīyo yaduta kāyena vācā durvivejyaś ca bhavati duḥsaṃvejyaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:3841: sahiṣṇuś ca bhavaty upakaraṇeṣu pariṣkāreṣu lolupajātīyas tadgurukaś ca,
T06srabhu_u:3842: saumanasyabahulaś ca bhavaty ānandībahulo vigatabhṛkuṭir uttānamukhavarṇaḥ smitapūrvaṃgamaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3843: ity evaṃbhāgīyāni rāgacaritasya pudgalasya liṅgāni veditavyāni //
T06srabhu_u:3846: dveṣaṇīye vastuni parīttena pratighavastunimittena ghanaṃ prabhūtaṃ pratighaparyavasthānam utpādayati /
T06srabhu_u:3848: tasya ca pratighaparyavasthānasya dīrghakālaṃ saṃtatim avasthāpayati /
T06srabhu_u:3851: no tu dveṣaṇīyān dharmāñ chaknoty abhibhavitum /
T06srabhu_u:3854: atyarthaṃ ca pareṣāṃ viheṭhanajātīyo bhavati yaduta kāyena vācā /
T06srabhu_u:3859: na dṛḍhakarmanto na sthirakarmanto na dṛḍhavrato na sthiravrataḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3865: krūrāśayaś caṇḍaś ca bhavaty ādāśī pratyakṣaravādī so 'lpamātram apy uktaḥ sann abhiṣajyate,
T06srabhu_u:3872: ity evaṃbhāgīyāni dveṣacaritasya pudgalasya liṅgāni veditavyāni //
T06srabhu_u:3875: iha mohacaritaḥ pudgalo mohasthānīye vastuni parītte ghanaṃ prabhūtaṃ mohaparyavasthānam utpādayati /
T06srabhu_u:3877: dīrghaṃ ca kālaṃ tasya mohaparyavasthānasya saṃtatim avasthāpayati /
T06srabhu_u:3880: no tu mohanīyān dharmāñ chaknoty abhibhavitum /
T06srabhu_u:3900: ity evaṃbhāgīyāni mohacaritasya pudgalasya liṅgāni veditavyāni //
T06srabhu_u:3902: iha mānacaritaḥ pudgalo mānasthānīye vastuni parītte 'pi ghanaṃ prabhūtamṃ mānaparyavasthānam utpādayati /
T06srabhu_u:3908: no tu mānasthānīyān dharmāñ chaknoty abhibhavitum /
T06srabhu_u:3909: uddhatendriyaś ca bhavaty unnatendriyaś ca kāyamaṇḍanānuyogam anuyuktaś ca bhavati/
T06srabhu_u:3910: adhimātram unnatāṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣate nāvanatām /
T06srabhu_u:3911: mātāpitṛjñātigurusthānīyānāṃ ca na kālena kālaṃ yathānurūpām apacitiṃ kartā bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:3920: ity evaṃbhāgīyāni mānacaritasya pudgalasya liṅgāni veditavyāni //
T06srabhu_u:3922: iha vitarkacaritaḥ pudgalo vitarkasthānīye vastuni parītte 'pi ghanaṃ prabhūtaṃ vitarkaparyavasthānam utpādayati /
T06srabhu_u:3927: no tu vitarkasthānīyān dharmāñ chaknoty abhibhavitum /
T06srabhu_u:3928: asthirendriyaś ca bhavati capalendriyaś cañcalendriyo vyākulendriyaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3939: ity evaṃbhāgīyāni vitarkacaritasya pudgalasya liṅgāni veditavyāni /
T06srabhu_u:3945: tatra yo 'yaṃ pudgalaḥ śrāvakayāne kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ sa syāc chrāvakagotraḥ,
T06srabhu_u:3948: tatra yo 'yaṃ pudgalaḥ pratyekāyāṃ bodhau kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ so 'pi syāt pratyekabuddhagotraḥ,
T06srabhu_u:3951: tatra yo 'yaṃ pudgalo mahāyāne kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ so 'pi syāc chrāvakagotraḥ,
T06srabhu_u:3954: tatra yo 'yaṃ śrāvakagotraḥ pudgalaḥ pratyekāyāṃ bodhāv anuttarāyāṃ vā samyaksaṃbodhau kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:3955: sa śrāvakagotratvād avaśyam ante kāle (Śbh II 34)
T06srabhu_u:3958: tatra bhavaty eṣāṃ pudgalānāṃ praṇidhānasaṃcāraḥ praṇidhānavyatikaraḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3961: asmiṃs tv arthe śrāvakayānapraṇidhānāḥ śrāvakagotrāś caite pudgalā veditavyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:3964: eṣāṃ yathoddiṣṭānāṃ yathāparikīrtitānāṃ pudgalānāṃ catasṛbhiḥ pratipadbhir niryāṇaṃ bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:3970: tatra mṛdvindriyasya pudgalasya mauladhyānālābhino yā pratipad iyam ucyate duḥkhā dhandhābhijñā /
T06srabhu_u:3971: tatra tīkṣṇendriyasya pudgalasya mauladhyānālābhino yā pratipad iyam ucyate duḥkhā kṣiprābhijñā /
T06srabhu_u:3972: tatra mṛdvindriyasya pudgalasya mauladhyānalābhino yā pratipad iyam ucyate sukhā dhandhābhijñā /
T06srabhu_u:3973: tatra tīkṣṇendriyasya pudgalasya mauladhyānalābhino yā pratipad iyam ucyate sukhā kṣiprābhijñā /
T06srabhu_u:3984: ye pratipannakamārge vartante te pratipannakās teṣāṃ pratipannakamārgeṇa vyavasthānam /
T06srabhu_u:3989: no yaḥ pudgalaḥ śraddhānusāreṇa prayuktaḥ sa śraddhānusārī /
T06srabhu_u:3990: yo dharmeṣu aparapratyayavinayānusāreṇa prayuktaḥ sa dharmānusārī /
T06srabhu_u:3993: tadyathā kāyasākṣy aṣṭau vimokṣān kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharati /
T06srabhu_u:3994: na ca sarveṇa sarvam āsravakṣayam anuprāpto bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4017: tadyathā samayavimuktasyārhato yo bhavyo dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇāya /
T06srabhu_u:4019: akopyadharmakasyārhato yo na bhavyo dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇāya /
T06srabhu_u:4025: ubhayatobhāgavimuktas tv arhan kleśāvaraṇāc ca vimuktaḥ samāpattyāvaraṇāc ca /
T06srabhu_u:4028: ebhiḥ prabhedair yathoddiṣṭair yathoddiṣṭānāṃ pudgalānāṃ yathākramaṃ vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam //
T06srabhu_u:4050: parikalpitaṃ vopādāya jñeyavastusabhāgaṃ pratibimbam samāhitabhūmikair vipaśyanākārair vipaśyati,
T06srabhu_u:4076: adhimucyate tad eva jñeyaṃ vastv adhimucyate /
T06srabhu_u:4077: tasya tasmin samaye pratyakṣānubhāvika ivādhimokṣaḥ pravartate jñeyavastuni /
T06srabhu_u:4078: na taj jñeyaṃ vastu pratyakṣībhūtaṃ bhavati samavahitaṃ saṃmukhībhūtam /
T06srabhu_u:4079: na ca punar anyat tajjātīyaṃ dravyam /
T06srabhu_u:4080: api tv adhimokṣānubhavaḥ sa tādṛśo manaskārānubhavaḥ samāhitabhūmikaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:4081: yena tasya jñeyasya vastuno 'nusadṛśaṃ tad bhavati pratibhāsam /
T06srabhu_u:4082: yena tad ucyate jñeyavastusabhāgaṃ pratibimbam iti /
T06srabhu_u:4083: yad ayaṃ yogī santīrayaṃs tasmin prakṛte jñeye vastuni parīkṣye guṇadoṣāvadhāraṇaṃ karoti /
T06srabhu_u:4087: ihāyaṃ yogī pratibimnanimittam udgṛhya na punar vipaśyati,
T06srabhu_u:4092: api tu tad evālambanam amukto śamathākāreṇa tac cittaṃ śamayati /
T06srabhu_u:4093: yaduta navākārayā cittasthityādhyātmam eva cittaṃ sthāpayati,
T06srabhu_u:4111: tac ca pratibimbaṃ pratibimbam ity ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:4113: tiṅ ṅe 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi yul daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:4116: yid la byed pa'i rten daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:4117: naṅ du rnam par rtog pa'i lus daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:4118: snaṅ brñan źes kyaṅ bya ste] /
T06srabhu_u:4119: itīmāni tasya jñeyavastusabhāgasya pratibimbasya paryāyanāmāni veditavyāni //
T06srabhu_u:4137: iti yā cālambanasya yāvadbhāvikatā yā ca (Śbh II 48)
T06srabhu_u:4138: yathāvadbhāvikatā tad ekadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya vastuparyantatety ucyate //
T06srabhu_u:4140: yad asya yogina āsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayād bahulīkārānvayāc chamathavipaśyanāyā yah pratibimbālambano manaskāraḥ sa paripūryate /
T06srabhu_u:4143: āśrayaparivṛtteś ca pratibimbam atikramya tasminn eva jñeye vastuni nirvikalpaṃ pratyakṣaṃ jñānadarśanam utpadyate /
T06srabhu_u:4148: tāny etāni bhavanti catvāry ālambanavastūni sarvatragāni sarveṣv ālambaneṣv anugatāni /
T06srabhu_u:4151: api caitad ālambanam śamathapakṣyaṃ vipaśyanāpakṣyaṃ sarvavastukam bhūtavastukaṃ,
T06srabhu_u:4154: yat tāvad t āha “savikalpaṃ pratibimbam” itīdam atra vipaśyanapakṣyasya /
T06srabhu_u:4155: yat punar āha “nirvikalpaṃ pratibimbam” itīdam atra śamathapakṣyasya /

T06srabhu_u:4163: bhikṣur yogī yogācāra ālambane cittam upanibadhnāti. katamasminn ālambane cittam upanibadhnātī“ti /
T06srabhu_u:4164: “kathaṃ punar ālambane cittam upanibaddhaṃ sūpanibaddhaṃ bhavati” //
T06srabhu_u:4171: tena hi śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru, bhāṣiṣye /
T06srabhu_u:4172: iha, revata, bhikṣur yogī yogācāraś caritaṃ vā viśodhayitukāmaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:4180: bhikṣur yogī yogācāro rāgacarita eva sann aśubhālambane cittam upanibadhnāti /
T06srabhu_u:4186: sa bhikṣur yogī yogācāro vitarkacarita eva sann ānāpānasmṛtau (Śbh II 52)
T06srabhu_u:4190: bhikṣuḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ svalakṣaṇe saṃmūdha ātmasattvajīvajantupoṣapudgalavastusaṃmūḍhaḥ skandhakauśalye cittam upanibadhnāti /
T06srabhu_u:4196: rūpebhyo vā vairāgyaṃ kartukāmo rūpāṇām audārikatva ārūpyaśāntatāyāṃ ca cittam upanibadhnāti /
T06srabhu_u:4203: bhikṣur yogī yogacāro 'nurūpa ālambane cittam upanibadhnāti //
T06srabhu_u:4205: bhikṣur yogī yogācāraḥ pratirūpa ālambane cittam upanibadhnāti /
T06srabhu_u:4206: iha revata, bhikṣur yad yad eva jñeyaṃ vastu vicetukāmo bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:4208: tac ca tena pūrvam eva dṛṣṭaṃ vā bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:4209: śrutaṃ vā mataṃ vā vijñātaṃ vā /
T06srabhu_u:4210: sa tad eva dṛṣṭam adhipatiṃ kṛtvā śrutaṃ mataṃ vijñātam adhipatiṃ kṛtvā samāhitabhūmikena manaskāreṇa manasikaroti /
T06srabhu_u:4212: sa na tad eva jñeyaṃ vastu samavahitaṃ saṃmukhībhūtaṃ paśyaty api tu tatpratirūpakam asyotpadyate tatpratibhāsaṃ vā,
T06srabhu_u:4215: pratismṛtamātraṃ vā yadālambanam ayaṃ bhikṣur yogī yogācāraḥ kālena kālaṃ cittam saṃśamayati,
T06srabhu_u:4219: bhikṣur yogī yogācāraḥ pratirūpa ālambane cittam upanibadhnāti //
T06srabhu_u:4221: bhikṣur yogī yogācāraḥ samyag evālambane cittam upanibadhnāti /
T06srabhu_u:4223: bhikṣur yogī yogācāra ālambane cittam upanibadhnāti yāvad anena jñeyaṃ jñātavyaṃ bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:4226: bhikṣur yogī yogācāraḥ samyag evālambane cittam upanibadhnāti //
T06srabhu_u:4230: bhikṣur yogī yogācāra evam ālambane samyak prayujyamānaḥ sātatyaprayogī ca bhavati
T06srabhu_u:4231: satkṛtyaprayogī ca kālena ca kālaṃ śamathanimittaṃ bhāvayati pragrahanimittam upekṣānimittam
T06srabhu_u:4234: jñeyavastupratyavekṣatayā cālambanapariśuddhiṃ rāgavirāgāc cittapariśuddhim avidyāvirāgāj jñānapariśuddhim adhigacchati sparśayati sākṣātkaroti
T06srabhu_u:4235: evaṃ hi, sa revata, bhikṣur (Śbh II 56)
T06srabhu_u:4240: evam asya tac cittam ālambane sūpanibaddhaṃ bhavati” //
T06srabhu_u:4244: tatra yat tāvad āha “nimitteṣu caran yogī“ty anena tāvac chamathanimitte pragrahanimitta upekṣānimitte satatakāritā satkṛtyakāritā cākhyātā
T06srabhu_u:4245: yat punar āha “sarvabhūtārthavedaka” ity anena vastuparyantatākhyātā /
T06srabhu_u:4246: yat punar āha “bimbadhyāyī sātatika” ity anena savikalpaṃ nirvikalpaṃ ca pratibimbam ākhyātam /
T06srabhu_u:4247: yat punar āha “pāriśuddhiṃ nigacchatī“ty anena kāryapariniṣpattir ākhyātā //
T06srabhu_u:4249: cittanimittasya kovidaḥ pravivekasya ca vindate rasam /
T06srabhu_u:4250: dhyāyī nipakaḥ pratismṛto bhuṅkte prītisukhaṃ nirāmiṣam //
T06srabhu_u:4251: tatra yat tāvad āha “cittanimittasya kovida” ity anena savikalpaṃ nirvikalpaṃ ca pratibimbaṃ nimittaśabdenākhyātam,
T06srabhu_u:4253: yat punar āha “pravivekasya ca vindate rasam” itya anenālambane samyak (Śbh II 58)
T06srabhu_u:4255: yat punar āha “dhyāyī nipakaḥ pratismṛta” ity anena śamathavipaśyanāyā bhāvanāsātatyam ākhyātam /
T06srabhu_u:4256: yat punar āha “bhuṅkte prītisukhaṃ nirāmiṣam” ity anena kāryapariniṣpattir ākhyātā /
T06srabhu_u:4257: tad evaṃ saty etad vyāpy ālambanam āptāgamaviśuddhaṃ veditavyaṃ yuktipatitaṃ ca /
T06srabhu_u:4328: yā cādhyātmam upādāya yā ca bahirdhopādāyāśubhatā,
T06srabhu_u:4331: yad duḥkhavedanīyaṃ sparśaṃ pratītyotpadyate kāyikacaitasikam asātaṃ vedayitaṃ vedanāgatam iyam ucyate duḥkhāśubhatā //
T06srabhu_u:4336: yasmāt punar hīnataraś cāvarataraś ca pratikruṣṭataraś cānyo dhātur nāsti /
T06srabhu_u:4339: tadyathā tad ekatyaṃ vastu śubham api sad anyac chubhataram apekṣyāśubhataḥ khyāti /
T06srabhu_u:4341: satkāyanirodhaṃ nirvāṇam apekṣya yāvad bhavāgram aśubhatve saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
T06srabhu_u:4353: tatra rāgas tadyathā adhyātmaṃ kāmeṣu kāmacchandaḥ kāmarāgaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:4357: satkāyacchandaḥ satkāyarāgaś cety ayaṃ pañcavidho rāgaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4358: tasya pañcavidhasya rāgasya prahāṇāya prativinodanāyāsamudācārāya ṣaḍvidhāśubhatālambanam //
T06srabhu_u:4359: tatrādhyātmam upādāya pratyaśubhatālambanenādhyātmaṃ kāmeṣu kāmacchandāt kāmarāgāc cittaṃ viśodhayati //
T06srabhu_u:4360: tatra bahirdhopādāya pratyaśubhatālambanena bahirdhā kāmeṣu maithunacchandād maithunarāgāc
T06srabhu_u:4371: yadā punar asthi vā śaṅkalikāṃ vāsthiśaṅkalikāṃ vā manasikaroti,
T06srabhu_u:4376: ata eva bhagavatā bahirdhopādāya pratyaśubhatā sā catasṛṣu śivapathikāsu vyavasthāpitā /
T06srabhu_u:4378: ekāhamṛtā vā saptāhamṛtā vā kākaiḥ kuraraiḥ khādyamānā gṛdhraiḥ śvabhiḥ sṛgālaiḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4384: anena tāvad vinīlakam upādāya yāvad vikhāditakam ākhyātam /
T06srabhu_u:4385: yat punar āha “yānena śivapathikā dṛṣṭā bhavati /

T06srabhu_u:4396: rtsib logs kyi rus pa dag daṅ /
