T06srabhu_u:4404: ekavārṣikāṇi dvivārṣikāṇi yāvat saptavārṣikāṇi śvetāni śaṃkhanibhāni,
T06srabhu_u:4405: kapotavarṇāni pāṃsucūrṇavyatimiśrāṇi dṛṣṭāni bhavantī“ty anena vikṣiptakam ākhyātam /
T06srabhu_u:4406: evaṃ pratyaśubhatālambanena bahirdhopādāya caturvidhā rāgapratisaṃyuktād maithunarāgāc cittaṃ viśodhayati //
T06srabhu_u:4407: tatra duḥkhatāśubhatālambanenāvarāśubhatālambanena ca viṣayapratisaṃyuktāt kāmarāgāc cittaṃ viśodhayati /
T06srabhu_u:4410: tatra kleśāśubhatālambanena prabhaṃgurāśubhatālambanena cā bhavāgram upādāya satkāyachandarāgāc cittaṃ viśodhayati /
T06srabhu_u:4415: tadanyā tv aśubhatā tadanyasyāpi caritasya viśuddhaya ālambanam //
T06srabhu_u:4421: tatra yo mitrapakṣo 'mitrapakṣa udāsīnapakṣaś cedam ālambanam /
T06srabhu_u:4424: yac cālambanaṃ yaś cālambakas tad ekadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya maitrīty ucyate //
T06srabhu_u:4425: tatra yat tāvad āha “maitrīsahagatena cittene“ty anena tāvat triṣu pakṣeṣu mitrapakṣe,
T06srabhu_u:4428: yat punar āha “avaireṇāsapatnenāvyābādhene“ty anena tasyaiva hitādhyāśayasya trividhaṃ lakṣaṇam ākhyātam /
T06srabhu_u:4430: sā punar avairatā dvābhyāṃ padābhyām ākhyātā,
T06srabhu_u:4436: “vipulena mahadgatenāpramāṇene“ty anena mṛdumadhyādhimātrasya sukhasyopasaṃhāra ākhyātaḥ kāmāvacarasya,
T06srabhu_u:4440: “adhimucya spharitvopasaṃpadya viharatī“ty anena sukhopasaṃhārāyādhimokṣaḥ samāhitabhūmika ākhyātaḥ sa punar eṣa sukhopasaṃhāro hitādhyāśayaparigṛhīta ādhimokṣikamanaskārānugataḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4444: yas tu duḥkhito vāduḥkhito vā punar mitrapakṣo 'mitrapakṣa udāsīnapakṣo vā /
T06srabhu_u:4445: tatra yo duḥkhitaḥ sa karuṇāyā ālambanam /
T06srabhu_u:4448: tatra vyāpādacaritaḥ pudgalo maitrīṃ bhāvayan sattveṣu yo vyāpādas taṃ pratanūkaroti /
T06srabhu_u:4452: yat triṣv adhvasu saṃskāramātraṃ dharmamātraṃ vastumātraṃ hetumātraṃ phalamātraṃ yuktipatitaṃ yadutāpekṣāyuktyā kāryakaraṇayuktyopapattisādhanayuktyā dharmatāyuktyā ca,
T06srabhu_u:4456: yad ālambanaṃ manasikurvan mohādhikaḥ pudgalo mohacarito mohaṃ prajahāti tanūkaroti mohacaritāc cittaṃ viśodhayati //
T06srabhu_u:4458: tadyathā ṣaḍdhātavaḥ pṛthivīdhātur abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātuś ca //
T06srabhu_u:4461: tatrādhyātmiko yad asmin kāye 'dhyātmaṃ pratyātmaṃ khakkhaṭam kharagatam upagatam upādattam /
T06srabhu_u:4462: bāhyaḥ punaḥ pṛthivīdhātur yad bāhyaṃ khakkhaṭaṃ kharagatam anupagatam anupādattam /
T06srabhu_u:4500: yad adhyātmaṃ pratyātmaṃ snehaḥ snehagatam āpo 'bgatam upagatam upādattam /
T06srabhu_u:4529: yad adhyātmaṃ pratyātmaṃ tejas tejogatam ūṣmoṣmāgatam upagatam upādattam /
T06srabhu_u:4530: tadyathā yad asmin kāye tejo yenāyaṃ kāya ātapyate,
T06srabhu_u:4533: yena cāśitapītakhāditasvāditaṃ samyak sukhena paripākaṃ gacchati /
T06srabhu_u:4534: yasya cotsadatvāj jvārito jvārita iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
T06srabhu_u:4537: yad bāhyaṃ tejas tejogatam ūṣmoṣmāgatam anupagatam anupādattam /
T06srabhu_u:4538: tat punar yan manuṣyā araṇīsahagatakebhyo gomayacūrṇebhyaḥ samanveṣante /
T06srabhu_u:4539: yad utpannaṃ grāmam api dahati, (Śbh II 76)
T06srabhu_u:4556: tatrādhyātmiko vāyudhātur yad apy adhyātmaṃ pratyātmaṃ vāyur vāyugataṃ laghutvaṃ samudīraṇatvam upagatam upādattam /
T06srabhu_u:4582: bhavati ca samayo yasmin mahān vāyuskandhaḥ samudāgato vṛkṣāgrān api (Śbh II 78)
T06srabhu_u:4605: tat punaś cittaṃ mano vijñānaṃ ca /
T06srabhu_u:4607: tatra mānacaritaḥ pudgala imaṃ dhātuprabhedaṃ manasikurvan kāye piṇḍasaṃjñāṃ vibhāvayati,
T06srabhu_u:4625: tatrāśvāso yaḥ praśvāsasamanantaram antarmukho vāyuḥ pravartate yāvan nābhīpradeśāt /
T06srabhu_u:4626: tatrāntarāśvāso ya uparate 'sminn āśvāse na tāvat praśvāsa utpadyate,
T06srabhu_u:4627: yadantarāle viśrāmasthānasahagata itvarakālīnas tadanusadṛśo vāyur utpadyate /
T06srabhu_u:4630: tatrāyaṃ viśeṣo bahirmukho vāyuḥ pravartata iti vaktavyam,
T06srabhu_u:4638: tato vā punar uttari yat kāyasauṣiryam //
T06srabhu_u:4645: te ca yathāyogaṃ sacet kāyasaṃniśritā eva pravarteran,
T06srabhu_u:4650: sacet kāyasaṃniśritāś cittasaṃniśritāḥ pravarteraṃs te ca na yathāyogaṃ,
T06srabhu_u:4651: tena caturthadhyānasamāpannopapannānām sattvānāṃ kalalagatānāṃ cārbudagatānāṃ peśīgatānām sattvānāṃ pravarteran /
T06srabhu_u:4653: tasmād āśvāsapraśvāsāḥ kāyasaṃniśritāś cittasaṃniśritāś ca pravartante te ca yathāyogam //
T06srabhu_u:4662: tatraudārikaṃ sauṣiryaṃ nābhīpradeśam upādāya yāvan mukhanāsikādvāram /
T06srabhu_u:4678: tatrātiśithilaprayogatayā kausīdyaprāptasya styānamiddhaṃ vā cittaṃ paryavanahati,
T06srabhu_u:4682: balābhinigraheṇāśvāsapraśvāsān abhiniṣpīḍayataḥ kāye viṣamā vāyavaḥ pravartante /
T06srabhu_u:4683: ye 'sya tatprathamatas teṣu teṣv aṅgapratyaṅgeṣu sphuranti /
T06srabhu_u:4685: te punaḥ sphurakā vāyavo vivardhamānā rujakā bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:4686: ye 'sya teṣu teṣv aṅgapratyaṅgeṣu rujām utpādayanti /
T06srabhu_u:4692: asyāḥ khalv ānāpānasmṛteḥ pañcavidhaḥ paricayo veditavyaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4693: tadyathā gaṇanāparicayaḥ skandhāvatāraparicayaḥ pratītyasamutpādāvatāraparicayaḥ satyāvatāraparicayaḥ ṣoḍaśākāraparicayaś ca //
T06srabhu_u:4703: yadāśvāse niruddhe praśvāsa utpadya nirgato bhavati tadā dvitīyaṃ gaṇayati,
T06srabhu_u:4705: eṣā hi gaṇanā saṃkhyā nātisaṃkṣiptā nātivistarā /
T06srabhu_u:4708: yadāśvāsaḥ praviṣṭo bhavati niruddhaś ca praśvāsa utpanno bhavati nirgataś ca,
T06srabhu_u:4712: āśvāsaṃ ca praśvāsaṃ cedaṃ dvayam ekadhyam abhisaṃkṣipyaikam iti gaṇayati,
T06srabhu_u:4715: anayaivaikaikagaṇanayā dvayaikagaṇanayā vānulomaṃ yāvad daśa gaṇayati /
T06srabhu_u:4719: pratilomaṃ daśa upādāya navāṣṭau sapta ṣaṭ pañca yāvad ekaṃ gaṇayati /
T06srabhu_u:4721: yadā sa ekaikagaṇanāṃ niśritya dvayaikagaṇanāṃ vā,
T06srabhu_u:4731: tatra dvayaikagaṇanayā catvāra āśvāsapraśvāsā ekaṃ (Śbh II 88)
T06srabhu_u:4732: bhavati, ekaikagaṇanayā punar āśvāsaḥ praśvāsaś ” caikaṃ bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4734: evam uttarottaravṛddhyā yāvac chatam apy ekaṃ kṛtvā gaṇayati /
T06srabhu_u:4736: evam asya gaṇanāprayutkasya yāvad daśaikaṃ kṛtvā gaṇayati /
T06srabhu_u:4738: tayā daśaikagaṇanayā na cāsyāntarāc cittaṃ vikṣipyate /
T06srabhu_u:4740: tasya ca gaṇanāprayuktasya saced antarāc cittaṃ vikṣipyate,
T06srabhu_u:4741: tadā punaḥ pratinivartyādito gaṇayitum ārabhate 'nulomaṃ vā,
T06srabhu_u:4743: yadā cāsya gaṇanāparicayāt tac cittaṃ svarasenaiva vāhimārgasamārūḍham āśvāsapraśvāsālambanopanibaddham avyavacchinnaṃ nirantaraṃ,
T06srabhu_u:4747: nivṛtte punar nivṛttigrāhakam āśvāsaśūnyāvasthāgrāhakam avikaṃpyam avicalam avikṣepākāram,
T06srabhu_u:4752: āśvāsapraśvāsā anugantavyāś cābhilakṣayitavyāś ca sāntarāśvāsapraśvāsāḥ sapravṛttinivṛttyavasthāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4754: sa khalv eṣa gaṇanāparicayo mṛdvindriyāṇāṃ vyapadiśyate /
T06srabhu_u:4757: anyathā gaṇanām antareṇa teṣāṃ styānamiddhaṃ vā cittaṃ paryavanaheta,
T06srabhu_u:4759: gaṇanāprayuktānāṃ tu teṣām etan na bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4760: ye tu tīkṣṇendriyāḥ paṭubuddhayas teṣāṃ punar gaṇanāprayogeṇa priyārohatā bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4761: tatropadiṣṭā evaṃ gaṇanāprayogaṃ laghu laghv eva pratividhyanti,
T06srabhu_u:4763: te punar āśvāsapraśvāsālambanāṃ smṛtim upanibadhya yatra ca pravartante yāvac ca pravartante,
T06srabhu_u:4766: tat sarvam anugacchaty upalakṣayaty upasthitayā smṛtyā /
T06srabhu_u:4768: tasya ca prayogasyāsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayād bahulīkārānvayāt kāyaprasrabdhir utpadyate,
T06srabhu_u:4770: ekāgratāṃ ca spṛśaty ālambanābhiratiṃ ca nirgacchati //
T06srabhu_u:4771: sa evaṃ kṛtaparicayo grāhyagrāhakavastumanasikāreṇa skandhān avatarati /
T06srabhu_u:4773: ye cāśvāsapraśvāsā yaś caiṣām āśrayakāyas taṃ manasikurvan rūpaskandham avatarati /
T06srabhu_u:4774: yā teṣām āśvāsapraśvāsānāṃ tadgrāhikayā smṛtyā saṃprayuktānubhāvanā sa vedanāskandha ity avatarati /
T06srabhu_u:4775: yā saṃjānanā sa saṃjñāskandha ity avatarati /
T06srabhu_u:4776: yā cāsau smṛtir yā ca cetanā,
T06srabhu_u:4779: yac (Śbh II 92) cittaṃ mano vijñānam ayaṃ vijñanaskandha ity avatarati /
T06srabhu_u:4780: yā tadbahulavihāritā evaṃ skandheṣv avatīrṇasyāyam ucyate skandhāvatāraparicayaḥ //
T06srabhu_u:4781: yadā cānena skandhamātraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhavati parijñātaṃ saṃskāramātraṃ vastumātraṃ tadā sa eṣām eva saṃskārāṇāṃ pratītyasamutpādam avatarati /
T06srabhu_u:4786: “kāyāśritā eta āśvāsapraśvāsāḥ kāyapratyayāś cittāśritāś cittapratyayāś ca” /
T06srabhu_u:4788: sa “kāyaś cittaṃ ca jīvitendriyapratyayam” ity avatarati /
T06srabhu_u:4803: sa tadbahulavihārī pratītyasamutpādāvatāre kṛtaparicaya ity ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:4805: sa evaṃ pratītyasamutpāde kṛtaparicayo “ya ete saṃskārāḥ pratītyasamutpannā anityā eta” ity avatarati /
T06srabhu_u:4807: punar ete 'bhūtvā bhavanti bhūtvā ca prativigacchanti te jātidharmāṇaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:4817: “yā kācid eṣāṃ saṃskārāṇām abhinirvṛttir duḥkhabhūtā rogabhūtā gaṇḍabhūtā sarvāsau tṛṣṇāpratyayā /
T06srabhu_u:4818: yat punar asyā duḥkhajanikāyās tṛṣṇāyā aśeṣaprahāṇam etac chāntam etat praṇītam evaṃ ca me jānata evaṃ bahulavihāriṇas tṛṣṇāyā aśeṣaprahāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatī“ti /
T06srabhu_u:4819: evaṃ hi samudayasatyaṃ nirodhasatyaṃ mārgasatyam avatīrṇo bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4822: tasyaivam satyeṣu kṛtaparicayasya darśanaprahātavyeṣu kleśeṣu prahīṇeṣu bhāvanāprahātavyā avaśiṣṭā bhavanti //
T06srabhu_u:4826: (Śbh II 96) tadyathā smṛta āśvasan “smṛta āśvasimī“ti śikṣate /
T06srabhu_u:4828: dīrgham hrasvaṃ sarvakāyapratisaṃvedy āśvasan “sarvakāyapratisaṃvedy āśvasimī“ti śikṣate /
T06srabhu_u:4830: prasrabhya kāyasaṃskārān āśvasan “prasrabhya kāyasaṃskārān āśvasimī“ti śikṣate /
T06srabhu_u:4833: cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī prasrabhya cittasaṃskārān āśvasan “prasrabhya cittasaṃskārān āśvasimī“ti śikṣate /
T06srabhu_u:4834: prasrabhya cittasaṃskārān praśvasan “prasrabhya cittasaṃskārān praśvasimī“ti śikṣate /
T06srabhu_u:4836: abhipramodayaṃś cittaṃ samādadhaṃś crttaṃ vimocayaṃś cittam āśvasan “vimocayaṃś cittam āśvasimī“ti śikṣate /
T06srabhu_u:4837: vimocayaṃś cittaṃ praśvasan “vimocayaṃś cittaṃ praśvasimī“ti śikṣate /
T06srabhu_u:4842: nirodhānudarśī praśvasan nirodhānudarśī praśvasimīti (Śbh II 98) śikṣate //
T06srabhu_u:4844: sa śaikṣo dṛṣṭapado lābhī bhavati caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānām /
T06srabhu_u:4845: āśvāsapraśvāsālambanaṃ ca manaskāram ārabhate 'vaśiṣṭānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya /
T06srabhu_u:4848: yadāśvāsaṃ vā praśvāsaṃ vālambate tadā “dīrgham āśvasimi praśvasimī“ti śikṣate /
T06srabhu_u:4849: yadāntarāśvāsam antarapraśvāsaṃ vālambanīkaroti tadā “hrasvam āśvasimi praśvasimī“ti śikṣate /
T06srabhu_u:4855: yasmin vā punaḥ samaye niruddha āśvāse 'ntarāśvāse ca /
T06srabhu_u:4859: praśvāsāśvāsaśūnyāṃ tadvyapetāṃ tadvyavahitāṃ riktām avasthām ālambanīkaroti /
T06srabhu_u:4864: api tu khalu tasyāsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayād bahulīkārānvayāt /
T06srabhu_u:4865: ye kharā duḥsaṃsparśā āśvāsapraśvāsāḥ pūrvam akṛtaparicayasya pravṛtta bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:4866: kṛtaparicayasya anye ca mṛdavaḥ sukhasaṃsparśāḥ pravartante /
T06srabhu_u:4868: sa caivam ānāpānasmṛtiprayogeṇa ca yuktaḥ sacel lābhī bhavati prathamasya vā dhyānasya dvitīyasya vā tasmin samaye prītipratisaṃvedy āśvasan,
T06srabhu_u:4870: sacet punar lābhī bhavati niṣprītikasya tṛtīyasya dhyānasya sa tasmin samaye sukhapratisaṃvedī bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4871: tṛtīyāc ca dhyānād ūrdhvam ānāpānasmṛtisaṃprayogo nāsti /
T06srabhu_u:4873: tasyaivaṃ prītipratisaṃvedino vā sukhapratisaṃvedino vā sacet kadācit karhacit smṛtisaṃpramoṣād utpadyate /
T06srabhu_u:4880: evam saṃmohasaṃjñācetanāsahagatam iñjitaṃ manyitaprapañcitābhisaṃskṛtaṃ tṛṣṇāgatam utpadyate /
T06srabhu_u:4881: sa tad utpannaṃ laghu laghv eva prajñayā pratividhyati nādhivāsayati prajahāti vinodayati vyantīkaroti /
T06srabhu_u:4882: evaṃ cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī “prasrabhya cittasaṃskārān āśvasimī“ty āśvasan “prasrabhya cittasaṃskārān āśvasimī“ti śikṣate /
T06srabhu_u:4883: sacet punar lābhī bhavati maulānāṃ prathamadvitīyatṛtīyānāṃ dhyānānāṃ sa cāvaśyam anāgamyasya prathamadhyānasāmantakasya lābhī bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4884: sa taṃ niśrityotpannaṃ svaṃ cittaṃ pratyavekṣate /
T06srabhu_u:4885: sarāgaṃ vā vigatarāgaṃ vā sadveṣaṃ vā vigatadveṣaṃ vā samohaṃ vigatamohaṃ,
T06srabhu_u:4886: saṃkṣiptaṃ vikṣiptaṃ līnaṃ pragṛhītam uddhatam anuddhataṃ vyupaśāntaṃ avyupaśāntaṃ
T06srabhu_u:4887: samāhitam asamāhitaṃ subhāvitam asubhāvitaṃ vimuktaṃ cittam avimuktaṃ cittam iti
T06srabhu_u:4890: sa yadā styānamiddhanivaraṇena cittaṃ nivṛtaṃ bhavaty adhyātmam saṃśamayatas tadānyatamānyatamena prasadanīyenālambanena saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati /
T06srabhu_u:4892: yadā punar auddhatyanivaraṇena kaukṛtyanivaraṇena nivṛtaṃ paśyaty abhisaṃpragṛhṇatas
T06srabhu_u:4896: yadā ca tac cittam āsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayād bahulīkārānvayān nivaraṇasamudācārād dūrīkṛtaṃ bhavati nivaraṇebhyo viśodhitam /
T06srabhu_u:4897: tenāha vimocayaṃś cittam āśvasan “vimocayaṃś cittam āśvasimī“ti śikṣate /
T06srabhu_u:4898: tasya nivaraṇebhyo vimuktacetaso mārgabhāvanāyā āntarāyikebhyo 'nuśayā avaśiṣṭā bhavanti prahātavyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4900: yaduta saṃskārānityatām eva sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca yoniśaḥ pratyaveksate /
T06srabhu_u:4902: tena ca pūrvaṃ prathamadvitīyatṛtīyadhyānasanniśrayeṇānāgamyasaṃniśrayeṇa vā punaḥ śamathayogaḥ kṛtaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4904: evam asya tac cittaṃ śamathavipaśyanāparibhāvitaṃ dhātuṣu vimucyate yadutānuśayebhyaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4906: yaś ca prahāṇadhātur yaś ca virāgadhātur yaś ca nirodhadhātuḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4911: sa evaṃ trīn dhātuñ śāntato manasikurvan kṣemata ārogyataḥ śamathavipaśyanāṃ bhāvayati /
T06srabhu_u:4912: yenāsyāsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayād bahulīkārānvayād avaśiṣṭebhyo bhāvanāprahātavyebhyaḥ kleśebhyaś cittaṃ vimucyate /
T06srabhu_u:4916: evam ayaṃ darśanabhāvanāprahātavyeṣu kleśeṣu prahīṇeṣv arhan bhavati kṣīṇāsravaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:4920: yaś cāyaṃ pañcavidhaḥ paricaya iyam asyocyata ānāpānasmṛtiḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4921: yatra vitarkacaritaḥ pudgalaḥ prayujyamānaḥ priyārohatayā prayujyate /
T06srabhu_u:4922: savyāpāraṃ caitad ālambanaṃ savyākṣepam adhyātmaṃ pratyātmam āsannāsannaṃ,
T06srabhu_u:4923: yenāsya tatra prayujyamānasya yo vitarkasaṃkṣobhaḥ sa na bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:4926: idaṃ pañcamaṃ vitarkacaritasya pudgalasya caritaviśodhanam ālambanam //
T06srabhu_u:4929: tadyathā skandhakauśalyaṃ dhātukauśalyam āyatanakauśalyaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalyaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalyam //
T06srabhu_u:4934: pañca skandhāḥ rūpaskandho vedanāskandhaḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ saṃskāraskandho vijñānaskandhaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:4936: yat kiñcid rūpaṃ sarvaṃ tac catvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtāny upādāya /
T06srabhu_u:4937: tat punar atītānāgatapratyutpannam ādhyātmikaṃ vā bāhyaṃ vaudārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā dūre vāntike vā /
T06srabhu_u:4942: ṣaḍ vedanākāyāś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā /
T06srabhu_u:4950: ṣaṭ saṃjñākāyāś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā saṃjñā śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśajā saṃjñā /
T06srabhu_u:4954: vedanāṃ ca saṃjñāṃ ca sthāpayitvā ye tadanye caitasikā dharmāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4959: sā caiṣā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskāras tac caitad vijñānam atītānāgatapratyutpannam ādhyātmikaṃ vā bāhyaṃ veti vistareṇa pūrvavat /
T06srabhu_u:4962: ya etān yathoddiṣṭān dharmāN nānātmakatayā (Śbh II 110)
T06srabhu_u:4964: na ca tataḥ param upalabhate vikalpayati vā /
T06srabhu_u:4967: anya eva rūpaskandho 'nyo vedanāskandha evam anyo yāvad vijñānaskandhaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4974: kiṃ ca na tasmāt param upalabhate vikalpayati /
T06srabhu_u:4976: no tu skandhavyatirekeṇātmānam upalabhate nityadhruvam avipariṇāmadharmakam /
T06srabhu_u:4984: cakṣurdhātū rūpadhātuś cakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ śrotradhātuḥ śabdadhātuḥ śrotravijñānadhātur
T06srabhu_u:4985: ghrāṇadhātur gandhadhātur ghrāṇavijñānadhātur jihvādhātū rasadhātur jihvāvijñānadhātuḥ
T06srabhu_u:4986: kāyadhātuḥ spraṣṭavyadhātuḥ kāyavijñānadhātur manodhātur dharmadhātur manovijñānadhātuḥ /
T06srabhu_u:4989: yat punar etān aṣṭādaśa dharmān svakāt svakād dhātoḥ svakasvakād bījāt svakasvakād gotrāj jāyante nirvartante prādurbhavantīti jānāti rocayann upanidhyāti /
T06srabhu_u:4991: yad aṣṭādaśānāṃ dharmāṇām svakasvakād dhātoḥ pravṛttiṃ jānāti tad evam sati hetupratyayakauśalyam etad yaduta dhātukauśalyam //
T06srabhu_u:5011: tatra cakṣur adhipatī rūpāṇy ālambanaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya sasaṃprayogasyotpattaye,
T06srabhu_u:5013: tatra śrotram adhipatiḥ śabda ālambanaṃ samanantaraniruddhaṃ ca manaḥ samanantarapratyayaḥ śrotravijñānasya sasaṃprayogasyotpattaye /
T06srabhu_u:5014: evaṃ yāvan manaḥsamanantaraṃ tajjo manaskāro 'dhipatipratyayo dharma ālambanaṃ manovijñānasya sasaṃprayogasyotpattaye,
T06srabhu_u:5015: iti tribhiḥ pratyayaiḥ samanantarapratyayena ālambanapratyayena adhipatipratyayena ca ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ pravṛttir bhavati sasaṃprayogāṇām iti /
T06srabhu_u:5025: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:5027: yat punar dharmā eva dharmān abhispandayanti dharmā eva dharmān parispandayanti /
T06srabhu_u:5030: pratītyasamutpannatvād abhūtvā bhavanti bhūtvā ca prativigacchanti /
T06srabhu_u:5032: ye punar anityās te jātidharmāṇo jarādharmāṇo vyādhidharmāṇo maraṇadharmāṇaḥ śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsadharmāṇaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:5037: yad ebhir ākāraiḥ pratītyasamutpanneṣu dharmeṣv anityajñānam,
T06srabhu_u:5047: yad evaṃ jñānam idam ucyate sthānāsthānakauśalyam /
T06srabhu_u:5048: tac caitat pañcasthānakauśalyaṃ samāsataḥ svalakṣaṇakauśalyaṃ bhavati sāmānyalakṣaṇakauśalyaṃ ca /
T06srabhu_u:5049: tatra skandhakauśalyena svalakṣaṇakauśalyam ākhyātam avaśiṣṭaiḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇakauśalyam /
T06srabhu_u:5054: tadyathā kāmadhātau prathamadhyānasya evaṃ yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasya /
T06srabhu_u:5058: tatra svabhāvaudārikatā kāmadhātāv api pañcaskandhāḥ saṃvidyante prathame tu dhyāne /
T06srabhu_u:5059: ye kāmāvacarās te sādīnavatarāś ca duḥkhavihāratarāś ca, (Śbh II 116)
T06srabhu_u:5063: prathame tu dhyāne na tathā tena te śāntatarāḥ praṇītatarā ity ucyante /
T06srabhu_u:5065: kāmāvacaro rūpaskandhaḥ prabhūtataraḥ parijñeyaḥ prahātavya evaṃ yāvad vijñānaskandhaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:5067: evam uparimāsu bhūmiṣu svabhāvaudārikatā saṃkhyaudārikatā ca yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:5068: iyaṃ tūparimāsu bhūmiṣu yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanāt tadaudārikatā veditavyāḥ,
T06srabhu_u:5069: sarvā adharimā bhūmayo duḥkhavihāratarāś ca alpāyuṣkatarāś ca /
T06srabhu_u:5073: yasyāṃ yasyāṃ bhūmau prabhūtataram ādīnavaṃ bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:5075: yasyāṃ tu yasyāṃ bhūmāv alpataram ādīnavaṃ bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:5077: idaṃ laukikānāṃ laukikena mārgeṇa kleśaviśodhanam ālambanam,
T06srabhu_u:5081: ya adhobhūmikāḥ kleśā yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanabhūmikāḥ kāmadhātum upādāya te prahīyante /
T06srabhu_u:5083: te punar eva te pratisaṃdhikā bhavanti //
T06srabhu_u:5085: lokottareṇa vā punar mārgeṇa kleśaviśodhanam ālambanaṃ caturvidhaṃ tadyathā duḥkhasatyaṃ samudayasatyaṃ nirodhasatyaṃ mārgasatyaṃ ca /
T06srabhu_u:5087: tadyathā jātir duḥkhaṃ jarā duḥkhaṃ vyādhir maraṇam apriyasaṃprayogaḥ priyavinābhāva icchāvighātaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:5089: tatra samudaya āryasatyaṃ tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī /
T06srabhu_u:5090: tatra nirodha āryasatyaṃ yad asyā eva tṛṣṇāyā aśeṣaprahāṇam /
T06srabhu_u:5092: tatra kṛṣṇapakṣaṃ śuklapakṣaṃ copādāya hetuphalavyavasthānena catuḥsatyavyavasthānam /
T06srabhu_u:5097: tatra duḥkhasatyaṃ vyādhisthānīyaṃ tat prathamataḥ parijñeyam /
T06srabhu_u:5099: nirodhasatyam ārogyasthānīyaṃ tac ca sparśayitavyaṃ sākṣātkartavyam /
T06srabhu_u:5100: mārgasatyaṃ bhaiṣajyasthānīyaṃ tac cāsevitavyaṃ bhāvayitavyaṃ bahulīkartavyam //
T06srabhu_u:5102: bhūtaṃ caitat tathā avitathā aviparītam aviparyastaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhārthena,
T06srabhu_u:5103: yāvan mārgo mārgārthena tasmāt satyam ity ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:5108: kasmāt punar etāny āryāṇām eva satyāni bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:5109: āryā etāni satyāny eva samānāni satyato jānanti paśyanti yathābhūtam /
T06srabhu_u:5115: tatra jātiduḥkham iti jāyamānasya duḥkhā vedanotpadyate kāyikacaitasikī,
T06srabhu_u:5116: na tu jātir eva duḥkhaṃ duḥkhanidānam sā evaṃ yāvad icchāvighāto duḥkham iti,
T06srabhu_u:5118: na tv icchāvighāta eva duḥkhaṃ duḥkhanidānaṃ punaḥ sa iti peyālam /
T06srabhu_u:5119: saṃkṣepataḥ pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkham ity ebhir jātyādibhiḥ paryāyair duḥkhaduḥkhataiva paridīpitā /
T06srabhu_u:5120: tatra vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā saṃskāraduḥkhatā cāvaśiṣṭā sā punaḥ pañcopādānaskandhaduḥkhatayā paridīpitā bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:5121: tathā hi pañcopādānaskandhās trivedanāparigatās te tathoktāyā duḥkhaduḥkhatāyā bhājanabhūtāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:5122: yā ca noktā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā saṃskāraduḥkhatā ca sāpy eṣv eva draṣṭavyā /
T06srabhu_u:5123: kena punaḥ kāraṇena bhagavatā duḥkhaduḥkhataiva parikīrtitā svaśabdena,
T06srabhu_u:5125: tathā hi duḥkhaduḥkhatāyām āryāṇāṃ bālānāṃ ca tulyā duḥkhatābuddhiḥ pravartate /
T06srabhu_u:5126: saṃvejikā atyarthaṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatā pūrvam akṛtaprajñānām evaṃ ca deśyamāne sukham avatāro bhavati satyeṣu vineyānām //
T06srabhu_u:5128: tatra trividhāyā duḥkhatāyāḥ kathaṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:5129: yat tāvad duḥkhaṃ jātir duḥkhaṃ yāvad icchāvighāto duḥkham ity anena sādhiṣṭhānā duḥkhā vedanā ākhyātā sā ca duḥkhaduḥkhatā /
T06srabhu_u:5131: ye ye vā punar etad vipakṣā dharmās tathā yauvanaṃ jarāyāḥ,
T06srabhu_u:5137: ye ca duḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ pravṛttāḥ kleśāḥ sādhiṣṭhānāḥ,
T06srabhu_u:5138: ye cārogyādiṣu sukhasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu tannirjātāyāṃ ca vedanāyāṃ ye pravṛttāḥ kleśāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:5142: kleśāḥ punaḥ sarvatra pravṛttāḥ paryavasthānata eva duḥkhā bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:5143: vipariṇāmaś ca sa cetasas tasmād vipariṇāmaduḥkhatety ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:5146: yathā coktaṃ “kāmacchandaparyavasthitaḥ kāmacchandaparyavasthānapratyayaṃ tajjaṃ caitasikaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayate” /
T06srabhu_u:5147: evaṃ vyāpādastyānamiddhauddhatyakaukṛtyavicikitsāparyavasthitas tad anenāgamenāptena paramāptena kleśeṣu duḥkhārtho 'pi labhyate vipariṇāmārtho 'pi /
T06srabhu_u:5152: yā ca kleśasaṃgṛhītā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā, yā ca (Śbh II 124)
T06srabhu_u:5153: sādhiṣṭhānasukhavedanāsaṃgṛhitā tāṃ sthāpayitvā ye tadanye skandhā aduḥkhāsukhasahagatās tannirjātās tadutpattipratyayās tasya cotpannasya sthitibhājanāḥ
T06srabhu_u:5155: ye skandhā anityā udayavyayayuktāḥ sopādānās trivedanābhir anuṣaktā dauṣṭhulyopagatā ayogakṣemapatitā avinirmuktā duḥkhaduḥkhatāyā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatāyā asvavaśavartinaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:5159: sā punaḥ prārthanā tribhir mukhaiḥ pravṛttā tadyathā punarbhavaprārthanā,
T06srabhu_u:5161: tatra yā punarbhavaprārthanā sā paunarbhavikī tṛṣṇā /
T06srabhu_u:5165: tatra yā prāpteṣu viṣayeṣu saumanasyādhyavasānasahagatā nandīrāgasahagatety ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:5166: yā punar aprāpteṣu viṣayeṣu saṃyogābhilāṣasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinīty ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:5172: idam ālambanaṃ kleśaviśodhanaṃ lokottareṇa mārgeṇa veditavyam //
T06srabhu_u:5183: yad aviparītaṃ dharmam arthaṃ ca deśayati grāhayati bhūtaṃ yad asya niryāti samyagduḥkhakṣayāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāyai /
T06srabhu_u:5194: tatrāgamāvavādo yathā tena gurūṇām antikād āgamitaṃ bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:5197: tathāgataśrāvakasya vā tathaivānenānyūnamadhikaṃ kṛtvā parān avavadate /
T06srabhu_u:5199: tatrādhigamāvavādo yathānena te dharmā adhigatā bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:5212: anekavidhaṃ ṛddhiviṣayam upadarśayaty ātmani ca bahumānaṃ janayati pareṣām /
T06srabhu_u:5215: tatra deśanāprātihāryeṇa cittacaritaā samanveṣya anuśāstiprātihāryeṇa yathendriyam,
T06srabhu_u:5228: tatrādhicittaṃśikṣā viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ
T06srabhu_u:5229: savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ ca prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yāvac caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati /
T06srabhu_u:5231: api khalu sarva ārūpyās tadanyāś ca samādhisamāpattayo 'dhicittaṃśikṣety ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:5232: api tu dhyānāni niśritya tatprathamataḥ satyābhisamayo nyāmāvakrāntir bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:5233: na tu sarveṇa sarvaṃ vinā dhyānais tasmāt pradhānāni dhyānāni kṛtvādhicittaṃśikṣety uktāni /
T06srabhu_u:5234: tatrādhiprajñaṃśikṣā yac caturṣv āryasatyeṣu yathābhūtaṃ jñānaṃ //
T06srabhu_u:5235: kena kāraṇena tisra eva śikṣā na tata ūrdhvam /
T06srabhu_u:5239: tathā hi śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhāya cittaikāgratāṃ spṛśati cittasamādhim /
T06srabhu_u:5241: tathā hi samāhitacittasyaikāgratāsmṛtyā jñeye vastuni yathābhūtaṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate /
T06srabhu_u:5243: tathā hi suviśuddhena jñānadarśanena kleśaprahāṇam sākṣātkaroti /
T06srabhu_u:5244: eṣa hi svārtha etat paramaṃ kṛtyaṃ (Śbh II 132)
T06srabhu_u:5245: yaduta kleśaprahāṇaṃ tata uttarikaraṇīyaṃ punar nāsti /
T06srabhu_u:5250: sukhitasya cittasamādhiḥ samāhitacitto yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti yathābhūtaṃ paśyati /
T06srabhu_u:5251: yathābhūtaṃ jānan paśyan nirvidyate nirviṇṇo virajyate /
T06srabhu_u:5254: evam imāni śīlāni bhāvitāny agratāyām upanayanti /
T06srabhu_u:5257: tatra kena kāraṇenādhiśīlaṃ śikṣā adhiśīlam ity ucyate,
T06srabhu_u:5261: adhicittam adhikṛtya yac chīlaṃ sā adhiśīlaṃ śikṣā /
T06srabhu_u:5268: yā cādhiśīlaṃśikṣā yā cādhicittaṃ yā cādhiprajñaṃśikṣā etāḥ śikṣā asminn eva śāsane,
T06srabhu_u:5271: asti punar adhicittaṃśikṣā yā adhiprajñaṃśikṣāyā āvāhikā,
T06srabhu_u:5276: kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya prayujyamānaḥ smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati yāvad upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgam /
T06srabhu_u:5278: adhicittaṃ punaḥ śikṣāṃ adhiprajñāyā āvāhikā pūrvam evoktā /
T06srabhu_u:5283: na tv asty adhiprajñaṃśikṣā yā vinādhiśīlenādhicittena ca /
T06srabhu_u:5284: ato yatrādhiprajñaṃśikṣā tatra tisraḥ śikṣā veditavyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:5285: idaṃ tāvac chikṣāvyavasthānaṃ tatra yoginā yogaprayuktena śikṣitavyam //
T06srabhu_u:5291: tatra sarveṇa sarvam avītarāgaḥ satyāny abhisamāgacchan sahasatyābhisamayāt srota-āpanno bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:5292: yadbhūyo vītarāgaḥ punaḥ satyāny abhisamāgacchan sahasatyābhisamayāt sakṛdāgāmī bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:5293: vītarāgaḥ satyāny abhisamāgacchan sahasatyābhisamayād anāgāmī bhavati //
T06srabhu_u:5303: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ kathaṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:5310: yat punar idam ucyata ātmā vā,
T06srabhu_u:5314: tatra saṃskṛte doṣadarśanād ādīnavadarśanād apraṇidhānaṃ bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:5316: nirvāṇe punas tatra praṇidhānavataḥ praṇidhānaṃ bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:5318: niḥsaraṇadarśanāc ca punar ānimittaṃ vimokṣamukhaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
T06srabhu_u:5319: tatrāsaty asaṃvidyamāne naiva praṇidhānaṃ nāpraṇidhānaṃ bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:5320: tad yathaivāsat tathaivāsad iti jānataḥ paśyataḥ śūnyatāvimokṣamukhaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
T06srabhu_u:5328: tadyathā mātṛgrāmaḥ śiśur udāravarṇo rañjanīyaḥ śikṣāprayuktasya kulaputrasyādhimātram antarāyakaraḥ paripanthakaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:5331: satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ kavaḍaṃkārāhāram upādāya rasarāgo lokākhyānakathāsv anekavidhāsu bahunānāprakārāsu citrāsu chandarāgānunayaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:5334: tadyathā kāṅkṣā vimatir vicikitsā ratneṣu vā satyeṣu vā skandheṣu vā karmaphale vā
T06srabhu_u:5339: lābhena vā yaśasā vā praśaṃsayā vā anyatamānyatamena vā sukhalavamātratvena nandīsaumanasyam auddhatyam avyupaśama audbilyam utplāvitatvam /
T06srabhu_u:5343: dharmyām api kathāṃ kathayatā vigṛhyakathām ārambhānuyogaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:5344: pūrvadṛṣṭaśrutānubhūteṣu viṣayeṣv anekavidheṣu bahunānāprakāreṣu cittavisāraś cittākṣepaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:5349: spṛṣṭasya śārīrikābhir vedanābhir duḥkhābhir yāvat prāṇahāriṇībhir jīvitaniyantir jīvitāśā,
T06srabhu_u:5354: katame daśa śikṣāpadānāṃ vilomānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa śikṣānulomikā bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:5366: itīmā daśa saṃjñā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā daśavidhasya śikṣāparipanthakasya daśānāṃ śikṣāvilomānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya saṃvartante /
T06srabhu_u:5372: asminn artha abhipretā dharmacintāyogamanasikārāḥ paripanthasya prahāṇāya //
T06srabhu_u:5388: tatrānulomika upadeśo ya upadeśo 'viparītaś cānupūrvikaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:5389: tatra yoniśaḥ prayogo yathaivāvavāditas tathaiva prayujyate /
T06srabhu_u:5391: tatra sātatyasatkṛtyakāritā yadrūpeṇa prayogeṇa avandhyaṃ ca kālaṃ karoti kuśalapakṣeṇa /
T06srabhu_u:5393: tatra tīvracchandatā yathāpi tad uttare vimokṣaspṛhām utpādayati /
T06srabhu_u:5394: “kadāsvid ahaṃ tad āyatanam upasaṃpadya vihariṣyāmi yad āryā āyatanam upasaṃpadya viharantī“ti /
T06srabhu_u:5395: tatra yogabalādhānatā dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ yogabalādhānaprāpto bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:5398: tatra kāyacittadauṣṭhulyapratiprasrabdhir yathāpi tac chrāntakāyasya klāntakāyasyotpadyate kāyadauṣṭhulyaṃ cittadauṣṭhulyam /
T06srabhu_u:5405: prakṛtyaiva cāprahīṇakleśasya kleśapakṣaṃ kāyacittadauṣṭhulyam avigataṃ bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:5408: tatrābhīkṣṇapratyavekṣā abhīkṣṇaṃ śīlāny ārabhya kukṛtaṃ pratyavekṣate sukṛtaṃ ca /
T06srabhu_u:5414: tathā kleśānāṃ prahīṇāprahīṇānāṃ mīmāṃsāmanaskāram adhipatiṃ kṛtvā abhīkṣṇaṃ pratyavekṣate /
T06srabhu_u:5415: tatra prahīṇatāṃ jñātvā [yid bde bar 'gyur la /
T06srabhu_u:5416: ma spaṅs bar śes na] punaḥ punas tam eva mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
T06srabhu_u:5418: yat kālāntareṇa jñātavyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ prāptavyaṃ tad ajānato 'paśyato 'nadhigacchataḥ paritamanā utpadyate,
T06srabhu_u:5427: itīme daśa dharmāḥ śikṣākāmasya yogina ādimadhyaparyavasānam upādāya śikṣām anulomayanti,
T06srabhu_u:5440: te hy aparinirvāṇadharmakatvād atyantaparibhraṣṭā eva yogād bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:5443: te hi dūram api param api gatvā avaśyam eva pratyayān āsādayiṣyanti /
T06srabhu_u:5445: tenaiṣa teṣāṃ tāvatkālika eva yogabhraṃśo bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:5452: prabhūtarajaskajātīyaḥ paṭuvijñānaś ca bhavati paṭubuddhiḥ sahajayā buddhyā samanvāgataḥ sa śrutam udgṛhṇāti śrutaṃ paryavāpnoty alpaṃ vā,
T06srabhu_u:5458: dharmadeśanayā cittam ārādhayati kuhanānucaritayā ca ceṣṭayā kāyavākpratisaṃyuktayā /
T06srabhu_u:5459: tasya tena hetubhāvena tena pratyayenotpadyate lābhasatkāraślokaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:5460: sa jñāto bhavati mahāpuṇyo lābhī bhavati cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇām,
T06srabhu_u:5473: mayi saṃbhāvanā jātā yeṣām arhatsaṃmatas te cen mām upasaṃkramya yoge manasikāre śamathavipaśyanāyāṃ praśnaṃ pṛccheyuḥ /
T06srabhu_u:5474: teṣāṃ cāhaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāṃ na jānāmīty evaṃ sati yā saṃbhāvanā sā ca hīyet,
T06srabhu_u:5476: yan nv ahaṃ svayam eva cintayitvā tulayitvopaparīkṣya yogaṃ vyavasthāpayeyam” /
T06srabhu_u:5477: sa etam evārtham adhipatiṃ kṛtvā lābhasatkārābhigṛddha ekākī rahogataḥ svayam eva cintayitvā tulayitvopaparīkṣya yogaṃ vyavasthāpayati /
T06srabhu_u:5478: sa cāsya yogo na sūtre 'vatarati na vinaye saṃdṛśyate /
T06srabhu_u:5482: mātṛkādharās teṣaṃ tad yogasthānaṃ vinigūhati na prakāśayati /
T06srabhu_u:5497: te ca tato nidānam apratītā bhaveyur apratītavacanaiś ca māṃ codayeyuḥ /
T06srabhu_u:5499: “evam ahaṃ punar api na satkṛtaḥ syāṃ na gurukṛtaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:5500: rājñāṃ rājāmātrāṇāṃ yāvad dhanināṃ śreṣṭhināṃ sārthavāhānām,
T06srabhu_u:5501: na ca punar lābhī syāṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇām” iti /
T06srabhu_u:5502: sa tām eva lābhasatkārakāmatām adhipatiṃ kṛtvā adharme dharmasaṃjñī,
T06srabhu_u:5503: vinidhāya saṃjñāṃ rucim adharmaṃ dharmato dīpayati saṃprakāśayati /
T06srabhu_u:5504: tatra ye 'sya dṛṣṭyanumatam āpadyante te 'py adharme dharmasaṃjñino bhavanti mandatvān
T06srabhu_u:5505: momuhatvāt te 'dharme dharmasaṃjñino yathānuśiṣṭā api pratipadyamānā mithyāpratipannā eva te veditavyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:5506: ayam evaṃrūpo mithyāpratipattikṛto yogabhraṃśaḥ saddharmapratirūpako hy asaddharmaḥ saddharmasyāntardhānāya /
T06srabhu_u:5507: itīme catvāro yogabhraṃśā dhyāyinā bhikṣuṇā yogācāreṇa parijñeyā varjayitavyāḥ //
T06srabhu_u:5512: tadyathā śraddhā chando vīryam upāyaś ca //
T06srabhu_u:5517: tadyathā prāptaye yathāpīhaikatya uttare vimokṣaspṛhām utpādayati,
T06srabhu_u:5519: paripṛcchāyai yathāpīhaikatyaḥ spṛhām utpādayaty ārāmaṃ gamanāya,
T06srabhu_u:5520: vijñānāṃ sabrahmacāriṇāṃ yogajñānām antikam aśrutasya śravaṇāya,
T06srabhu_u:5527: anuyogāya cchando yathāpīhaikatyaḥ sātatyaprayogatāyāṃ satkṛtyaprayogatāyāṃ ca mārgabhāvanāyāṃ spṛhām utpādayaty abhilāṣaṃ kartukāmatām /
T06srabhu_u:5529: yaduta prāptaye paripṛcchanāyai saṃbhārasamudāgamāya anuyogāya ca //
T06srabhu_u:5531: tatra vīryam api caturvidhaṃ tadyathā śravaṇāya,
T06srabhu_u:5542: evaṃ pratisaṃlayanapraviṣṭasya kālena kālaṃ śamathavipaśyanāṃ bhāvayataḥ /
T06srabhu_u:5543: evam ahorātrānuyuktasya caṃkramaniṣadyābhyāṃ nivaraṇebhyaś cittaṃ viśodhayataḥ,
T06srabhu_u:5547: tadyathā śīlasaṃvaram indriyasaṃvaram adhipatiṃ kṛtvā sūpasthitasmṛtitā tathā copasthitasmṛter apramādaś cetasa ārakṣā /
T06srabhu_u:5554: prāptim (Śbh II 156) abhisaṃpratyayāt kartukāmatām utpādayati kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu /
T06srabhu_u:5557: tac ca vīryam upāyaparigṛhītam aprāptasya prāptaye,
T06srabhu_u:5559: tasmād ime catvāro dharmā yoga ity ucyate41 //
T06srabhu_u:5569: tadyathā ādikarmikasyādhyātmam eva cittaṃ sthāpayataḥ saṃsthāpayataś ca dharmān pravicinvataḥ,
T06srabhu_u:5572: balād avaṣṭabhya tac cittam ekāgratāyām avasthāpayati /
T06srabhu_u:5578: yo labdhamanaskārasyordhvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa gacchato lokottareṇa vā yo lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī manaskāraḥ /
T06srabhu_u:5579: tathā hi samādhis tatra cintayā vyavakīryate,
T06srabhu_u:5582: lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedino manaskārād ūrdhvaṃ yāvat prayoganiṣṭhān manasikārāt //
T06srabhu_u:5597: yena līnaṃ cittaṃ pragrāhakair nimittair abhipramodayati saṃpraharṣayati pragṛhṇāti /
T06srabhu_u:5600: yam adhipatiṃ kṛtvā prahīṇāprahīṇatāṃ kleśānāṃ pratyavekṣate //
T06srabhu_u:5604: tatrālambanaṃ manasikurvatā kati nimittāni manasikartavyāni bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:5607: tadyathālambananimittaṃ nidānanimittaṃ parivarjanīyaṃ nimittaṃ niṣevaṇīyaṃ ca nimittam //
T06srabhu_u:5613: upadeśaḥ, bhāvanāsahagatas tīvracchandaḥ saṃvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu saṃvegaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:5615: parataś cāsaṃghaṭṭo manuṣyakṛto vāmanuṣyakṛto vā śabdakṛto vā vyāyāmakṛto vā /
T06srabhu_u:5616: tathā vipaśyanāpūrvaṃgamo 'dhyātmaṃ cittābhisaṃkṣepa uttaptatarāyā vipaśyanāyā uttaratra nidānanimittam /
T06srabhu_u:5617: tathā śamathapūrvaṃgamā vipaśyanā uttaptatarasya śamathasyottaratra nidānanimittam //
T06srabhu_u:5620: tadyathā layanimittam auddhatyanimittaṃ saṅganimittaṃ vikṣepanimittaṃ ca /
T06srabhu_u:5626: yenālambananimittena nidānanimittena cittam ālambane rajyate saṃrajyate saṃkliśyate /
T06srabhu_u:5629: tāni punar nimittāni yathā samāhitāyāṃ bhūmau //
T06srabhu_u:5630: ebhir manaskārair ālambanam adhimucyataḥ katy adhimokṣā bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:5633: tadyathā prabhāsvaraś cāprabhāsvaraś ca jaḍaḥ paṭuḥ parītto mahadgato 'pramāṇaḥ pariśuddho 'pariśuddhaś ceti /
T06srabhu_u:5652: anantam vā aparyantam ālambanam adhimucyate yo 'dhimokṣaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:5656: apariśuddho vā punaḥ yo na subhāvito na pariniṣpanno na paryavasānagataḥ //
T06srabhu_u:5666: tatrāśrayanirodhaḥ prayogamanasikārabhāvanānuyuktasya yo dauṣṭhulyasahagata āśrayaḥ so 'nupūrveṇa nirudhyate,
T06srabhu_u:5671: yac cālambanaparijñānam ālambanābhiratiṃ cādhipatiṃ kṛtvāśrayo nirudhyate parivartate ca /
T06srabhu_u:5672: asty ālambanaparijñānam ālambanābhiratir āśrayaviśuddhipūrvaṃgamam āśrayaśuddhim adhipatiṃ kṛtvā suviśuddham ālambanajñānaṃ kāryapariniṣpattikāle
T06srabhu_u:5683: tatra manaskārādikarmikas tatprathamakarmika ekāgratāyāṃ yāvan manaskāraṃ na prāpnoti cittaikāgratāṃ na spṛśati /
T06srabhu_u:5685: adhigate 'pi manaskāre kleśasya cittaṃ viśodhayitukāmasya yaIIakṣaṇapratisaṃvedino manaskārasyārambhaḥ pratigrahaś cābhyāsaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:5688: lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedinaṃ manaskāram sthāpayitvā tadanyeṣu ṣaṭsu manaskāreṣu prayoganiṣṭhāparyanteṣu kṛtaparicayo bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:5693: api ca kuśalaṃ dharmacchandam upādāya prayujyamāno yāvan nirvedhabhāgīyāni kuśalamūlāni notpādayati tāvad ādikarmiko bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:5698: yadā punaḥ samyaktvaṃ nyāmam avakrāmati satyāny abhisamāgacchaty aparapratyayo bhavaty ananyaneyaḥ śāstuḥ śāsane,
T06srabhu_u:5708: tadyathā laukikamārgaprayuktaḥ sarvāsv adharimāsu bhūmiṣv ādīnavasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayati /
T06srabhu_u:5709: nirvāṇāya vā punaḥ prayuktaḥ prahāṇadhātau virāgadhātau nirodhadhātau śāntadarśī prahāṇasaṃjñāṃ virāgasaṃjñāṃ nirodhasaṃjñāṃ ca bhāvayati /
T06srabhu_u:5710: śamathāya vā punaḥ prayukta ūrdhvamadhaḥsaṃjñāṃ śamathapakṣyāṃ bhāvayati /
T06srabhu_u:5712: tatrordhvamadhaḥsaṃjñī imam eva kāyaṃ yathāsthitaṃ yathāpraṇihitam ūrdhvaṃ pādatalād adhaḥ keśamastakāt pūrṇaṃ nānāvidhasyāśuceḥ pratyavekṣate
T06srabhu_u:5713: santy asmin kāye keśā romāṇīti pūrvavat /
T06srabhu_u:5715: yathāpi tad ekatyena pratyavekṣaṇānimittam eva sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca sūdgṛhītaṃ bhavati sumanasīkṛtam sujuṣṭaṃ supratividdham /
T06srabhu_u:5718: purato vā gacchantaṃ pṛṣṭhato gacchan pratyavekṣate /
T06srabhu_u:5719: sā khalv eṣā traiyadhvikānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ pratītyasamutpannānāṃ vipaśyanākārā pratyavekṣā paridīpitā /
T06srabhu_u:5720: tatra yat tāvad āha “sthito niṣaṇṇaṃ pratyavekṣata” ity anena paridīpitaṃ vartamānena manaskāreṇa_ anāgataṃ jñeyaṃ pratyavekṣate /
T06srabhu_u:5723: anāgatā punar jñeyāvasthā anutpannatvād utpādābhimukhatvāc ca “niṣaṇṇe“ty ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:5724: yat punar āha “niṣaṇṇo vā nipannaṃ pratyavekṣata” ity anena pratyutpannena manaskāreṇātītasya jñeyasya pratyavekṣaṇā paridīpitā /
T06srabhu_u:5727: yat punar āha “purato vā gacchantaṃ pṛṣṭhato gacchan pratyavekṣata” ity anena pratyutpannena manaskāreṇānantaraniruddhasya manaskārasya pratyavekṣā paridīpitā /
T06srabhu_u:5728: tatra ya utpannotpanno manasikāro 'nantaraniruddhah sa purato yāyī /
T06srabhu_u:5729: tatra yo 'nantarotpanno 'nantarotpanno manaskāro navanavo 'nantaraniruddhasyānantaraniruddhasya grāhakaḥ sa pṛṣṭhato yāyī /
T06srabhu_u:5730: tatra śamathaṃ ca vipaśyanāṃ ca bhāvayaṃs tadubhayapakṣyām ālokasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayati /
T06srabhu_u:5733: yaḥ saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām abhyāsaḥ paricaya āsevanā bhāvanā bahulīkāra iyam ucyate bodhipakṣyabhāvanā /
T06srabhu_u:5743: anutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāya cchandaiḥ janayati vyāyacchate vīryam ārabhate cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti pradadhātīti samyakprahāṇasya,
T06srabhu_u:5746: utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām sthitaye 'saṃmoṣāya bhāvanāparipūraye bhūyobhāvavṛddhivipulatāyai
T06srabhu_u:5747: chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate vīryam ārabhate cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti pradadhātīti samyakprahāṇasya /
T06srabhu_u:5753: samyagdṛṣṭeḥ samyaksaṃkalpasya samyagvākkarmāntājīvānām samyagvyāyāmasya samyaksmṛteḥ samyaksamādheś ca //
T06srabhu_u:5766: nārakas tairyagyonikaḥ paitṛviṣayiko mānuṣyako divyaś ca,
T06srabhu_u:5776: yā kāyam adhipatiṃ kṛtvā śrutamayī vā prajñā cintāmayī vā bhāvanāmayī vā,
T06srabhu_u:5777: yayā prajñayā sarvaṃ kāyaṃ sarvākāraṃ samyag evopaparīkṣate saṃtīrayaty anupraviśaty anubudhyate //
T06srabhu_u:5778: tatra smṛtir yad asya kāyam adhipatiṃ kṛtvā ye dharmā udgṛhītās teṣām eva ca dharmāṇāṃ yo 'rthaś cintito ye ca bhāvanayā sākṣātkṛtāḥ,
T06srabhu_u:5779: tatra vyañjane cārthe ca sākṣātkriyāyāṃ ca taccetaso 'saṃmoṣaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:5790: api ca smṛtyārakṣāyai smṛter upasthānaṃ viṣayāsaṃkleśāyālambanopanibandhāya ca /
T06srabhu_u:5791: tatra smṛtyārakṣā yathoktaṃ pūrvam ev“ārakṣitasmṛtir bhavati nipakasmṛtir” iti /
T06srabhu_u:5793: yathoktaṃ “smṛtyārakṣitamānasaḥ samāvasthācārako” “na nimittagrāhī nānuvyañjanagrāhī” yāvad vistareṇa “rakṣati mana-indriyaṃ mana-indriyeṇa saṃvaram āpadyate” /
T06srabhu_u:5796: tadyathā vyāpiny ālambane caritaviśodhane kauśalyālambane kleśaviśodhane vā /
T06srabhu_u:5800: tadyathā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca vedanā /
T06srabhu_u:5812: tadyathā sarāgaṃ cittaṃ vigatarāgaṃ sadveṣaṃ vigatadveṣaṃ samohaṃ vigatamohaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ
T06srabhu_u:5813: vikṣiptaṃ līnaṃ pragṛhītam uddhatam anuddhataṃ vyupaśāntam avyupaśāntaṃ samāhitam
T06srabhu_u:5814: asamāhitaṃ subhāvitam asubhāvitaṃ suvimuktaṃ cittam asuvimuktaṃ cittam /
T06srabhu_u:5815: tad etad abhisamasya viṃśatividhaṃ cittaṃ bhavati //
T06srabhu_u:5821: saṃkṣepo vikṣepo layaḥ pragraha auddhatyam anauddhatyaṃ vyupaśamo 'vyupaśamaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:5822: susamāhitatā na susamāhitatā subhāvitamārgatā na subhāvitamārgatā suvimuktatā na suvimuktatā ca /
T06srabhu_u:5824: tatra sukhā vedanā yat sukhavedanīyam sparśaṃ pratītyotpadyate sātaṃ veditaṃ vedanāgatam /
T06srabhu_u:5825: sā punar yā pañcavijñānasaṃprayuktā sā kāyikī,
T06srabhu_u:5827: yathā sukhavedanīyam evaṃ duḥkhavedanīyam aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyam sparśaṃ pratītyotpadyate 'sātaṃ naiva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ veditaṃ vedanāgatam /
T06srabhu_u:5829: sā punar yā pañcavijñānakāyasaṃprayuktā sā kāyikī,
T06srabhu_u:5831: yā nirvāṇānukūlā nairvedhikī atyantaniṣṭhatāyā atyantavimalatāyā atyantabrahmacaryaparyavasānāyai saṃvartate sā nirāmiṣā /
T06srabhu_u:5832: yā punar dhātupatitā bhavapatitā sā sāmiṣā /
T06srabhu_u:5833: yā punā rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktā vairāgyānukūlā vā sā naiṣkramyāśritā /
T06srabhu_u:5834: yā punaḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktā na ca vairāgyānukūlā sā gardhāśritā //
T06srabhu_u:5836: tatra sarāgaṃ cittaṃ yad rañjanīye vastuni rāgaparyavasthitam /
T06srabhu_u:5840: tatra saṃmohaṃ yan mohanīye vastuni mohaparyauasthitam /
T06srabhu_u:5842: tāny etāni ṣaṭ cittāni cārasahagatāni veditavyāni /
T06srabhu_u:5845: vikṣiptaṃ yad bahirdhā pañcasu kāmaguṇeṣv anuvisṛtam /
T06srabhu_u:5849: anuddhataṃ cittaṃ yat pragrahakāle cābhisaṃkṣepakāle copekṣāprāptam /
T06srabhu_u:5850: tatra vyupaśāntaṃ cittaṃ yan nivaraṇebhyo vimuktam /
T06srabhu_u:5852: tatra samāhitaṃ cittaṃ yan nivaraṇavimokṣān mauladhyānapraviṣṭam /
T06srabhu_u:5854: tatra subhāvitaṃ cittaṃ yat tasyaiva samādher dīrghakālaparicayān nikāmalābhī bhavaty akṛcchralābhy āśusaṃpattā /
T06srabhu_u:5855: tatra na subhāvitam cittam etadviparyayeṇa veditavyam /
T06srabhu_u:5857: tatra suvimuktaṃ cittaṃ yat sarvataś cātyantataś ca vimuktam /
T06srabhu_u:5858: na suvimuktaṃ cittaṃ yan na sarvato nāpy atyantato vimuktam /
T06srabhu_u:5860: tatra nivaraṇaviśuddhibhūmim ārabhya vihāragatāny aṣṭau cittāni /
T06srabhu_u:5861: saṃkṣiptaṃ vitkṣiptaṃ yāvad vyupaśāntam avyupaśāntam iti /
T06srabhu_u:5862: kleśaviśuddhiṃ punar ārabhya vihāragatāni ṣaṭ cittāni /
T06srabhu_u:5863: yāvat suvimuktaṃ cittaṃ na suvimuktam iti /
T06srabhu_u:5864: yat punaḥ saty adhyātmaṃ nivaraṇe “asti me nivaraṇam” iti jānāti,
T06srabhu_u:5865: asati nivaraṇe “nāsti me nivaraṇam” iti janāti /
T06srabhu_u:5866: yathā cānutpannasya nivaraṇasyotpādo bhavati tad api prajānāti,
T06srabhu_u:5867: yathā cotpannasya vigamo bhavati tad api prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:5868: tatra sati cakṣuḥsaṃyojane yāvan manaḥsaṃyojane “asti me yāvan manaḥsamyojanam” iti,
T06srabhu_u:5869: asati yāvan manaḥsaṃyojane “nāsti me yāvan manaḥsaṃyojanam” iti prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:5870: yathā cānutpannasya yāvan manaḥsaṃyojanasyotpādo bhavati tad api prajānāti,
T06srabhu_u:5871: yathā cotpannasya nirodho bhavati tad api prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:5872: saty adhyātmam smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅge “asti me smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgam” iti prajānāti,
T06srabhu_u:5874: yathā cānutpannasya smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgasyotpādo bhavati tad api prajānāti,
T06srabhu_u:5875: yathā cotpannasya sthitir bhavaty asaṃmoṣo bhāvanāparipūribhūyobhāvavṛddhivipulatā tad api prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:5877: yad evaṃ svabhāvanidānādīnavapratipakṣākāraiḥ saṃkliṣṭadharmaparijñānam idaṃ śarīraṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānasya //
T06srabhu_u:5878: yathā kāye kāyānupaśyanā smṛtyupasthānam uktam evaṃ vedanāyāṃ citte dharmeṣu yathāyogaṃ veditavyam /
T06srabhu_u:5879: tatra katham adhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānudarśī viharati,
T06srabhu_u:5882: yadā adhyātmaṃ pratyātmaṃ sattvasaṃkhyāte kāye kāyānupaśyī viharati,
T06srabhu_u:5886: yadā bahirdhā parakyaṃ sattvasaṃkhyātaṃ rūpam ālambanīkaroti,
T06srabhu_u:5888: tatrādhyātmaṃ rūpam upādāya svakyaṃ sattvasaṃkhyātaṃ yā utpannā vedanā cittaṃ dharmās tān ālambanīkurvann adhyātmaṃ vedanāsu citte dharmeṣu dharmānudarśī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:5889: bāhyam asattvasaṃkhyātaṃ rūpam upādāya yā utpannā vedanā cittaṃ dharmās tān ālambanīkurvan bahirdhā vedanāyāṃ citte dharmeṣu dharmānudarśī viharati
T06srabhu_u:5891: bahirdhā bāhyaṃ rūpaṃ sattvasaṃkhyātam upādāya yā utpannā vedanā cittaṃ dharmās tān ālambanīkurvann adhyātmabahirdhā vedanāyāṃ citte dharmeṣu dharmānudarśī viharati //
T06srabhu_u:5893: indriyasaṃgṛhītaṃ rūpam ālambanīkurvann adhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānupaśyī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:5894: anindriyasaṃgṛhītaṃ rūpam anupagatam anupādattam ālambanīkurvan bahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:5895: anindriyasaṃgṛhītam eva rūpam adhyātmam upagatam upādattaṃ rūpam ālambanīkurvann adhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānupaśyī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:5896: evaṃ pūrvaṃ trividhaṃ rūpam upādāya yā utpannā vedanā cittaṃ dharmās tān yathāyogam ālambanīkurvaṃs tathādarśī viharatīti veditavyam //
T06srabhu_u:5898: yat samāhitabhūmikaṃ praśrabdhisahagataṃ rūpam ālambanīkaroty evam adhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:5899: yat svakyam evādhyātmam asamāhitabhūmikaṃ dauṣṭhulyasahagataṃ rūpam ālambanīkaroty evaṃ bahirdhā kāye kāyānupaśyī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:5900: parakyaṃ dauṣṭhulyasahagataṃ praśrabdhisahagataṃ ca rūpam ālambanīkurvann adhyātmabahirdhā (Śbh II 192)
T06srabhu_u:5901: kāye kāyānudarśī viharaty evaṃ tad upādāyotpannā vedanā cittaṃ dharmā yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ //
T06srabhu_u:5903: adhyātmaṃ bhūtarūpam ālambanīkurvann adhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:5904: bāhyaṃ bhūtarūpam ālambanīkurvan bahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:5905: tac ca bhūtarūpam upādāya yad utpannam indriyaviṣayasaṃgṛhītam upādāyarūpaṃ cālambanīkurvann adhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:5906: evaṃ tad upādāya yā utpannā vedanā cittaṃ dharmās te 'pi yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ //
T06srabhu_u:5908: yadā savijñānakaṃ kāyam adhyātmam ālambanīkaroty evam adhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:5909: avijñānakaṃ rūpaṃ sattvasaṃkhyātaṃ vinīlakādiṣv avasthāsv ālambanīkurvan bahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:5910: avijñānakasya ca rūpasyātīte kāle savijñānatāṃ savijñānakasya ca rūpasyānāgate kāle
T06srabhu_u:5911: 'vijñānatāṃ tulyadharmatāṃ samadharmatām ālambanīkurvann adhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:5912: evaṃ tad upādāya yā utpannā vedanā cittaṃ dharmās te 'pi yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ //
T06srabhu_u:5914: ātmano 'ntaḥkāyaṃ keśaromanakhādibhir ākārair ālambanīkurvann adhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:5915: pareṣām antaḥkāyaṃ keśaromanakhādibhir ākārair ālambanīkurvan bahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /
T06srabhu_u:5916: ātmanaś ca bahiḥkāyam avipariṇataṃ vinīlakādibhir ākāraiḥ (Śbh II 194)
T06srabhu_u:5917: pareṣāṃ ca bahiḥkāyaṃ vipariṇatam avipariṇataṃ ca vinīlakādibhir ākārais tulyadharmatayālambanīkurvann adhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati
T06srabhu_u:5918: tad upādāya yā utpannā vedanā cittaṃ dharmās te 'pi yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:5919: ity evaṃbhāgīyāḥ kāyavedanācittadharmaprabhedena bahavaḥ paryāyā veditavyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:5921: tatra caturṇāṃ viparyāsānāṃ pratipakṣeṇa bhagavatā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni vyavasthāpitāni /
T06srabhu_u:5923: tathā hi bhagavatā kāyasmṛtyupasthānabhāvanāyām aśubhāpratisamyuktāś catasraḥ śivapathikā deśitāḥ,
T06srabhu_u:5926: tatra duḥkhe sukham iti viparyāsapratipakṣeṇa vedanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ vyavasthāpitam /
T06srabhu_u:5927: vedanāsu vedanānudarśī viharan “yat kiṃcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasye“ti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
T06srabhu_u:5928: evam asya yo duḥkhe sukham iti viparyāsaḥ sa prahāyate /
T06srabhu_u:5929: tatra anitye nityam iti viparyāsapratipakṣeṇa cittasmṛtyupasthānaṃ vyavasthāpitam /
T06srabhu_u:5930: tasya sarāgādicittaprabhedena teṣāṃ teṣāṃ rātriṃdivasānām atyayāt kṣaṇalavamuhūrtānām anekavidhānāṃ bahunānāprakāratāṃ (Śbh II 196)
T06srabhu_u:5931: cittasyopalabhya yo 'nitye nityam iti viparyāsaḥ sa prahīyate /
T06srabhu_u:5933: tasya yeṣām ātmadṛṣṭyādikānāṃ saṃkleśānāṃ sadbhāvād yeṣām anātmadṛṣṭyādikānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām asadbhāvāt skandheṣv ātmadarśanaṃ bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:5935: svalakṣaṇataḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇataś ca dharmān dharmānudarśino yathābhūtaṃ paśyataḥ,
T06srabhu_u:5939: skandheṣu skandhamātraṃ dharmamātraṃ yathābhūtam aprajānan yathā “kāya āśritaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:5944: yatraiva ca te citte manasi vijñāna ātmagrāheṇa saṃmūḍhā ātmavastusaṃmohāpanayanārthena cittasmṛtyupasthānaṃ vyavasthāpitam /
T06srabhu_u:5952: tat sarvam ekadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni vyavasthāpitāni,
T06srabhu_u:5953: tatra kāye karoti vedanārthaṃ cittaṃ kuśalākuśalair dharmaiḥ //
T06srabhu_u:5955: yatra ca saṃkliśyate viśudhyate yataś ca yaś ca yena kliśyate viśudhyate,
T06srabhu_u:5956: tad ekadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni vyavasthāpitāni,
T06srabhu_u:5957: tatra kāye saṃkliśyate viśudhyate ca vedanābhyaś cittaṃ dharmaiḥ saṃkliśyate viśudhyate ca //
T06srabhu_u:5961: yatra ca smṛtim upasthāpayati yena ca smṛtim upasthāpayati tad ucyate smṛtyupasthānam /
T06srabhu_u:5963: yena smṛtim upasthāpayati tatra yā prajñā smṛtiś ca samādhisaṃgrāhikā tat svabhāvasmṛtyupasthānam /
T06srabhu_u:5965: api ca kāyavedanācittadharmādhipateyo yo mārgaḥ samutpannaḥ kuśalaḥ sāsravo 'nāsravaś ca tat smṛtyupasthānam /
T06srabhu_u:5966: sa punaḥ śrutamayaś cintāmayo bhāvanāmayaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:5970: sa evaṃ caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu kṛtaparicaya audārikaudārikaṃ viparyāsam apanīya kuśalākuśaladharmābhijñaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:5974: utpannānām sthitaya” iti vistareṇa pūrvavad yāvac cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti pradadhāti //
T06srabhu_u:5976: yat kāmāvacaraṃ kliṣṭaṃ kāyakarma vākkarma manaskarma kāyavāṅmanoduścaritasaṃgṛhītam,
T06srabhu_u:5977: ye ca tatsamutthāpakāḥ kleśās te punar ye 'samavahitā asaṃmukhībhūtās te 'nutpannāḥ,
T06srabhu_u:5979: tatra kuśalā dharmā ye tatprātipakṣikā dharmā duścaritaprātipakṣikā nivaraṇaprātipakṣikāḥ saṃyojanaprātipakṣikā vā /
T06srabhu_u:5980: te 'py anutpannās tathaiva veditavyā utpannāś ca yathā pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ //
T06srabhu_u:5981: tatra yadānutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāya spṛhām utpādayati praṇidhatte “sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā notpādayiṣyāmī“ti,
T06srabhu_u:5983: utpannān vā punaḥ samavahitān “sarveṇa sarvaṃ nādhivāsayiṣyāmi prahāsyāmi prativinodayiṣyāmi” /
T06srabhu_u:5984: yad anutpanneṣu pāpakeṣv akuśaleṣu dharmeṣu pūrvam evānutpādāya spṛhām utpādayati praṇidhatte nādhivāsayitukāmo bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:5989: te punaḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmā atītavastvālambanā vā anāgatavastvālambanā vā vartamānaviṣayālambanā votpadyante,
T06srabhu_u:5993: tatra parokṣaviṣayālambanānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpannānām anutpādāya,
T06srabhu_u:5995: pratyakṣaviṣayālambanānāṃ punar anutpannānām anutpādāyotpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya vīryam ārabhate /
T06srabhu_u:5996: tathā hi teṣāṃ dṛḍhatareṇa vīryārambheṇānutpattiḥ prahāṇaṃ vā bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:5997: api ca mṛdumadhyānāṃ paryavasthānānām anutpannānām anutpādāya,
T06srabhu_u:6002: tathā carati yathāsya tenālambanena kleśo notpadyate /
T06srabhu_u:6003: sacet punaḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣād utpadyate nādhivāsayati prajahāti vinodayati vyantīkaroti /
T06srabhu_u:6005: (Śbh II 204) evam ayam anutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāyotpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya “vyāyacchata” ity ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:6007: tathā tathā carati yathā tenālambanena kleśo notpadyate /
T06srabhu_u:6008: sacet punaḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣād utpadyata utpannaṃ nādhivāsayati prajahāti vinodayati vyantīkaroti /
T06srabhu_u:6009: evam anutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāyotpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya “vīryam ārabhata” ity ucyate //
T06srabhu_u:6010: santi pāpakā akuśalā dharmā ye saṃkalpavaśenotpadyante na viṣayabalena,
T06srabhu_u:6011: santi ye saṃkalpabalena ca viṣayabalena ca /
T06srabhu_u:6017: tatra ye saṃkalpabalenotpadyante teṣām anutpannānām anutpādāya,
T06srabhu_u:6019: tatra ye viṣayabalena saṃkalpabalena cotpadyante teṣām anutpannānām anutpādāya,
T06srabhu_u:6022: tatr“ānutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāya cchandaṃ janayatī“ti /
T06srabhu_u:6023: ye kuśalā dharmā apratilabdhā asaṃmukhībhūtāś ca teṣāṃ pratilambhāya saṃmukhībhāvāya ca spṛhām utpādayati cittaṃ praṇidhatte,
T06srabhu_u:6024: tīvrā pratilabdhukāmatā saṃmukhīkartukāmatā cāsya pratyupasthitā bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:6026: “utpannānāṃ ca kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām sthitaye 'saṃmoṣāya bhāvanāparipūraye chandaṃ janayatī“ti,
T06srabhu_u:6027: “utpannāḥ kuśalā dharmā” ye pratilabdhāḥ saṃmukhībhūtāś ca /
T06srabhu_u:6030: teṣām eva ca kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratilabdhānāṃ saṃmukhībhūtānām āsevanānvayāt pariniṣpattiṃ niṣṭhāgamanam adhikṛtyāha “bhāvanāparipūraya” iti
T06srabhu_u:6031: tatra ca spṛhām utpādayati cittaṃ praṇidhatte tīvrā cāsya sthitikāmatā asaṃmoṣakāmatā bhāvanāparipūrikāmatā pratyupasthitā bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:6032: ayam ucyata “utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye 'saṃmoṣāya bhāvanāparipūraye chandaḥ” //
T06srabhu_u:6037: api ca mṛdumadhyānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpannānām utpādāya,
T06srabhu_u:6040: utpannānāṃ ca yāvad bhāvanāparipūraye vīryam ārabhate /
T06srabhu_u:6042: yadā tac cittaṃ śamathabhāvanāyām ekāgratāyāṃ prayuktaṃ bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:6043: anutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāya, (Śbh II 208)
T06srabhu_u:6044: evaṃ vistareṇa yāvad utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye 'saṃmoṣāya bhāvanāparipūraye tac ca tathādhyātmam abhisaṃkṣiptaṃ līnatvāya paraiti,
T06srabhu_u:6046: tadānyatamānyatamena pragrāhakeṇa nimittena prasadanīyena pratigṛhṇāti saṃharṣayati /
T06srabhu_u:6049: punar uddhatam auddhatyābhiśaṅki vā pragrahakāle paśyati,
T06srabhu_u:6050: tadā punar apy adhyātmam abhisaṃkṣipati śamathāya praṇidadhāti //
T06srabhu_u:6053: utpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya cchando vyāyāmo vīryārambhaś cittapragrahaḥ pradadhanam ime dve samyakprahāṇe /
T06srabhu_u:6058: yad “utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya cchandaṃ janayatī“ti vistareṇa /
T06srabhu_u:6062: anutpannaṃ ca yat tad asamudācārataḥ prahīṇam eva tad asaṃmukhībhāvataḥ prahātavyaṃ iti kṛtvā,
T06srabhu_u:6066: “anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāye“ti vistareṇa yāvac “cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti pradadhātī“ti /
T06srabhu_u:6068: tathā hi kuśalā dharmā āsevyamānā bhāvyamānā,
T06srabhu_u:6073: “utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye” vistareṇa yāvac “cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti,
T06srabhu_u:6075: tathā hi pratilabdheṣu saṃmukhīkṛteṣu ca kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu yā pramādavarjanā apramādaniṣevaṇā ca sā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye,
T06srabhu_u:6078: evam utpannāḥ kuśalā dharmā anurakṣitā bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:6082: kṛṣṇaśuklapakṣikasya tyāgādānavastuno 'dhyāśayasaṃpat prayogasaṃpac ca paridīpitā bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:6086: yat prahātavyasya vastunaḥ prahāṇāya prāptavyasya ca vastunaḥ prāptaye pūrvam eva spṛhājātena bhavitavyam,
T06srabhu_u:6089: paryavasthānaprahāṇānuśayaprahāṇāya ca ye pratipakṣikā dharmāḥ kuśalās te samudānayitavyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6090: tac caitat sarvaṃ caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiḥ paridīpitaṃ bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:6097: tatra cchandam adhipatiṃ kṛtvā yaḥ pratilabhyate samādhir ayaṃ chandasamādhiḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6099: mīmāṃsām adhipatiṃ kṛtvā yaḥ pratilabhyate samādhir ayaṃ mīmāṃsāsamādhiḥ //
T06srabhu_u:6100: yadā tāvad ayaṃ chandam eva kevalaṃ janayati /
T06srabhu_u:6101: chandajātaś ca tān pāpakān akuśalān dharmān svabhāvato nidānata ādīnavataḥ pratipakṣataś ca samyag evopanidadhyāti,
T06srabhu_u:6103: evaṃ kuśalān dharmān svabhāvato nidānato 'nuśaṃsato niḥsaraṇataḥ samyag evopanidadhyāti,
T06srabhu_u:6109: sa atīte vānāgatapratyutpanne vā punar ālambane pāpakākuśaladharmasthānīye mṛdumadhyādhimātrakleśaparyavasthānīye,
T06srabhu_u:6114: tasya vālambanasya svabhāvato nidānata ādīnavataḥ pratipakṣataś ca samyag upanidhyāyataḥ,
T06srabhu_u:6117: na tv adyāpy anuśayaṃ samudghātayati pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām /
T06srabhu_u:6121: kālena ca kālam adhyupekṣito yat pāpakākuśalān dharmān pāpakākuśaladharmasthānīyānvayān,
T06srabhu_u:6122: kuśalākuśalān dharmān kuśalākuśalasthānīyāṃś ca dharmān svabhāvato nidānata ādīnavato 'nuśaṃsataḥ pratipakṣato niḥsaraṇataḥ,
T06srabhu_u:6128: tatra ye pāpakākuśaladharmasthānīyā dharmā bhavanty ayoniśomanasikurvataḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6132: te pāpakā akuśalā dharmā na samudācaranti /
T06srabhu_u:6134: “kiṃ sataḥ saṃvidyamānān pāpakān akuśalān dharmān na pratisaṃvedayāmy āhosvid asato 'saṃvidyamānān yan nv ahaṃ parimīmāṃseyam” /
T06srabhu_u:6135: sa mīmāṃsāmanaskāram adhipatiṃ kṛtvā prahīṇāprahīṇatāṃ mīmāṃsate,
T06srabhu_u:6140: “paryavasthānamātrakān me cittaṃ vimuktaṃ na tu sarveṇa sarvam anuśayebhyaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:6141: tatpratipakṣāś ca me samādhipramukhāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ pratilabdhā,
T06srabhu_u:6143: na tv anuśayaprātipakṣikā” iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06srabhu_u:6146: sa taṃ caturvidhaṃ samādhim adhipatiṃ kṛtvā paryavasthāneṣu dūrīkṛteṣu,
T06srabhu_u:6147: sarveṇa sarvam anuśayasamudghātāya pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tatprātipakṣikāṇāñ
T06srabhu_u:6148: ca kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samudāgamāya punar api chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchata iti vistareṇa
T06srabhu_u:6153: anuśayāṃś ca prahāsyāmi pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām” /
T06srabhu_u:6155: śraddhā yā avinyastaprayogasya viharata uttare 'dhigame śraddadhānatā,
T06srabhu_u:6157: tatra praśrabdhir yac chraddhāprasādapūrvaṃgamaṃ prāmodyaṃ prītiḥ,
T06srabhu_u:6163: tatra cetanā yaś cittābhisaṃskāraḥ prahīṇāprahīṇatāṃ mīmāṃsamānasya yaś cittābhisaṃskāraḥ śamathavipaśyanānukūlaḥ kāyakarma vākkarma samutthāpayati
T06srabhu_u:6164: tatropekṣā yātitānāgatapratyutpanneṣu pāpakākuśaladharmasthānīyeṣu carataś cittāsaṃkleśā cittasamatā /
T06srabhu_u:6165: ābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ prahīṇatām anuśayānāṃ paricchinatti jānāti /
T06srabhu_u:6172: yā ca praśrabdhir yā ca smṛtir yac ca saṃprajanyaṃ yā ca cetanā yā copekṣā ayam upāyaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6175: ye ceme prahāṇasaṃskārāḥ prahīṇeṣv anuśayeṣu pariniṣpanne samādhau,
T06srabhu_u:6181: tadyathā yasya pādaḥ saṃvidyate so 'bhikramapratikramaparākramasamartho bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:6193: eṣā hi parā ṛddhiḥ parā samṛddhiḥ,
T06srabhu_u:6196: sa evaṃ samādhipratiṣṭhitaḥ samādhiṃ niśrityādhicittaṃśikṣāyām adhiprajñaṃśikṣāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti /
T06srabhu_u:6197: tatrāsya yogaṃ kurvataḥ pareṣāṃ cādhigame śāstuḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ ca yo 'bhisaṃpratyayaḥ prasādaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6202: ye 'pi te vīryādayas teṣām api lokottaradharmotpattaya ādhipatyam /
T06srabhu_u:6208: yā punaḥ pūrveṇāparaṃ viśeṣādhigamaṃ saṃjānatas tadanusāreṇa taduttaralokottaradharmādhigamāyābhisaṃpratyayaḥ prasādaḥ śraddadhānatā /
T06srabhu_u:6217: tatpramukhās tatpūrvaṃgamā ye vīryādayas te 'pi balānīty ucyante /
T06srabhu_u:6218: taiḥ sa balair balavān sarvaṃ mārabalaṃ vijitya prayujyata āsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya /
T06srabhu_u:6220: tatra yac ca śraddhendriyaṃ yac ca śraddhābalaṃ caturṣv etad avetyaprasādeṣu draṣṭavyam /
T06srabhu_u:6222: yo 'sau samyaktvanyāmāvakrāntasyāvetyaprasādaḥ sa taddhetukas tatpratyayas tannidānaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6223: tasmād dhetuphalasaṃbandhena tasyās tad adhipatiphalam iti kṛtvā tatra draṣṭavyam ity uktaṃ bhagavatā,
T06srabhu_u:6230: tāni hy atyantatāyai pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya saṃvartante /
T06srabhu_u:6237: iti yat satyajñānaṃ caturṇām āryasatyānām abhisamayāya saṃvartate śrāmaṇyaphalaprāptaye /
T06srabhu_u:6239: sa eṣām indriyāṇām eteṣāṃ ca balānām āsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayād bahulīkārānvayān nirvedhabhāgīyāni kuśalamūlāny utpādayati mṛdumadhyādhimātrāṇi
T06srabhu_u:6241: tadyathā kaścid eva puruṣo 'gnināgnikāryaṃ kartukāmo 'gninārthy adharāraṇyām uttarāraṇiṃ pratiṣṭhāpyābhimathnann utsahate ghaṭate vyāyacchate
T06srabhu_u:6242: tasyotsahato ghaṭato vyāyacchataś ca tatprathamato 'dharāraṇyām ūṣmā jāyate /
T06srabhu_u:6248: yathābhimanthanavyāyāma evaṃ pañcānām indriyāṇām āsevanā draṣṭavyā /
T06srabhu_u:6251: pūrvaṃgamāni nimittabhūtāny agnisthānīyānām anāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kleśaparidāhakānām utpattaye /
T06srabhu_u:6252: yathā tasyaivoṣmaṇa ūrdhvam āgamanam evaṃ mūrdhāno draṣṭavyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6253: yathā dhūmaprādurbhāva evaṃ satyānulomāḥ kṣāntayo draṣṭavyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6254: yathāgneḥ patanaṃ nirarciṣa evaṃ laukikāgradharmā draṣṭavyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6255: yathā tadanantaram arciṣa utpāda evaṃ lokottarānāsravā dharmā draṣṭavyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6256: ye laukikāgradharmasaṃgṛhītānāṃ pañcānām indriyāṇāṃ samanantaram utpadyante //
T06srabhu_u:6260: yo 'sau yathābhūtāvabodhaḥ samyaktvanyāmāvakrāntasya pudgalasya tasyaitāny aṅgāni /
T06srabhu_u:6268: yā ca prītir itīmāni trīṇi vipaśyanāpakṣyāṇi /
T06srabhu_u:6274: sa tasmin samaye tatprathamato bodhyaṅgalābhāc chaikṣo bhavati dṛṣṭapadaḥ //
T06srabhu_u:6277: sa teṣāṃ prahāṇāya triskandham āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
T06srabhu_u:6289: āryasya śaikṣasya dṛṣṭapadasyāyaṃ mārga iyaṃ pratipad aṣṭābhir aṅgaiḥ saṃgṛhītaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:6292: tatra yaś ca bodhyaṅgakāle tattvāvabodhaḥ pratilabdhaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:6293: pratilabhya ca yat tasyaiva prajñayā vyavasthānaṃ karoti yathādhigatasyāvabodhasya,
T06srabhu_u:6294: tad ubhayam ekadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya samyagdṛṣṭir ity ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:6295: tāṃ samyagdṛṣṭim adhipatiṃ kṛtvā yan naiṣkramyasaṃkalpaṃ saṃkalpayaty avyāpādasaṃkalpam avihiṃsāsaṃkalpam /
T06srabhu_u:6300: samyagdṛṣṭim adhipatiṃ kṛtvā tenaiva kuśalāt saṃkalpād dharmyāṃ kathāṃ kathayati /
T06srabhu_u:6306: vihāragato vā punaḥ paryeṣiteṣu cīvarādiṣu gate sthite niṣaṇṇe yāvan nidrāklamaprativinodane saṃprajānadvihārī bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:6308: sa tac cīvaraṃ yāvad bhaiṣajyapariṣkāraṃ dharmeṇa paryeṣate /
T06srabhu_u:6312: te 'nena pūrvam eva manaskāralābhād bodhyaṅgair eva saha labdhā bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:6315: dīrghakālaṃ hy etad āryāṇāṃ satāṃ samyaggatānām iṣṭaṃ kāntaṃ priyaṃ mana-āpaṃ “kaccid ahaṃ tad vāgduścaritasya kāyaduścaritasya mithyājīvasyākaraṇaṃ saṃvaraṃ pratilabheyam” /
T06srabhu_u:6316: yad asya dīrgharātram iṣṭaṃ kāntaṃ priyaṃ mana-āpaṃ tad anena tasmin samaye pratilabdhaṃ bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:6318: tathā hi sa labdheṣv āryakānteṣu śīleṣu,
T06srabhu_u:6324: iti tāny āryakāntāni śīlāny adhipatiṃ kṛtvā mārgabhāvanākāle yā vāk pravartate yac ca kāyakarma yaś cājīvaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:6326: tasya samyagdṛṣṭisamyaksaṃkalpavākkarmāntājīvasanniśrayeṇa bhāvanāprayuktasya yac chando vīryo vyāyāmo niṣkramaḥ parākramasthāmārambhaś cetasaḥ saṃpragrahaḥ sātatyam /
T06srabhu_u:6328: yac catvāri smṛtyupasthānāny adhipatiṃ kṛtvāviparyāsasaṃgṛhītā smṛtir navākārā navākāracittasthitisaṃgrāhikā /
T06srabhu_u:6330: tad etat sarvam abhisamasyāryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś cārakaraṇīye ca vihārakaraṇīye cāvasthitaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6337: tatra yā ca samyaksmṛtir yaś ca samyaksamādhir ayaṃ śamathaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6338: evaṃ pariśuddhān vākkarmāntājīvān niśritya śamathavipaśyanāṃ bhāvayati kālena kālaṃ niravaśeṣasaṃyojanaprahāṇaṃ sākṣātkaroty agraphalam arhattvaṃ (Śbh II 236) prāpnoti /
T06srabhu_u:6339: prākarṣikaś ca bhāvanāmārgaḥ kālāntarābhyāsena kleśān prajahāti /
T06srabhu_u:6340: jñānamātrapratibaddhas tu darśanamārgo jñānotpattimātrakeṇa kleśān prajahāti /
T06srabhu_u:6342: iti ya evam eṣām anayānupūrvyā saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām abhyāsaḥ paricayaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6353: api ca pūrvotpannasya mārgasya paścād utpanno mārgaḥ phalaṃ madhyo viśiṣṭo vā sadṛśo vā /
T06srabhu_u:6354: punas tatra kena kāraṇena catvāri vyavasthāpitāni /
T06srabhu_u:6357: tadyathā nirvastukānāṃ kleśānām apāyagamanīyānām apāyagamanahetubhūtānāṃ prahāṇāt pratipakṣotpādāc ca srota-āpattiphalaṃ vyavasthāpitam /
T06srabhu_u:6358: trayāṇāṃ tu saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād vyavasthāpitaṃ bhagavatā triṣu pakṣeṣu,
T06srabhu_u:6363: yayāyam ādita eva na prayujyata ity ādita uttrāsikā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6368: na ca mithyāpratipanno 'pi tv anabhyāsāt tasya yāvad yathābhūtadarśanaṃ na bhavati jñeye vastuni tāvat kāṅkṣā vimatayo vibandhakarā bhavanti (Śbh II 240)
T06srabhu_u:6372: tasyāsya srota-āpannasya paraṃ sapta bhavā avaśiṣṭā bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:6373: sa cāsya janmaprabandho yadā ca janmaprābandhikān kleśān prajahāti devabhavasaṃgṛhītān manuṣyabhavasaṃgṛhītāṃś ca,
T06srabhu_u:6374: yeṣāṃ prahāṇāt param ekaṃ devabhavam abhinirvartayaty ekaṃ manuṣyabhavam /
T06srabhu_u:6376: yadā tu devabhavam eva kevalam abhinirvartayati,
T06srabhu_u:6380: tat punaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ trayāṇām saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād rāgadveṣamohānāṃ ca tanutvād bhagavatā vyavasthāpitam,
T06srabhu_u:6384: tatra ye rāgadveṣamohamānavitarkacariteṣu pudgaleṣu pūrvaṃ tāvac (Śbh II 242)
T06srabhu_u:6385: caritaviśodhana ālambane caritaṃ viśodhayitavyaṃ tataḥ paścāc cittasthitim adhigacchanti /
T06srabhu_u:6386: teṣāṃ pratiniyatam eva tad ālambanam avaśyaṃ tais tenālambanena prayoktavyam /
T06srabhu_u:6387: samabhāgacaritasya tu yatra priyārohitā tatra tena prayoktavyaṃ kevalaṃ cittasthitaye,
T06srabhu_u:6393: mandarajaskas tv āśu tvaritatvaritaṃ cittasthitim adhigacchati //
T06srabhu_u:6395: samabhāgacaritasya pudgalasya mandarajaskasya ca katamāni liṅgāni /
T06srabhu_u:6397: samabhāgacaritasya pudgalasya sarvāṇi tāni liṅgāni saṃvidyante yāni rāgādicaritānām,
T06srabhu_u:6398: tāni rāgādīni tu nādhimātrāṇi na pradhānāni yathā rāgādicaritānām /
T06srabhu_u:6403: prasādabahulo medhāvī puṇyavān guṇānvitaś ca bhavati //
T06srabhu_u:6405: tatra trīṇy āvaraṇāni karmāvaraṇaṃ kleśāvaraṇaṃ vipākāvaraṇam /
T06srabhu_u:6407: yac cānyad api kiṃcit karma saṃcetanīyaṃ gurukarma vipakvavipākaṃ mārgotpattaye nibandhakārakam /
T06srabhu_u:6409: yā dṛṣṭe dharme caritaviśodhanenālambanaviśodhanena na śakyate viśodhayitum /
T06srabhu_u:6414: apratibalo bhavati subhāṣitadurbhāṣitānāṃ dharmāṇām artham ājñātum //
T06srabhu_u:6415: tatrādiśuddhiḥ śīlaṃ ca suviśuddhaṃ dṛṣṭiś ca ṛjvī /
T06srabhu_u:6416: tatra śīlaṃ suviśuddhaṃ daśabhiḥ kāraṇair veditavyam /
T06srabhu_u:6436: dharmāṇāṃ vānityatām ārabhya duḥkhatāṃ śūnyatām anātmatām arthaḥ suvicintito bhavati sutulitaḥ sūpaparīkṣitaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:6439: itīyaṃ caturākārā dṛṣṭir yathoddiṣṭā dṛṣṭyṛjutety ucyate //
T06srabhu_u:6444: tatra puṇyasaṃbhāro yenāpy etarhy ānulomikāḥ pariṣkārāḥ pracurā bhavanti pradakṣiṇāḥ,
T06srabhu_u:6453: tatra pūrvako yenaitarhi paripakvānīndriyāṇi labhate pūrvakuśalamūlopacayāt /
T06srabhu_u:6455: tathā paripakvendriyasya śīlasaṃvara indriyasaṃvara iti vistareṇa pūrvavat //
T06srabhu_u:6457: na śāstari kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati prasīdaty adhimucyate,
T06srabhu_u:6461: cireṇa dharmam arthaṃ ca na vismārayati,
T06srabhu_u:6463: tatra kṛtapuṇyatā yayābhirūpo bhavati darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko dīrghāyur bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:6464: ādeyavākyo maheśākhyo jñāto bhavati mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarādīnām,
T06srabhu_u:6466: tatra guṇānvita iti guṇā alpecchatādayo veditavyāḥ,
T06srabhu_u:6469: itīmāny evaṃbhāgīyāni mandarajaskasya pudgalasya liṅgāni veditavyāni //
T06srabhu_u:6473: tadyathā śramaṇo brāhmaṇo brahmacārī bhikṣur yatiḥ pravrajitaś ceti //
T06srabhu_u:6487: api ca śaikṣāśaikṣā mārgajinā ity ucyante,
T06srabhu_u:6489: tatra tathāgato bodhisattvāś cāyatyāṃ bodhāya pratipannāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6490: śrāvakāś ca sūtradharā vinayadharā mātṛkādharāś ca,
T06srabhu_u:6494: tatra ye pṛthagjanakalyāṇakā ātmahitāya pratipannā lajjināḥ kaukṛtikāḥ śikṣākāmāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6498: bhavyāś ca pratibalā yāvad asākṣātkṛtasya (Śbh II 252)
T06srabhu_u:6501: apy eṣām ūṣmā yenema āryasya prajñendriyasyotpattaye na mṛtā jīvantīty ucyante /
T06srabhu_u:6503: tatra yo 'yaṃ pudgalo duḥśīlaḥ pāpadharmā yāvad abrahmacārī brahmacāripratijñaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6514: yatrāryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ prajñāyate tatra prathamaśramaṇas tatra yāvac caturtha iti //
T06srabhu_u:6523: tatra saṃjñābrāhmaṇa iti loke nāma bhavati saṃjñā samajñā prajñaptir vyavahāraḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6527: vāhitā bhavanty anena pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6528: yathoktaṃ na kāryaṃ brāhmaṇasyāsti kṛtārtho brāhmaṇaḥ smṛta iti //
T06srabhu_u:6532: yo brahmacaryād maithunadharmāt prativirato bhavati samādattaśikṣaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6553: abhidhyāvyāpādamithyādṛṣṭikrodhopanāhamrakṣapradāśādīny āpāyikāni sthānāni nairayikāṇi durgatigāmīny aśramaṇakārakāṇy utpannotpannāni,
T06srabhu_u:6562: api ca pravrājayaty ātmanaḥ pāpakān akuśalān dharmān,
T06srabhu_u:6565: tadyathā tīrthikaparivrājo nirgrantho vā parivrājakaḥ pāṇḍuraka iti,
T06srabhu_u:6567: tenāha śramaṇo brāhmaṇo brahmacārī bhikṣur yatiḥ pravrajita iti pudgalaparyāyāḥ //
T06srabhu_u:6577: eṣām evāṣṭānāṃ pudgalānāṃ vyavasthānāya catvāri prabhedanidānāni bhavanti /
T06srabhu_u:6580: prayogabhedaḥ sātatyasatkṛtya na sātatyasatkṛtya prayuktaś ca /
T06srabhu_u:6582: itīme catvāraḥ prabhedāḥ kathaṃ nidānāni bhavanty aṣṭānāṃ pudgalānāṃ vyavasthānāya /
T06srabhu_u:6587: sātatyasatkṛtya prayogī sātatiko nipaka ity ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:6591: ity evam indriyaprabhedena yogaprayogakālaprabhedenāṣṭānāṃ pudgalānāṃ vyavasthānam /
T06srabhu_u:6595: tatra paripakvendriyaś ced bhavati na copāyajño bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:6598: paripakvendriyo bhavaty upāyajño na satatiko na kṣiprābhijño bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:6599: tatra paripakvendriyo bhavaty upāyajño sātatiko na kṛtaparicayaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:6601: yataś ca paripakvendriyo bhavaty upāyajñaḥ sātatikaḥ kṛtaparicayaś ca bhavati,
T06srabhu_u:6606: tatra catvāro mārāḥ saṃbahulāni mārakarmāṇi veditavyāni yoginā yogaprayuktena /
T06srabhu_u:6615: teṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmāt tasmāt sattvanikāyād yan maraṇaṃ kālakriyā maraṇamāraḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6616: yo 'sya kuśalapakṣaprayuktasya skandhakleśamṛtyusamatikramāya kāmadhātūpapanno devaputra aiśvaryaprāptaḥ,
T06srabhu_u:6622: yena ca mṛtyuṃ na samatikrāmaty antarāyikena vastunā /
T06srabhu_u:6623: ity etad adhikṛtya catvāro mārā vyavasthāpitāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6627: cyutiś ca cyavanatā sattvānāṃ jīvitendriyanirodhaḥ kālakriyā svabhāvata eva mṛtyuḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6629: yena naiva vā śaknoti maraṇadharmatāṃ samatikramitum,
T06srabhu_u:6631: tatrāvaśagato mārasya bhavati laukikamārgavītarāgaḥ pṛthagjana (Śbh II 264)
T06srabhu_u:6638: yasmāt sa punar apy āgantā imāṃ dhātum //
T06srabhu_u:6641: yasya kasyacit kuśalo dharmacchandaḥ samutpanno naiṣkramyopasaṃhitaḥ kāmagredham adhipatiṃ kṛtvā pravartate,
T06srabhu_u:6644: yasya rañjanīyeṣu rūpeṣu śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmeṣu nimittagrāhitāyām anuvyañjanagrāhitāyāṃ cittaṃ praskandati,
T06srabhu_u:6647: praṇīteṣu raseṣu chandarāgam anunayena cittaṃ praskandati bhaktavaiṣamye /
T06srabhu_u:6654: abhikramapratikramādiṣu śiśum udāravarṇaṃ rañjanīyaṃ mātṛgrāmaṃ dṛṣṭvāyoniśo nimittagrāheṇa cittaṃ praskandati /
T06srabhu_u:6657: tadyathā gṛhasthapravrajitaiḥ saṃsargarāmatāyāṃ pāpamitraiḥ sahaikavyavasitāyāṃ dṛṣṭyanumataye cittaṃ praskandati /
T06srabhu_u:6673: kaścid upasaṃkramyāyoniśaḥ śuklapakṣād vicchindayati kṛṣṇapakṣe ca samādāpayati,
T06srabhu_u:6676: mātsarye mahecchatāyām asaṃtuṣṭau krodhopanāhakuhanālapanādiṣu śramaṇālaṃkāravipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ praskandati,
T06srabhu_u:6678: itīmāny evaṃbhāgīyāni mārakarmāṇi veditavyāni tāni caturṇāṃ mārāṇāṃ yathāyogam //
T06srabhu_u:6680: tatra tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ samyakprayuktasyāpy ārambho viphalo bhavati /
T06srabhu_u:6709: avavādaś ca śikṣā ca tathā śikṣānulomikāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6710: yogabhraṃśaś ca yogaś ca manaskāraś ca yoginaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6712: māraś ca mārakarmāṇi ārambho viphalo bhavet //
T06srabhu_u:6721: asty asamāhitā bhūmiḥ svabhāvato 'samāhitā tadyathā pañca vijñānakāyāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6722: asty asamāhitā bhūmiḥ prasrabdhivaikalyāt tadyathā kāmāvacārāś cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ,
T06srabhu_u:6723: satyām api cittaikāgratāyāṃ te cittacaitasikā dharmā na prasrabdhyupagūḍhāḥ pravartante,
T06srabhu_u:6725: asty asamāhitā bhūmir anārambhāt tadyathā kāmopabhoginām adhyavasitānāṃ kāmeṣu kāmān upabhuñjānānām /
T06srabhu_u:6726: asty asamāhitā bhūmir vikṣepāt tadyathādikarmikāṇāṃ samādhiprayuktānāṃ pañcasu kāmaguṇeṣv anuvikṣipte 'nuvisṛte cetasi /
T06srabhu_u:6727: asty asamāhitā bhūmiḥ saṃkṣepāt tadyathādikarmikāṇām eva samādhiprayuktānām adhyātmam abhisaṃkṣipte cetasi styānamiddhābhibhavataḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6728: asty asamāhitā bhūmir apratilambhāt tadyathā teṣām euādikarmikāṇāṃ samādhiprayuktānāṃ vikṣepasaṃkṣepānupakliṣṭe 'pi cetasy alabdhamanaskārāṇāṃ ye cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ /
T06srabhu_u:6729: asty asamāhitā bhūmir aparipūrṇatvāt tadyathā labdhamanaskārāṇām alabdhaprayoganiṣṭhāmanaskārāṇām alabdhatatphalānāṃ ca /
T06srabhu_u:6730: asty asamāhitā bhūmiḥ saṃkleśāt tadyathā labdhaprayoganiṣṭhāphalamanaskārāṇām anyatamānyatamenāsvādādikenopakleśenopakliṣṭe cetasi /
T06srabhu_u:6731: asty asamāhitā bhūmir avaśitvāt tadyathā labdhaprayoganiṣṭhāphalamanaskārāṇām (Śbh II 278)
T06srabhu_u:6733: asty asamāhitā bhūmir aviśuddhes tadyathā nikāmākṛcchrākisaralābhinām api laukikasamāpattṝṇām asamudghātitakleśānuśayāś cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ
T06srabhu_u:6734: asty asamāhitā bhūmir vyutthānāt tadyathā pratilabdhāt samādher vyutthitasyāparihīṇasya /
T06srabhu_u:6735: asty asamāhitā bhūmiḥ parihāṇes tadyathā pratilabdhāt samādheḥ parihīṇasya //
T06srabhu_u:6742: [chos bdun po 'di dag ni bden pa yaṅ dag pa ji lta ba bźin du mṅon par rtogs śiṅ rnam par grol ba yoṅs su rdsogs par 'gyur ba yin te /
T06srabhu_u:6743: lhag mthoṅ gi phyogs gsum ste /
T06srabhu_u:6747: źi gnas kyi phyogs gsum ste /
T06srabhu_u:6756: rnam par thar ba las gaṅ zag bdun du rnam par bźag par rig par bya ste /
T06srabhu_u:6757: źugs pa'i lam la dbaṅ po rtul po daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:6758: dbaṅ po rnon po dad pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:6759: chos kyi rjes su 'braṅ ba gñis daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:6761: de gñis ñid dad pas mos pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:6763: sñoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa las ni rnam par grol la /
T06srabhu_u:6764: ñon moṅs pa'i sgrib pa las ni rnam par ma grol ba ste /
T06srabhu_u:6765: lus kyi mṅon sum du byed pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:6766: ñon moṅs pa'i sgrib pa las ni rnam par grol la /
T06srabhu_u:6767: sñoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa las ni rnam par ma grol ba ste /
T06srabhu_u:6768: śes rab kyis rnam par grol ba daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:6770: ñon moṅs pa gñi ga'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba ste /
T06srabhu_u:6771: gñi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba'o //
T06srabhu_u:6773: rgyu gsum po rnam pa bdun po 'di dag ni naṅ gi sems mñam par 'jog ciṅ /
T06srabhu_u:6774: yaṅ dag par sems rtse gcig tu byed par 'gyur ba ste /
T06srabhu_u:6776: gnas pa daṅ mthun pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:6778: 'jig rten pa'i yaṅ dag pa'i lta ba sbyin pa yod do /
T06srabhu_u:6779: źes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:6780: de dag ñid la brten nas khyim gyi gnas ni kun tu (zŚbh II 286) gnod pa'o //
T06srabhu_u:6782: źes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa ste /
T06srabhu_u:6783: mṅon par byuṅ ba daṅ ldan pa'i yaṅ dag pa'i rtog pa ni 'jug par byed pa'o) //
T06srabhu_u:6784: źugs zin nas yaṅ dag pa'i ṅag daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:6785: las daṅ 'tsho ba yaṅ dag par blaṅs pa ni gnas pa daṅ mthun pa'o //
T06srabhu_u:6787: gnas pa daṅ mthun pa'i rgyu de'i 'og tu tshul bźin yid la byed pa daṅ ldan pa na yaṅ dag pa'i rtsol ba daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:6788: dran pa gaṅ yin pa de ni sdud par byed pa'i rgyu yin par rig par bya'o //
T06srabhu_u:6790: 'dod pa la ñe bar spyod pa rnams ni 'di lta bu'i phyir nor sogs par 'dod de /
T06srabhu_u:6791: 'di ltar bde ba 'dod pa kho na'i phyir yin la /
T06srabhu_u:6792: bde ba bdun po 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun las byuṅ ba ste /
T06srabhu_u:6793: de dag ni phal pa'i nor kun tu bsags pa thams cad kyis thob par mi 'gyur ba ste /
T06srabhu_u:6794: dad pa daṅ ldan pa'i bde ba daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:6795: bde 'gror skye ba las byuṅ ba daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:6796: bdag gi cha ma yin pa la ltos nas /
T06srabhu_u:6797: kha na ma tho ba kun tu mi spyod pas 'gyod pa med pa las byuṅ ba daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:6798: de bźin du gźan gyis smad pa la ltos pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:6799: chos daṅ don legs par rtogs pa daṅ ldan pa'i bde ba daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:6800: phyi ma la yo byad daṅ mi ldan pa med pa las byuṅ ba daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:6801: don dam pa rtogs pa las byuṅ ba'i bde ba ste /
T06srabhu_u:6802: rnam pa du ma kha na ma tho ba med pa'i bde ba 'di dag ni /
T06srabhu_u:6803: 'jig rten pa'i nor kun tu bsags pa las rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du thob par mi 'gyur te /
T06srabhu_u:6804: gźan du na tshe 'di ñid la yo byad kyis mi brel ba las byuṅ ba tsam du zad la de yaṅ kha na ma tho ba daṅ bcas pa yin no //
T06srabhu_u:6806: bdun po 'di dag ni bdud daṅ ñon moṅs pa'i phyogs kyi stobs yin te /
T06srabhu_u:6807: bstan pa la gnod par byed pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:6808: ṅan 'gror 'gro ba'i ñes par spyod pa kun (Śbh II 288)
T06srabhu_u:6810: bdag gi cha ma yin par mi lta ste /
T06srabhu_u:6811: bar du gcod pa'i chos bsten pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:6812: gźan gyis smad pa las mi lta ste /
T06srabhu_u:6813: bar du gcod pa'i chos bsten pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:6816: kha na ma tho ba daṅ bcas pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:6817: kha na ma tho ba med pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:6821: dkar po'i rab tu dbye ba daṅ bcas pa'i rten ciṅ 'brel bar 'byuṅ ba'i chos rnams mi rtogs pa daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:6822: ser sna'i dri mas zil gyis non pa'i sems kyis /
T06srabhu_u:6824: yo byad maṅ po 'chaṅ ba daṅ /
T06srabhu_u:6825: blun źiṅ blo chuṅ la śin tu rmoṅs pa'o /
T06srabhu_u:6826: bdud daṅ ñon moṅs pa'i phyogs kyi stobs 'di dag zil gyis mnan pa daṅ /
