T06srabhu_u:7479: uttarārdhena mithyāśikṣāṇāṃ naiva ca śikṣāṇāṃ bālalakṣaṇaṃ darśayati //
T06srabhu_u:7482: pratyakṣatvāc ca jñeyasya śikṣādānaṃ tridhā bhavet // iti //
T06srabhu_u:7483: yasya gṛhakalatrādiparigṛhītaparityāgād yasya samādhivipakṣasya dauṣṭhulyasya prahāṇād
T06srabhu_u:7484: yasya ca catuḥsatyalakṣaṇasya jñeyatattvasya pratyakṣīkaraṇād yathākramaṃ śikṣātrayaṃ saṃpadyate,
T06srabhu_u:7488: anena gāthārdhenottamayoḥ prathamāyāś ca yathākramaṃ sālambanānālambanatvena sūkṣmaudārikatvena prabhedaṃ darśayati //
T06srabhu_u:7491: uttarārdhena prathamamadhyamottamānāṃ yathākramaṃ pratijñānābhinirhṛtatvaṃ kāyacittavivekābhinirhṛtatvaṃ paraghoṣādhyātmayoniśomanaskārābhinirhṛtatvaṃ ca darśayati //
T06srabhu_u:7493: (17) ekā ekā bhavec chikṣā sadvitīyāparā bhavet /
T06srabhu_u:7494: ekā syāt satṛtīyaiva tā budhaḥ samatikramet // iti //
T06srabhu_u:7502: “abhraṣṭaśīlaḥ śikṣāsv” iti śīlavān viharatīty etad darśayati /
T06srabhu_u:7507: rājakulaṃ ghoṣaḥ pānāgāraṃ veśaś caṇḍālakaṭhinaṃ ca /
T06srabhu_u:7515: (19b) śikṣām āgamayet tatra pratipadyeta bhāvataḥ // iti //
T06srabhu_u:7520: (20) pratyākhyānaṃ na kurvīta jīvitārthaṃ na nāśayet /
T06srabhu_u:7521: pratipattau sthito nityaṃ pravṛttavinayo bhavet // iti //
T06srabhu_u:7522: anayā gāthayā caturbhiḥ padair yathākramaṃ dhruvaśīlatāṃ dṛḍhaśīlatāṃ sātatakāritāṃ sātatavartitāṃ ca darśayati //
T06srabhu_u:7524: (21a) pratijñāṃ śodhayet pūrvam ājīvam api śodhayet / iti /
T06srabhu_u:7526: ācārasya hi pratijñāpūrvakam ācaraṇam iti pratijñety ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:7528: kāmasukhallikānuyogāntātmaklamathānuyogāntayoḥ svargādipraṇidhānasya ca vivarjanāc chīlaviśuddhim eva darśayati //
T06srabhu_u:7534: akuśalānāṃ ca kāmavyāpādavitarkādīnāṃ manaḥsaṃkṣobhakarāṇām utpannānām anadhivāsanena śikṣāviśuddhiṃ darśayati //
T06srabhu_u:7537: mūlasāmantakaiḥ śuddhaṃ brahmacaryaṃ cared api // iti //
T06srabhu_u:7539: mandakaukṛtyāsthānakaukṛtyavivarjanayā smṛtisaṃpramoṣavivarjanayā ca niṣṭhākālaprayogakālayor brahmacaryaśuddhiṃ paridīpayati //
T06srabhu_u:7543: saṃnāhaprayogāvyāvartyavīryatayā pañcavidhāpramādaniṣevaṇatayā ca śikṣāviśuddhiviśeṣam evaṃ darśayati /
T06srabhu_u:7547: lūhena vā praṇītena tuṣṭaḥ syāc cīvarādinā //
T06srabhu_u:7548: (26) alpena vartayed yātrāṃ lūhenāpi ca vartayet /
T06srabhu_u:7551: tayoś ca mahecchatāsaṃtuṣṭyoḥ śikṣāviśuddhivibandhahetvoḥ parivarjanena śikṣāviśuddhiṃ darśayati //
T06srabhu_u:7554: tadarthaṃ kalpitām īryāṃ kuryān naiva kathaṃcana // iti //
T06srabhu_u:7555: īryāpathasaṃpattyā pareṣām akuhanārthayā pratigrahamātrajñatayā ca yāvad brahmacaryavāsāj jīvitasthityupakaraṇopādānāc chikṣāviśuddhim eva darśayati
T06srabhu_u:7558: (28) ātmanaś ca guṇān bhūtān na lapen nāpi lāpayet /
T06srabhu_u:7559: tān guṇān atha cārthitvaṃ nimittena na darśayet //
T06srabhu_u:7561: dharmaṇopagataṃ lābhaṃ lābheneha na saṃcayet // iti //
T06srabhu_u:7568: (31) lokāyatāṃs tathā mantrān nirarthān na parāmṛśet /
T06srabhu_u:7569: apārthaṃ dhārayen naiva utsadaṃ pātracīvaram // iti //
T06srabhu_u:7571: lābhasatkāragṛddhihetoś ca utsadapātracīvaradhāraṇasya parivarjanato hetuviśuddhyā śikṣāviśuddhiṃ darśayati //
T06srabhu_u:7575: āryais tu sahasaṃsargaṃ kuryāj jñānaviśodhanam // iti //
T06srabhu_u:7576: vipakṣahetoḥ pratipakṣahetoś ca varjanāt sevanāc ca viśuddhiṃ darśayati //
T06srabhu_u:7578: duḥkhasya janakān kleśān utpannān nādhivāsayet // iti //
T06srabhu_u:7579: yathā gṛhasthaiḥ sahasaṃsargaḥ śokavyākṣepaṃ kṛtvā kleśavivardhano duḥkhahetuḥ,
T06srabhu_u:7583: (34) śraddhādeyaṃ na bhuñjīta kathaṃcic ca kṣatavrataḥ /
T06srabhu_u:7584: pratyākhyānaṃ na kurvīta saddharmasya kathaṃcana // iti //
T06srabhu_u:7588: (35) pareṣāṃ skhalite doṣe anābhogaḥ sukhī bhavet /
T06srabhu_u:7589: ātmanaḥ skhalitaṃ doṣaṃ jñātvā vivṛṇuyāt punaḥ // iti //
T06srabhu_u:7599: (37) buddhānāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ ca anubhāvaṃ ca deśanām /
T06srabhu_u:7604: paurāṇam āgamaṃ tyaktvā svadṛṣṭiṃ na parāmṛśet // iti //
T06srabhu_u:7613: nirmiddhaś caiva middhīva kāle śānto na ca sthitaḥ //
T06srabhu_u:7616: sarvathā sarvadā yukto bhavet saṃyakprayogavān // iti //
T06srabhu_u:7619: cittaṃ śamayataś ca līyamāne citte tadāśaṅkini vā prasadanīyanimittamanasikārāc chamānavasthitatvena,
T06srabhu_u:7620: cāragatasya ca prāg āpattes tadanadhyācārataḥ sakaukṛtyatayā,
T06srabhu_u:7621: uttarottaraviśeṣākāṅkṣaṇatayā ca satkṛtyasātatyena ca saṃyakprayuktasya cādhicittaṃśikṣāviśuddhiṃ darśayati //
T06srabhu_u:7625: (43) niṣpīḍanaś ca paramaḥ snehanaḥ kalpa ucyate /
T06srabhu_u:7626: kāmarāgasya janakas taṃ budhaḥ parivarjayet // iti //
T06srabhu_u:7627: atrāṣṭavidhasya vikalpasya maithunarāgajanakasyādāv ārabhya krameṇotpadyamānasya yāvan niṣṭhāgamanataḥ parivarjanayā śikṣāviśuddhiviśeṣaḥ paridīpitaḥ
T06srabhu_u:7628: tatra nudano vikalpo yo rañjanīye vastuny ayoniśomanaskārasaṃprayuktaś cittasya prerakaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:7629: bodhano yas tasminn eva vastuni prabuddharāgaparyavasthānasaṃprayuktaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:7633: vilasano yas tasminn eva vastuni vicitraparibhogābhilāṣanānāmukhapravṛttaḥ /
T06srabhu_u:7640: pratyayeṣv āśritāḥ kāmāḥ pramādasya ca bhūmayaḥ // iti //
T06srabhu_u:7641: aṣṭābhir ākārair dṛṣṭe dharme saṃparāye ca yathāyogaṃ kāmānām ādīnavadarśanena kāmacchandaprahāṇopāyaṃ darśayati //
T06srabhu_u:7647: (48a) evaṃ kāmān parijñāya nābhigṛdhyet kathaṃcana // iti //
T06srabhu_u:7648: atra pūrvoktānām aṣṭānām atṛptikaratvādināṃ kāmeṣv ādīnavānām sarvalokasiddhair upamopanyāsair ādīnavatvaṃ darśayati /
T06srabhu_u:7649: ye nāmaivaṃ bahuṣv āviṣkṛtādīnavāḥ kathaṃ nāma teṣu paṇḍito gṛdhyed iti saṃdarśanārtham /
T06srabhu_u:7659: (48b) saddharmaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ cintayed bhāvayed api /
T06srabhu_u:7661: vijahya kleśadauṣṭhulyaṃ prahāṇe ca rato bhavet //
T06srabhu_u:7663: kuryāc ca kāmavairāgyaṃ rūpavairāgyam eva ca //
T06srabhu_u:7665: dṛṣṭe dharme ca nirvāyāt tathā upadhi saṃkṣayāt // iti //
T06srabhu_u:7666: atra lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedyādibhiḥ saptabhir manaskārair laukikalokottaramārgaviśuddhyā sopadhinirupadhinirvāṇaphalādhiprajñaṃśikṣāviśuddhiḥ paridīpitā
T06srabhu_u:7674: kuryāc ca kāmavairāgyaṃ rūpavairāgyam eva ca /
T06srabhu_u:7675: satyābhisamayaṃ kuryāt sarvavairāgyam eva ceti laukikalokottaraprayoganiṣṭhāphalaṃ ca //
